GP12garup1_u:4: oṃ nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /

GP12garup1_u:34: hariḥ sa prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargamāsthitaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:82: kathaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /

GP12garup1_u:90: manye dhyāyasi taṃ yasmāttasmājjānāsi taṃ vibhum /

GP12garup1_u:94: śṛṇu sūta / pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /

GP12garup1_u:100: ahaṃ hi nārado dakṣo bhṛgvādyāḥ praṇipatya tam /
GP12garup1_u:103: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ rudraṃ ca māṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:106: kathaṃ rudraṃ suraiḥ sārdhamabravīdvai hariḥ purā /
GP12garup1_u:107: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ brūhi brahmanmahārthakam // GarP_1,2.9 //
GP12garup1_u:110: tatra dṛṣṭo mayā rudro dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ padam // GarP_1,2.10 //
GP12garup1_u:111: pṛṣṭo namaskṛtaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ devaṃ dhyāyasi śaṅkara? /

GP12garup1_u:115: ahaṃ dhyāyāmi taṃ viṣṇuṃ paramātmānamīśvaram // GarP_1,2.12 //
GP12garup1_u:119: tameva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāraṃ yaṃ cintayāmyaham // GarP_1,2.14 //
GP12garup1_u:121: śuciṃ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatpadaṃ parameśvaram // GarP_1,2.15 //
GP12garup1_u:123: yasminviśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca // GarP_1,2.16 //
GP12garup1_u:127: garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasāmapi // GarP_1,2.18 //
GP12garup1_u:129: gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu // GarP_1,2.19 //
GP12garup1_u:130: purāṇa puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto dvijātiṣu /
GP12garup1_u:135: yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ // GarP_1,2.22 //
GP12garup1_u:136: candrādityau ca nayane taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /
GP12garup1_u:137: yasya trilokī jaṭhare masya kāṣṭhāśca bāhavaḥ // GarP_1,2.23 //
GP12garup1_u:139: yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasandhiṣu // GarP_1,2.24 //
GP12garup1_u:145: padybhāṃ yasya kṣitirjātā śrotrābhyāṃ ca tathā diśaḥ // GarP_1,2.27 //
GP12garup1_u:147: sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca // GarP_1,2.28 //
GP12garup1_u:152: stutvā praṇamya taṃ viṣṇuṃ śrotukāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.30 //
GP12garup1_u:154: sārāntsārataraṃ viṣṇuṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstaṃ praṇamya vai // GarP_1,2.31 //
GP12garup1_u:156: yathā papraccha māṃ vyāsa stathāsau bhagavān bhavaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:161: ko dhyeyaḥ kaśca vai pūjyaḥ kairvratai stuṣyate paraḥ // GarP_1,2.33 //
GP12garup1_u:162: kairdharmaiḥ kaiśca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharmapūjayā /
GP12garup1_u:163: kenācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syātkiṃ tadrūpaṃ ca tasya vai // GarP_1,2.34 //
GP12garup1_u:173: śṛṇu rudra / pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.38 //
GP12garup1_u:175: ahaṃ dhyeyaśca pūjyaśca stutyohaṃ statibhiḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.39 //
GP12garup1_u:178: niyamaiśca vrataistuṣṭa ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ // GarP_1,2.40 //
GP12garup1_u:180: duṣṭanigrahakartā hi dharmagoptā tvahaṃ hara / // GarP_1,2.41 //
GP12garup1_u:182: ahaṃ mantrāśca mantrārthaḥ pūjādhyānaparo hyaham // GarP_1,2.42 //
GP12garup1_u:185: jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:186: sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,2.44 //
GP12garup1_u:192: ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham // GarP_1,2.46 //

GP12garup1_u:201: mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare /
GP12garup1_u:202: yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat // GarP_1,2.50 //
GP12garup1_u:207: yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,2.52 //

GP12garup1_u:217: māṃ dhyātvā pakṣimukhyedaṃ purāṇaṃ gada gāruḍam // GarP_1,2.57 //

GP12garup1_u:228: iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ /

GP12garup1_u:238: bhutvā harervāhanaṃ ca sargādīnāṃ ca kāraṇam /

GP12garup1_u:241: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_1,3.7 //

GP12garup1_u:250: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana // GarP_1,4.1 //

GP12garup1_u:258: vyaktaṃ viṣṇustathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:264: aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi /

GP12garup1_u:269: sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca // GarP_1,4.10 //
GP12garup1_u:270: apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara /

GP12garup1_u:279: ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,4.15 //
GP12garup1_u:283: (7) tator'vāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā nuṣaḥ // GarP_1,4.17 //
GP12garup1_u:285: pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,4.18 //
GP12garup1_u:290: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ /

GP12garup1_u:300: tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā /

GP12garup1_u:305: jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai // GarP_1,4.27 //
GP12garup1_u:306: rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca /

GP12garup1_u:309: jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ // GarP_1,4.29 //
GP12garup1_u:311: svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān // GarP_1,4.30 //
GP12garup1_u:320: āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:321: ūrubhyāṃ tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padybhāma jāyata // GarP_1,4.35 //
GP12garup1_u:323: mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām // GarP_1,4.36 //

GP12garup1_u:333: dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam /
GP12garup1_u:334: bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,5.2 //
GP12garup1_u:342: tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:343: dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān // GarP_1,5.6 //
GP12garup1_u:345: bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām // GarP_1,5.7 //
GP12garup1_u:347: śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā // GarP_1,5.8 //
GP12garup1_u:348: tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup1_u:353: virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,5.11 //
GP12garup1_u:357: somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // GarP_1,5.13 //
GP12garup1_u:360: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:364: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:367: svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye // GarP_1,5.18 //
GP12garup1_u:369: phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ // GarP_1,5.19 //
GP12garup1_u:370: pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:371: te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ // GarP_1,5.20 //
GP12garup1_u:372: mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī /
GP12garup1_u:373: tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_1,5.21 //
GP12garup1_u:375: śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām // GarP_1,5.22 //
GP12garup1_u:379: devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau // GarP_1,5.24 //
GP12garup1_u:380: prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame /
GP12garup1_u:384: śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:387: khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā // GarP_1,5.28 //
GP12garup1_u:388: sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:389: bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ // GarP_1,5.29 //
GP12garup1_u:393: śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam // GarP_1,5.31 //
GP12garup1_u:395: medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca // GarP_1,5.32 //
GP12garup1_u:397: vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata // GarP_1,5.33 //
GP12garup1_u:399: kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate // GarP_1,5.34 //
GP12garup1_u:401: tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ // GarP_1,5.35 //
GP12garup1_u:402: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā /
GP12garup1_u:404: tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt /
GP12garup1_u:407: vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk /
GP12garup1_u:409: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:413: sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam // GarP_1,6.1 //
GP12garup1_u:417: divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.3 //
GP12garup1_u:426: tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ // GarP_1,6.7 //
GP12garup1_u:428: puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau // GarP_1,6.8 //
GP12garup1_u:429: dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi /
GP12garup1_u:432: upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām // GarP_1,6.10 //
GP12garup1_u:434: sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // GarP_1,6.11 //
GP12garup1_u:437: prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa /
GP12garup1_u:440: nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu // GarP_1,6.14 //
GP12garup1_u:444: nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ // GarP_1,6.16 //
GP12garup1_u:446: śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara / // GarP_1,6.17 //
GP12garup1_u:447: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi /
GP12garup1_u:448: nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,6.18 //
GP12garup1_u:455: ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau /
GP12garup1_u:456: dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha // GarP_1,6.21 //
GP12garup1_u:458: pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā // GarP_1,6.22 //
GP12garup1_u:462: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām /
GP12garup1_u:465: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa /
GP12garup1_u:468: kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā // GarP_1,6.26 //
GP12garup1_u:473: lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā (jā) mitaḥ // GarP_1,6.28 //
GP12garup1_u:475: saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi // GarP_1,6.29 //
GP12garup1_u:477: pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.30 //
GP12garup1_u:484: anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ // GarP_1,6.33 //
GP12garup1_u:488: apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.35 //
GP12garup1_u:489: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam /
GP12garup1_u:498: viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca // GarP_1,6.40 //
GP12garup1_u:499: vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:500: aśumāṃśca bhagaścaiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.41 //
GP12garup1_u:516: svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ // GarP_1,6.49 //
GP12garup1_u:517: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:518: svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // GarP_1,6.50 //
GP12garup1_u:520: vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā // GarP_1,6.51 //
GP12garup1_u:521: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:527: añja (nta) ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:530: śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike // GarP_1,6.56 //
GP12garup1_u:532: śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi // GarP_1,6.57 //
GP12garup1_u:543: gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:544: krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān // GarP_1,6.62 //
GP12garup1_u:552: īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā // GarP_1,6.66 //
GP12garup1_u:556: ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo (camaso) dhruvaḥ // GarP_1,6.68 //
GP12garup1_u:562: dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ // GarP_1,6.71 //
GP12garup1_u:563: udveṣaṇo gaṇo nāma vāyuskandhe tu saptame /
GP12garup1_u:564: etatsarvaṃ hare rūpaṃ rājāno dānavāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,6.72 //
GP12garup1_u:565: sūryādi parivāreṇa manvādyā ījire harim // GarP_1,6.73 //
GP12garup1_u:566: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe uttānapādavaṃśādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:576: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:587: snānaṃ vastropavītañca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,7.4 //
GP12garup1_u:610: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:611: oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:612: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate pradyumnāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:613: oṃ aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate aniruddhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:617: oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:618: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ namo bhagavate varāhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:619: oṃ kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ vainateyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:620: oṃ jaṃ khaṃ raṃ sudarśa nāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:621: oṃ khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadaiyau namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:622: oṃ vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:623: oṃ ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:624: oṃ gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ saṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:625: oṃ dhaṃ ṣaṃ vaṃ saṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:626: oṃ saṃ daṃ laṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:627: oṃ ṭhaṃ caṃ bhaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:632: viṣṇuśaktyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ pūjāṃ śṛṇu śubhapradām // GarP_1,7.7 //
GP12garup1_u:640: śraddhā ṛddhiḥ kalā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:641: oṃ hrīṅkārādyā namo 'ntāśca sarasvatyāśca śaktayaḥ // GarP_1,7.9 //
GP12garup1_u:647: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryādīnāṃ sarasvatyāśca pūjanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:655: teṣu caiva prakurvīta sūtrapātaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,8.3 //
GP12garup1_u:658: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:659: pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet // GarP_1,8.5 //
GP12garup1_u:665: padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit // GarP_1,8.8 //
GP12garup1_u:667: dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet // GarP_1,8.9 //
GP12garup1_u:669: antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca // GarP_1,8.10 //
GP12garup1_u:671: dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale // GarP_1,8.11 //
GP12garup1_u:672: sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:674: hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:677: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim // GarP_1,8.14 //
GP12garup1_u:679: aniruddhaṃ paścime ca brihmāṇaṃ cottare nyaset // GarP_1,8.15 //
GP12garup1_u:681: tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,8.16 //
GP12garup1_u:682: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:687: dviguṇaṃ putrake homaṃ triguṇaṃ sādhake matam /
GP12garup1_u:697: ekaikaṃ yo jayettatra kṣetrajñaṃ dehakāraṇāt // GarP_1,9.6 //
GP12garup1_u:701: hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,9.8 //
GP12garup1_u:704: taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:707: guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:709: puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // GarP_1,9.11 //
GP12garup1_u:712: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:717: śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāddhṛdayaṃ ca śiraḥ śikhām /
GP12garup1_u:718: kavacaṃ netramastraṃ ca āsanaṃ mūrtimarcayet // GarP_1,10.1 //
GP12garup1_u:720: catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣe khākṣyādi maṇḍalam // GarP_1,10.2 //
GP12garup1_u:722: lakṣmīmaṅgāni caikasminkoṇe durgāṃ gaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_1,10.3 //
GP12garup1_u:724: oṃ ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.4 //
GP12garup1_u:727: oṃ hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.5 //
GP12garup1_u:728: oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.6 //
GP12garup1_u:729: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:735: yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet // GarP_1,11.2 //
GP12garup1_u:744: madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:747: padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet // GarP_1,11.8 //
GP12garup1_u:749: kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set // GarP_1,11.9 //
GP12garup1_u:750: tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā /
GP12garup1_u:751: nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayorvinyasetkramāt // GarP_1,11.10 //
GP12garup1_u:752: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:755: hṛdaye hṛdayaṃ nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset // GarP_1,11.12 //
GP12garup1_u:756: śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau /
GP12garup1_u:758: tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret /
GP12garup1_u:760: dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:771: manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ // GarP_1,11.20 //
GP12garup1_u:773: madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ // GarP_1,11.21 //
GP12garup1_u:775: dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,11.22 //
GP12garup1_u:778: dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset /
GP12garup1_u:779: devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset // GarP_1,11.24 //
GP12garup1_u:785: añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī // GarP_1,11.27 //
GP12garup1_u:788: savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:789: tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ // GarP_1,11.29 //
GP12garup1_u:793: mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam // GarP_1,11.31 //
GP12garup1_u:795: navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā // GarP_1,11.32 //
GP12garup1_u:801: vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam // GarP_1,11.35 //
GP12garup1_u:803: nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ // GarP_1,11.36 //
GP12garup1_u:806: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam /
GP12garup1_u:807: ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam // GarP_1,11.38 //
GP12garup1_u:808: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā /
GP12garup1_u:809: ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet // GarP_1,11.39 //
GP12garup1_u:810: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:817: vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ // GarP_1,11.43 //
GP12garup1_u:819: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:823: oṃ nama ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ // GarP_1,12.1 //
GP12garup1_u:864: kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūrvarāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya khaṃ caṃ phaṃ
GP12garup1_u:865: ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ
GP12garup1_u:866: puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śaṃ śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śaṃ śārṅgāya
GP12garup1_u:867: iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye
GP12garup1_u:868: varuṇāya jalādhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye dhāṃ dhanadāya dhanādhipataye hāṃ
GP12garup1_u:869: īśānāya vidyādhipataye oṃ vajrāya śaktyai oṃ daṇḍāya khaṅgāya oṃ pāśāya dhvajāya
GP12garup1_u:870: gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātālādhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe sarvalokādhipataye oṃ
GP12garup1_u:891: oṃ naṃnoṃ bhagavateṃ vāṃsuṃdevāyaṃ oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:896: evaṃ japtvā vidhānena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,12.5 //
GP12garup1_u:897: arghaṃ dattvā jitaṃ tena praṇāmaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:898: tato 'gnāvapi sampūjyaṃ taṃ yajeta yathāvidhi // GarP_1,12.6 //
GP12garup1_u:900: pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit // GarP_1,12.7 //
GP12garup1_u:902: pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset // GarP_1,12.8 //
GP12garup1_u:907: vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet /
GP12garup1_u:910: gacchagaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo nirañjanaḥ // GarP_1,12.12 //
GP12garup1_u:912: sudarśanaḥ śrīhariśca acyutaḥ sa trivikramaḥ // GarP_1,12.13 //
GP12garup1_u:913: caturbhujo vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumna eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:922: oṃ mahācakrāya asurāntakṛt huṃ phaṭ oṃ huṃ sahasrāra huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,12.16 //
GP12garup1_u:924: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:928: namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam // GarP_1,13.1 //
GP12garup1_u:931: gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te // GarP_1,13.2 //
GP12garup1_u:937: musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām // GarP_1,13.4 //
GP12garup1_u:944: pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara /
GP12garup1_u:945: candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā // GarP_1,13.7 //
GP12garup1_u:946: nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin /
GP12garup1_u:948: vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:951: viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale // GarP_1,13.10 //
GP12garup1_u:954: kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama /
GP12garup1_u:955: etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat // GarP_1,13.12 //
GP12garup1_u:960: iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:964: dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,14.1 //
GP12garup1_u:970: ṣaḍvidheṣu sthito draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hyatīndriyaḥ // GarP_1,14.4 //
GP12garup1_u:972: mantā manaḥ sthito devo manasā parivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.5 //
GP12garup1_u:974: boddhā buddhisthitaḥ sākṣī sarvajño buddhivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.6 //
GP12garup1_u:982: mukto buddho 'jaro vyāpī satya ātmāsmyahaṃ śivaḥ // GarP_1,14.10 //
GP12garup1_u:983: evaṃ ye mānavā vijñā dhyāyantīśaṃ paraṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:984: prāpnuyuste ca tadrūpaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,14.11 //
GP12garup1_u:985: iti dhyānaṃ samākhyātaṃ tava śaṅkara suvrata /
GP12garup1_u:986: paṭhedya etatsatataṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,14.12 //
GP12garup1_u:987: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dhyānayogo nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:991: narastanme paraṃ japyaṃ pathaya tvaṃ janārdana // GarP_1,15.1 //
GP12garup1_u:995: yatpa vitraṃ paraṃ japyaṃ kathayāmi vṛṣadhvaja / /
GP12garup1_u:998: bālacandra nibho bālo balabhadro balādhipaḥ // GarP_1,15.4 //
GP12garup1_u:1006: ātmā ca paramātmā ca pratyagātmā viyatparaḥ // GarP_1,15.7 //
GP12garup1_u:1012: apāraḥ paramārthaśca parāṇāṃ ca paraḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:1018: sarveśaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvaḥ sarvavitsarvadaḥ suraḥ // GarP_1,15.12 //
GP12garup1_u:1019: sarvasya jagato dhāma sarvadarśo ca sarvabhṛt (80) /
GP12garup1_u:1022: sarvasya jagato mūlaṃ sakalo niṣkalo 'nalaḥ (90) // GarP_1,15.14 //
GP12garup1_u:1026: duṣṭānāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca sarvadā ghātako 'ntakaḥ (101) // GarP_1,15.16 //

GP12garup1_u:2086: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā kṛtvā vai śodhanādikam /
GP12garup1_u:2087: yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinī kṛtya nāmabhiḥ // GarP_1,31.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2089: tatra pūrvoktarūpaṃ tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,31.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2091: āvāhya pūjayetsarvā devatā āsanasya yāḥ // GarP_1,31.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2137: anena vidhinā rudra sarvapāpaharaṃ param // GarP_1,31.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2138: yathātmani tathā deve nyāsaṃ kurvīta cāditaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2141: gandhapuṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ dadyāccaruṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,31.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2143: aṅgādīnāṃ svamantraiśca pūjāṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,31.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2197: viṣṇave devadevāya namo vai prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.24 //
GP12garup1_u:2200: devānāṃ prabhave caiva yajñānāṃ prabhave namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2201: munīnāṃ prabhave nityaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.26 //
GP12garup1_u:2209: elaṃ tu pūjayedviṣṇuṃ mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara // GarP_1,31.30 //
GP12garup1_u:2210: mūlamantraṃ japedvāpi yaḥ sa yāti naro harim /
GP12garup1_u:2215: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjāvidhirnāmaikatriṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2219: yena vijñānamātreṇa naro yāti paraṃ padam // GarP_1,32.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2222: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ divyaṃ rahasyaṃ kāmadaṃ param // GarP_1,32.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2224: eka evāvyayaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,32.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2226: sa eva māyāyā deva pañcadhā saṃsthito hariḥ // GarP_1,32.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2240: vidhinā yena kartavyaṃ yairvā mantraiśca śaṅkara / // GarP_1,32.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2241: ādau snānaṃ prakurvīta snātvā sandhyāṃ samācaret /
GP12garup1_u:2244: śoṣaṇādi tataḥ kuryād aṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti mantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,32.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2249: ātmano hṛdi padme tu dhyāyettu parameśvaram /
GP12garup1_u:2254: vyāpakaṃ mūlamantreṇa cāṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ param // GarP_1,32.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2280: oṃ vaṃ vāsudevāya parabrahmaṇe śivāya tejorūpāya vyāpine sarvadevādhidevāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2303: pūjā caiva prakartavyā maṇḍale svastikādike // GarP_1,32.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2305: aṅganyāsaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mudrāḥ sarvāḥ pradaśayat /
GP12garup1_u:2306: ātmānaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca dhyātvā caiva pareśvaram // GarP_1,32.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2308: dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,32.21 //
GP12garup1_u:2318: indrādayo lokapālāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ // GarP_1,32.26 //
GP12garup1_u:2319: adho nāga tadūddhva tu brahmāṇaṃ pūjayetsudhīḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2320: iti sthānakramo jñeyo maṇḍale śaṅkara tvayā // GarP_1,32.27 //
GP12garup1_u:2321: āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ kṛtvā nyāsaṃ tu tasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:2323: snānaṃ vastraṃ tathācāmaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
GP12garup1_u:2325: kuryācchaṅkara mūlena japaṃ cāpi samarpayet // GarP_1,32.29 //
GP12garup1_u:2327: oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ sakarṣaṇāya ca // GarP_1,32.30 //
GP12garup1_u:2329: namo nārāyaṇāyaiva narāyaṇāṃ pataye namaḥ // GarP_1,32.31 //
GP12garup1_u:2333: mano vai vedavedyāya śaṅkhacakradharāya ca // GarP_1,32.33 //
GP12garup1_u:2341: tvadanyo nāsti deveśa nāsti trātā jagatprabho // GarP_1,32.37 //
GP12garup1_u:2342: tvāmava sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ gato 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2345: anyaiścavādakeḥ stātraiḥ stutvā vai nīlalohita // GarP_1,32.39 //
GP12garup1_u:2350: idaṃ ca yaḥ paṭhedrudra pañcatattvārcanaṃ naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2352: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcatattvā(viṣṇavar)
GP12garup1_u:2357: graharogādikaṃ sarvaṃ yatkṛtvā nāśameti vai // GarP_1,33.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2360: snānamādau prakurvīta pūjayecca hariṃ tata // GarP_1,33.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2362: sahasrāraṃ huṃ phaṭ namo mantraḥ praṇavapūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,33.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2364: dhyāyetmudarśanaṃ devaṃ hṛdi padme 'male śubhe // GarP_1,33.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2366: āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā hara // GarP_1,33.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2379: ugrāya caiva saumyāya caṇḍāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2381: māyāpañjarabhetre ca śivāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2383: kālāya mṛtyave caiva bhīmāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2385: viṣṇurūpāya śāntāya cāyudhānāṃ dharāya ca // GarP_1,33.14 //
GP12garup1_u:2387: iti stotraṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ cakrasya tava kīrtitam // GarP_1,33.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2388: yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:2390: sa pāpaṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā viṣṇulokāya kalpate // GarP_1,33.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2391: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sudarśanapūjāvidhirnāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2395: śṛṇvato nāsti tṛptirme gadatastava pūjanam // GarP_1,34.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2398: tacchṛṇuṣva jagannātho yena viṣṇuḥ pratuṣyati // GarP_1,34.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2400: pravakṣyāmi paraṃ puṇyaṃ tadādau śṛṇu śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2401: oṃ saiṃ kṣaiṃ śirase namaḥ iti praṇavasaṃyutaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2405: oṃ kṣīṃ śirase svāhāśiraḥ proktaṃ kṣūṃ vaṣaṭ tathā // GarP_1,34.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2406: oṃ kārayuktā devasya śikhā jñeyā vṛṣadhvaja /
GP12garup1_u:2407: oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya huṃ vai kavacaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_1,34.6 //
GP12garup1_u:2408: oṃ kṣaiṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ netraṃ devasya kīrtitam /
GP12garup1_u:2409: oṃ haḥ astrāya phaṭ astraṃ devasya kīrtitam // GarP_1,34.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2410: pūjāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi nanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu ādau snātvā tathācamya tato yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,34.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2412: yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinīkṛtya lamiti // GarP_1,34.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2413: aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ oṃ kāreṇaiva bhedayet /
GP12garup1_u:2417: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ dhārayantaṃ caturbhujam // GarP_1,34.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2419: sucakraṃ sukapolaṃ ca ṣītāmbaradharaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,34.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2421: aṅgamantraistato nyāsaṃ mūlamantreṇa vai tathā // GarP_1,34.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2425: oṃ hayagrīvāsanasya āgacchata ca devatāḥ // GarP_1,34.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2427: dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2429: asya madhyer'canaṃ kāryaṃ dvāre gaṅgāñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2431: garuḍaṃ pūjayedagre madhye śaktiñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2438: kandaṃ nālaṃ ca padmaṃ ca madhye caiva prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.21 //
GP12garup1_u:2442: prahvī satyā tatheśānānugrahau śaktayo hyamūḥ // GarP_1,34.23 //
GP12garup1_u:2449: kartavyaṃ vidhinānena iti te hara kīrtitam /
GP12garup1_u:2462: tato hyācamanaṃ dadyādupavītaṃ tataḥ śubham // GarP_1,34.33 //
GP12garup1_u:2464: dhyātvā pādyādikaṃ bhūyo dadyāddevāya śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.34 //
GP12garup1_u:2466: oṃ kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ anena hṛdayaṃ yajet // GarP_1,34.35 //
GP12garup1_u:2467: oṃ kṣīṃ śirase namaśca śirasaḥ pūjanaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:2468: oṃ kṣūṃ śikhāyai namaśca śikhāmetena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.36 //
GP12garup1_u:2469: oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya namaḥ kavacaṃ paripūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:2470: oṃ kṣaiṃ netrāya namaśca netraṃ cānena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.37 //
GP12garup1_u:2471: oṃ kṣaḥ astrāya nama iti astraṃ cānena pūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:2472: hṛdayaṃ ca śiraścaiva śikhāṃ ca kavacaṃ tathā // GarP_1,34.38 //
GP12garup1_u:2474: koṇeṣvastraṃ yajedrudra netraṃ madhyai prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.39 //
GP12garup1_u:2476: śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ tathā cakraṃ gadāṃ pūrvāditor'cayet // GarP_1,34.40 //
GP12garup1_u:2477: khaḍgaṃ ca musalaṃ pāśamaṅkuśaṃ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2479: śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ mālāṃ tathā pītāmbaraṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:2481: brahmāṇaṃ nāradaṃ siddhaṃ guruṃ paraguruṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:2484: agniṃ yamaṃ nirṛtiṃ ca varuṇaṃ vāyumeva ca // GarP_1,34.44 //
GP12garup1_u:2487: vajraṃ śaktiṃ tathā daṇḍaṃ khaṅgaṃ pāśaṃ dhvajaṃ gadām /
GP12garup1_u:2488: triśūlaṃ cakrapadme ca āyudhānyatha pūjayet // GarP_1,34.46 //
GP12garup1_u:2492: devasya mūlamantreṇa pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.48 //
GP12garup1_u:2493: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ naivedyameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2494: pradakṣiṇaṃ namaskāraṃ japyaṃ tasmai samarpayet // GarP_1,34.49 //
GP12garup1_u:2496: oṃ namo hayaśirase vidyādhyakṣāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,34.50 //
GP12garup1_u:2498: namaḥ śāntāya devāya triguṇāyātmane namaḥ // GarP_1,34.51 //
GP12garup1_u:2502: nama ādyāya dāntāya sarvasattvahitāya ca // GarP_1,34.53 //
GP12garup1_u:2504: kartre hartre sureśāya sarvagāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,34.54 //
GP12garup1_u:2509: iti te kathitā pūjā hayagrīvasya śaṅkara /
GP12garup1_u:2510: yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā sa gacchetparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,34.57 //
GP12garup1_u:2511: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hayagrīvapūjāvidhirnāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2519: evaṃ jñātvā tu gāyattrīṃ japeddvādaśalakṣakam // GarP_1,35.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2521: jepa ca tripadā groktā arcane ca catuṣpadā // GarP_1,35.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2522: nyāse jape tathā dhyāne agnikārye tathārcane /
GP12garup1_u:2525: ūrvorguhye ca vṛṣaṇe nāḍyāṃ nābhau tanūdare // GarP_1,35.6 //
GP12garup1_u:2527: netre bhuvārlalāṭe ca pūrvasyāṃ dakṣiṇottare // GarP_1,35.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2529: indranīlaṃ ca vahniṃ ca pītaṃ śyāmaṃ ca kāpilam // GarP_1,35.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2530: śvetaṃ vidyutprabhaṃ tāraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ krameṇa tat /
GP12garup1_u:2531: śyāmaṃ śuklaṃ tathā pītaṃ śvetaṃ vai padmarāgavat // GarP_1,35.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2533: arkavarṇasamaṃ saumyaṃ śaṅkhābhaṃ śvetameva ca // GarP_1,35.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2535: pūtaṃ bhavati tatsarvaṃ gāyattryā na paraṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,35.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2536: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gāyattrīnyāsanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2542: triḥ paṭhedāyatapraṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,36.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2546: āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne upaspṛśya yathāvidhi // GarP_1,36.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2548: praṇavena tu saṃyuktaṃ kṣipedvāri padepade // GarP_1,36.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2551: samuddhṛtyodakaṃ pāṇau japtvā ca drupadāṃ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:2554: divā rātrau ca yatpāpaṃ sarvaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt // GarP_1,36.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2558: triyugaṃ tu sahasreṇa gāyattrī hanti duṣkṛtam // GarP_1,36.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2561: oṃ bhūrvinyasya hṛdaye oṃ bhuvaḥ śirasi nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:2562: oṃ svariti śikhāyāṃ ca gāyattryāḥ prathamaṃ padam // GarP_1,36.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2571: taṃ hanti sūryaḥ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2572: turīyasya padasyāpi ṛṣirnirmala eva ca // GarP_1,36.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2573: chandastu devī gāyattrī paramātmā ca devatā // GarP_1,36.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2574: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saṃdhyāvidhirnāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2577: gāyattrī paramā devī bhuktimuktipradā ca tām /
GP12garup1_u:2580: aṣṭottaraṃ sahasraṃ vā athavāṣṭaśataṃ japet // GarP_1,37.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2586: vedamātre ca sāṃkṛtyai brahmāṇī kauśikī kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:2587: sādhvyai sarvārthasādhinyai sahasrākṣyai ca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_1,37.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2594: uttare śikhare jātā bhūmyāṃ parvata vāsinī /
GP12garup1_u:2595: brahmaṇā samanujñātā gaccha devi yathāsukham // GarP_1,37.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2596: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gāyattrīkalpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2599: navamyādau yajeddurgāṃ hrīṃ durge rakṣiṇīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:2602: gaurī kālī umā durgā bhadrā kāntiḥ sarasvatī // GarP_1,38.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2603: maṅgalā vijayā lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:2606: dhanurdhvajaṃ ḍamarukaṃ paraśuṃ pāśameva ca // GarP_1,38.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2608: vajra cakraṃ śalākāṃ ca aṣṭādaśabhujāṃ smaret // GarP_1,38.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2610: oṃ namo bhagavati cāmuṇḍe śmaśānavāsini kapālahaste mahāpretasamārūḍhe mahāvimānamālākule
GP12garup1_u:2611: kālarātri bahugaṇaparivṛte mahāmukhe bahubhuje sughaṇṭāḍamarukiṅkiṇīke aṭṭāṭṭahāse
GP12garup1_u:2612: kilikili huṃ sarvanādaśabdabahule gajacarmaprāvṛtaśarīre rudhiramāṃsadigdhe lolagrajihve
GP12garup1_u:2614: karālanetre hilihili lalajjihve hraiṃ hrīṃ bhṛkuṭimukhi oṃ kārabhadrāsane kapālamālāveṣṭite
GP12garup1_u:2615: jaṭāmukuṭaśaśāṅkadhāriṇi aṭṭāṭṭahāse kilikili huṃhuṃ daṃṣṭrāghorāndhakāriṇi sarvavighnavināśini
GP12garup1_u:2616: idaṃ karma sādhaya sādhaya śīghraṃ kurukuru kahakaha aṅkuśe samanupraveśaya vargaṃvargaṃ (vaṅgavaṅga)
GP12garup1_u:2617: kampayakampaya calacala cālayacālaya rudhiramāṃsamadyapriye hanahana kuṭṭakuṭṭa chindachinda
GP12garup1_u:2618: mārayamāraya anubūma anubūma vajraśarīraṃ sādhayasādhaya trailokyagatamapi duṣṭamaduṣṭaṃ
GP12garup1_u:2619: vā gṛhītamagṛhītam āveśaya āveśaya krāmayakramaya nṛtyanṛtya bandhabandha valgavalga
GP12garup1_u:2620: koṭarākṣi urdhvakeśi ulūkavadane karakiṅkiṇi karaṅkamālādhāriṇi dahadaha pacapaca
GP12garup1_u:2621: gṛhṇagahṇa maṇḍalamadhye praveśayapraveśaya kiṃ vilambasi brahmasatyena viṣṇusatyena
GP12garup1_u:2622: ṛṣisatyena rudrasatyena āveśaya āveśaya kilikili khilikhili milimili cilicili vikṛtarūpadhāriṇi
GP12garup1_u:2623: kṛṣṇabhujaṅga veṣṭitaśarīra sarvagrahāveśini pralambhoṣṭhi bhrūmagnanāsike vikaṭamukhi
GP12garup1_u:2624: kapilajaṭe brāhmi bhañjabhañja jvalajvala kālamukhi khalakhala kharakharaḥ pātayapā
GP12garup1_u:2625: taya raktākṣi dhūrṇāpayadhūrṇāpaya bhūmiṃ pātayapātaya śiro gṛhṇagṛhṇa cakṣurmolayamīlaya
GP12garup1_u:2626: bhañjabhañja pādau gṛhṇagṛhṇa mudrāṃ sphoṭayasphoṭaya huṃ hūṃ phaṭ vidāraya vidāraya
GP12garup1_u:2627: triśūlena bhedayabhedaya vajreṇa hanahana daṇḍena tāḍayatāḍaya cekraṇa chedayachedaya
GP12garup1_u:2629: daṃṣṭrayā daṃśayadaṃśaya kīlakena kīlaya kīlaya kartārikayā pāṭayapāṭaya aṅkuśena gṛhṇagṛhṇa brahmāṇi ehi ehi māheśvari ehi ehi kaumāri ehi ehi vārāhi ehi ehi
GP12garup1_u:2630: aindri ehi ehi cāmuṇḍe ehi ehi vaiṣṇāvi ehi ehi himavantacāriṇi ehi ehi kailāsavārīṇi
GP12garup1_u:2631: ehi ehi paramantraṃ chindhichindhi kilikili bimbe aghore ghorarūpiṇi cāmuṇḍe rurukrodhāndhaviniḥ)
GP12garup1_u:2632: sṛte asurakṣayaṅkari ākāśagāmini pāśena bandhabandha samaye tiṣṭhatiṣṭha maṇḍalaṃ
GP12garup1_u:2633: praveśayapraveśaya pātayapātaya gṛhṇagṛhṇa mukhaṃ bandhabandha cakṣurbandhayabandhaya
GP12garup1_u:2634: hṛdayaṃ bandhabandha hastapādau ca bandhabandha duṣṭagrahān sarvān bandhabandha diśāṃ
GP12garup1_u:2635: bandhabandha vidiśāṃ bandhabandha ūrdhvaṃ bandhabandha adhastād bandhabandha bhasmanā
GP12garup1_u:2636: pānīyena mṛtikayā sarṣapairvā āveśaya āveśaya pātayapātaya cāmuṇḍe kilikili vicchehrīṃ(huṃ)
GP12garup1_u:2640: mahāmāṃsena-trimadhurāktena aṣṭottarasahsatraṃ ca ekaikaṃ ca padaṃ yajet /
GP12garup1_u:2645: dvādaśāṣṭabhujā vāpi dhyeyā vāpi caturbhujā // GarP_1,38.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2653: abhayasvastikādyau ca mahiṣaghnī ca siṃhagā // GarP_1,38.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2655: rakṣa māṃ nijabhūtebhyo valiṃ gṛhṇa namo 'stu te // GarP_1,38.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2656: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe durgājapapūjābalimantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2662: śṛṇu sūryasya rudra tvaṃ punarvakṣyāmi pūjanam /
GP12garup1_u:2663: oṃ uccaiḥ śravase namaḥ oṃ aruṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2666: ete dvāre prapūjyā vai epirmantrairvṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,39.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2676: maghye tu pūjayedrudra pūrvādiṣu tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2692: oṃ haṃ saṃ khaṃ khakholkāya krāṃ krīṃ saḥ svāhā sūryamūrtaye namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2695: mudrāyā darśanaṃ rudra mūlamantreṇa vā hara /
GP12garup1_u:2698: evaṃ dhyāyetsadā sūryaṃ mūlamantraṃ śṛṇuṣva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2699: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ // GarP_1,39.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2703: oṃ aḥ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ jvālini śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:2708: tdṛyadayādi hi vāyavyāṃ netraṃ cāntaḥ prapūjayet // GarP_1,39.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2712: paścime caiva bhūteśaṃ uttare bhārgavaṃ sitam // GarP_1,39.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2714: śanaiścaraṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ nairṛtyāṃ diśi pūjayet // GarP_1,39.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2716: aiśānyāṃ dhūmravarṇaṃ tu ketuṃ saṃ paripūjayet // GarP_1,39.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2725: oṃ kaṃ ketave nama iti // GarP_1,39.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2728: japtvā cāṣṭasahasraṃ tu tacca tasmai samarpayet /
GP12garup1_u:2729: aiśānyāṃ diśi bhūteśa tejaścaṇḍaṃ tu pūjayet // GarP_1,39.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2730: oṃ tejaścaṃṇḍāya huṃ phaṭ svadhā svāhā pauṣaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:2731: nirmālyaṃ cārpayettasmai hyarghyaṃ dadyāttato hara // GarP_1,39.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2735: darghyaṃ tu sūryāya tdṛnmantreṇa vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,39.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2739: sūryasya kathitā pūjā kṛtvaitāṃ viṣṇulokabhāk // GarP_1,39.22 //
GP12garup1_u:2740: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryārcanaprakāro nāmaikonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2743: māheśvarīṃ ca me pūjāṃ vada śaṅkhagadādhara /
GP12garup1_u:2744: yāṃ jñātvā mānavāḥ siddhiṃ gacchanti parameśvara // GarP_1,40.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2747: ādau snātvā tathācamya hyāsane copaviśya ca // GarP_1,40.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2748: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍale vai pūjayacce maheśvaram /
GP12garup1_u:2759: oṃ hāṃ astrāya nama iti // GarP_1,40.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2786: oṃ hāṃ hauṃ haṃ śivamūrtaye namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2788: oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2804: satyasyāṣṭau kalā jñeyāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ // GarP_1,40.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2828: kalāṣaṭkaṃ hyakhorasya vijñeyaṃ bhairavaṃ hara // GarP_1,40.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2835: īśānasya kalāḥ pañca jānīhi vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,40.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2850: tattvanyāsaṃ ca mudrāyā darśanaṃ dyānameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2853: vastrālaṃ kārabhogāṃśca hyaṅganyāsaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,40.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2856: nṛtyaṃ chatrā dikaraṇaṃ mudrāṇāṃ darśanaṃ tatā /
GP12garup1_u:2857: rūpaṃ dhyānaṃ japañcātha ekavadbhāva eva ca // GarP_1,40.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2859: māheśī kathitā pūjā rudra pāpavināsinī // GarP_1,40.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2860: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe maheśvarapūjāvidhirnāma catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2863: oṃ viśvāvasurnāma gandharvaḥ kanyānāmadhipatirlabhāmi te kanyāṃ samutpādya tasmai viśvavāsave svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:2865: oṃ namo bhagavati ṛkṣakarṇi caturbhuje ūrdhvakeśi trinayane kālarātri mānuṣāṇāṃ vasārudhirabhojane
GP12garup1_u:2866: amukasya prāptakālasya mṛtyuprade huṃ phaṭ hanahana dahadaha māṃsarudhiraṃ pacapaca ṛkṣapatni svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:2867: na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate // GarP_1,41.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2868: kruddho raktena saṃmārjya karau tābhyāṃ pragṛhya ca /
GP12garup1_u:2870: oṃ namaḥ sarvatoyantrāṇyetadyathā jambhani mohani sarvaśatruvidāriṇi rakṣarakṣa māmamukaṃ sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:2871: śukre naṣṭe mahādeva vakṣye 'haṃ dvijapādiha // GarP_1,41.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2872: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaśyādisādhikamantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2876: ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ kuryātputrakaḥ samayī hara // GarP_1,42.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2878: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māghe kuryādbhādrapade 'pi vā // GarP_1,42.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2880: jñeyaṃ kujādau saṃgrāhyaṃ kanyayā kartitaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,42.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2886: ravirviṣṇuḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ kramāttantuṣu devatāḥ // GarP_1,42.6 //
GP12garup1_u:2888: rudro 'ttamādi vijñeyaṃ mānaṃ ca granthayo daśa // GarP_1,42.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2890: prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā caturtho cāparājitā // GarP_1,42.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2891: jayā ca vijayā rudrā ajitā ca sadāśivā /
GP12garup1_u:2894: saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tathetare // GarP_1,42.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2896: dadyādrandhapavitraṃ tu ātmane brahmaṇe hara // GarP_1,42.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2898: pūrve ca daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ tu uttare cāmalakīphalam // GarP_1,42.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2903: homaṃ kṛtvā gneya dattvā dadyādbhūtabaliṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:2904: āmantrito 'si deveśa gaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,42.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2906: nimantryānena tiṣṭhettu kurvan gītādikaṃ niśi // GarP_1,42.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2908: snātvādityaṃ caturdaśyāṃ prāgrudraṃ ca prapūjayet // GarP_1,42.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2917: oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ kṣaiṃ sarvatattvāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2918: kālātmanā tvayā deva yaddṛṣṭaṃ māmake vidhau // GarP_1,42.21 //
GP12garup1_u:2919: kṛtaṃ kliṣṭaṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ hutaṃ gupta ca yatkṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:2921: pūrayapūraya makhavrataṃ tanniyameśvarāya sarvatattvātmakāya sarvakāraṇapālitāya oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ // GarP_1,42.23 //
GP12garup1_u:2924: pavitraṃ ca gurave dakṣiṇāṃ diśet // GarP_1,42.24 //
GP12garup1_u:2925: baliṃ dattvā dvijān bhojya caṇḍaṃ prācyai visarjayet // GarP_1,42.25 //
GP12garup1_u:2926: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivapavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2930: purā devāsure yuddhe brahmādyāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,43.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2931: viṣṇuśca teṣāṃ devānāṃ dhvajaṃ graiveyakaṃ dadau /
GP12garup1_u:2934: vṛṇīta ca vapitrākhyaṃ varaṃ cedaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,43.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2936: ityukte tena te devāstannāmnā tadvaraṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,43.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2937: prāvṛṭkāle tu ye martyā nārciṣyanti pavitrakaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2938: teṣāṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā viphalā ca bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,43.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2941: dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇave kāryaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe 'tha vā hara /
GP12garup1_u:2945: kauśeyaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ vā kārpāsaṃ kṣaumameva vā /
GP12garup1_u:2948: kārpāsaṃ padmajaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ śastamīśvara // GarP_1,43.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2950: oṃ kāro 'tha śivaḥ somo hyagnirbrahyā phaṇī raviḥ // GarP_1,43.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2952: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca trisūtre devatāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2953: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre vaiṇave mṛnmaye nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:2954: aṅguṣṭhena catuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ tadardhataḥ // GarP_1,43.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2956: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ caiva kanyasaṃ pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.14 //
GP12garup1_u:2958: kanyase ca kaniṣṭhena aṅgulyā granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2960: śivoddhṛtaṃ pavitraṃ tu pratimāyāṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,43.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2970: daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kuśāgraṃ ca pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu // GarP_1,43.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2974: āgneyādiṣu koṇeṣur śyādīnāṃ tu kramānnyaset // GarP_1,43.22 //
GP12garup1_u:2976: dṛṣṭvā punaḥ prapūjyātha vastreṇācchādya yatnataḥ // GarP_1,43.23 //
GP12garup1_u:2978: paścime dakṣiṇe caiva uttare pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.24 //
GP12garup1_u:2980: astreṇa maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā naivedyañca samarpayet // GarP_1,43.25 //
GP12garup1_u:2981: adhivāsya pavitraṃ tu trisūtreṇa navena vā (ca) /
GP12garup1_u:2982: vedikāṃ veṣṭayitvā tu ātmānaṃma kalaśaṃ ghṛtam // GarP_1,43.26 //
GP12garup1_u:2983: agnikuṇḍaṃ vimānaṃ ca maṇḍapaṃ gṛhameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2984: sūtramekaṃ tu saṃgṛhya dadyāddevasya mṛrdhāni // GarP_1,43.27 //
GP12garup1_u:2988: ekarātraṃ trirātraṃ vā adhivāsya pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.29 //
GP12garup1_u:2989: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prātaḥ saṃpūjya keśavam /
GP12garup1_u:2993: gāyattryā cārcitaṃ tena devaṃ saṃpūjya dāpayet /
GP12garup1_u:2994: samaṃ putrakalatrādyaiḥ sūtrapucchaṃ tu dhārayet // GarP_1,43.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3000: vanamālāṃ samabhyarcya svena mantreṇa dāpayet // GarP_1,43.35 //
GP12garup1_u:3004: ādau dattvārghyamāditye tatra caikaṃ pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3010: iyaṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā tavāstu garuḍadhvaja // GarP_1,43.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3011: vanamālā yathā deva kaustubhaṃ satataṃ hṛdi /
GP12garup1_u:3012: tadvatpavitraṃ tantūnāṃ mālāṃ tvaṃ hṛdaye dhara // GarP_1,43.41 //
GP12garup1_u:3013: evaṃ prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām /
GP12garup1_u:3017: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3030: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /
GP12garup1_u:3031: buddhiṃ ca sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3034: yastu vijñāna bāhmena yuktena manasā sadā // GarP_1,44.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3035: sa tu tatpadamāpnoti sa hi bhūyo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:3040: pratyāhā ro jayaḥ prokto dhyānamīśvaracintanam // GarP_1,44.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3042: pūrvaṃ cetaḥ sthiraṃ na syāttatomūrtiṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,44.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3046: ātmāhaṃ paramaṃ brahma paramaṃ jyotireva tu // GarP_1,44.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3048: dvārakādiśilāsaṃstho dhyeyaḥ pūjyo 'pyahaṃ ca saḥ // GarP_1,44.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3051: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmamūrtidhyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3104: (kṛṣṇaḥ) sa vartulāvartaḥ pātu vo natapṛṣṭhakaḥ // GarP_1,45.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3120: śālagrāme dvārakāyāṃ sthitāya gadina namaḥ // GarP_1,45.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3139: viṣṇormūrtimayaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsa divaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:3143: yathāyudhastathā gaurī caṇḍikā ca sarasvatī // GarP_1,45.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3145: gajāsyaśca gaṇaḥ skandaḥ ṣaṇmukhonekadhā guṇāḥ // GarP_1,45.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3148: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śālagrāmamūrtilakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3153: īśāne ca śiraḥ pādau nairṛte 'gnyanile karau /
GP12garup1_u:3158: sūryaḥ satyo bhṛguścaiva ākāśo vāyureva ca // GarP_1,46.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3167: āpaścaivātha sāvitrī jayo rudrastathaiva ca // GarP_1,46.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3168: madhye navapade brahmā tasyāṣṭhau ca samīpagān /
GP12garup1_u:3171: mitro 'tha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,46.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3176: aditiṃ himavantaṃ ca jayantaṃ ca idaṃ trayam // GarP_1,46.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3183: bhāṇḍāgāraṃ ca kauberyāṃ goṣṭhāgāraṃ ca vāyave // GarP_1,46.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3193: madhye catuṣpado brahmā dvipa dāstvaryamādayaḥ // GarP_1,46.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3195: tebhyo hyubhayataḥ sārdhādanye 'pi dvipadāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,46.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3197: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī // GarP_1,46.22 //
GP12garup1_u:3203: vistārābhihataṃ dairghyaṃ rāśiṃ vāstostu kārayet // GarP_1,46.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3204: kṛtvā ca vasubhirbhāgaṃ śeṣaṃ baddhā yamādiśet /
GP12garup1_u:3211: vāstukroḍe gṛhaṃ kuryānna pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā // GarP_1,46.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3215: dvāraṃ dīrghārdhavistāraṃ dvārāṇyaṣṭau smṛtāni ca // GarP_1,46.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3217: sutahīnaṃ tu raudreṇa vīryaghnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_1,46.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3221: arthadaṃ cārthahānyai ca doṣadaṃ putramṛtyudam // GarP_1,46.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3227: aṣṭabhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇāṃ ca phalāphalam // GarP_1,46.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3229: gṛhasya śobhanaḥ prokta īśāne caiva sālmaliḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3230: pūjito vignahārī syātprāsādasya gṛhasya ca // GarP_1,46.38 //
GP12garup1_u:3231: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3234: prāsādānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca vakṣye śaunaka tacchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:3244: atha vāpi samaṃ vāstuṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśabhāgikam /
GP12garup1_u:3245: tasya madhye caturbhāgamādau garbhaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_1,47.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3249: caturdikṣu tathā jñeyo nirgamastuḥ tathā budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3254: liṅgamānamatho vakṣye pīṭho liṅgasamo bhavet // GarP_1,47.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3259: nir gamastu samākhyātaḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva tu /
GP12garup1_u:3268: traivedaṃ kārayetkṣetraṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ // GarP_1,47.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3270: nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ // GarP_1,47.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3271: garbhaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kuryānnemyā mānaṃ bhavediha /
GP12garup1_u:3272: sa eva bhitterutsedho śikharo dviguṇo mataḥ // GarP_1,47.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3273: prāsādānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi mānaṃ yoniṃ ca mānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3278: etebhya eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ sumanoharāḥ // GarP_1,47.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3284: valabhī gṛharājaśca śā lāgṛhaṃ ca mandiram // GarP_1,47.26 //
GP12garup1_u:3285: vimānaṃ ca tathā brahmamandiraṃ bhavanaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:3286: uttambhaṃ śibikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ // GarP_1,47.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3288: mukulī cāsya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaśca kalaśastathā // GarP_1,47.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3290: gajo 'tha vṛṣabho haṃso garuḍaḥ siṃhanāmakaḥ // GarP_1,47.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3294: vakraḥ svastikakhaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣa eva ca // GarP_1,47.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3297: yatra tatra vidhātavyaṃ saṃsthānaṃ maṇḍapasya tu /
GP12garup1_u:3298: rājyaṃ ca vibhavaścaivaḥ hyāyurvardvanameva ca // GarP_1,47.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3306: prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣamabhūmikā // GarP_1,47.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3312: kiyanto yeṣu cādhārā nirādhārāśca kecana // GarP_1,47.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3316: prāsāde niyamo nāsti devatānāṃ svayambhuvām // GarP_1,47.42 //
GP12garup1_u:3323: prasāde devatānāṃ ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣvapi // GarP_1,47.45 //
GP12garup1_u:3329: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃnāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3333: sutithyādau suramyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3335: svaśākhoktavidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu // GarP_1,48.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3338: mantranyāsaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet /
GP12garup1_u:3341: dhvajāṣṭakaiścaturhastāṃ madhye vediṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,48.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3347: śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryo homamācaret // GarP_1,48.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3349: dvārāṇi caiva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇāntike // GarP_1,48.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3353: pūrvadvāre mṛgendraṃ tu hayarājaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3355: agnimīleti hi mantreṇa prathamaṃ pūrvato nyaset // GarP_1,48.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3360: yāmyāṃ vai kṛṣṇarūpā tu nairṛtyā śyāmalā (dhūsarā) bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:3361: vāruṇyāṃ pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyāṃ pītavarṇikā // GarP_1,48.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3362: uttare raktavarṇā tu śukleśī ca patākikā /
GP12garup1_u:3363: bahurūpā tathā madhye indravidyeti pūrvake // GarP_1,48.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3365: pūjyā rakṣohanoveti paścime uttare 'pi ca // GarP_1,48.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3368: kalaśau tu tato dvaudvau niveśyau toraṇāntike /
GP12garup1_u:3371: dikpālāśca tataḥ pūjyāḥ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // GarP_1,48.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3373: asminvṛkṣa itaṃ caiva pracārīti parā smṛtā // GarP_1,48.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3378: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3388: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tadākhyaṃ kalaśaṃ nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:3389: aiśānyāṃ pūjayedyāmye astreṇaiva ca bardhanīm // GarP_1,48.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3395: vardhanyā tu samāyuktaṃ kalaśaṃ bhrāmayedanu // GarP_1,48.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3398: ghaṭaṃ cāvāhya vāyavyāṃ gaṇānāṃ tveti sadgaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:3401: kumbhasya pūrvato bhūtaṃ gaṇadevaṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.35 //
GP12garup1_u:3406: kṛtvā brahmarathe devaṃ pratiṣṭhanti tato dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3414: lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāmaikaṃ sthāpako va(da) det // GarP_1,48.41 //
GP12garup1_u:3420: sahadevī balā caiva śatamūlī śatāvarī // GarP_1,48.44 //
GP12garup1_u:3421: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3426: ratnāni caiva dhānyāni oṣadhīṃ śatapuṣpikām // GarP_1,48.47 //
GP12garup1_u:3428: kṣīraṃ dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasyeti vā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.48 //
GP12garup1_u:3430: tejo 'sīti ca mantraiśca kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet // GarP_1,48.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3432: snātaścaiva suveṣaśca dhūpo deyaśca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,48.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3434: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāstathā // GarP_1,48.51 //
GP12garup1_u:3436: tena toyena yaḥ snāyātsa mucyetsarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.52 //
GP12garup1_u:3438: gandhadvāreti gandhaṃ ca nyāsaṃ vai vedamantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3443: sthitvā caiva pare tattve mantranyāsaṃ tu kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:3446: yathāśāstraṃ nivedyāni pādamūle tu dāpayet // GarP_1,48.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3448: kalaśaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet // GarP_1,48.58 //
GP12garup1_u:3452: vṛṣākapiṃ ca mitraṃ bahvacaḥ pūrvato japet // GarP_1,48.60 //
GP12garup1_u:3453: rudraṃ puruṣasūktaṃ ca ślokādhyāyaṃ ca śukriyam /
GP12garup1_u:3454: brahmāṇaṃ pitṛmaitraṃ ca adhvaryurdakṣiṇe japet // GarP_1,48.61 //
GP12garup1_u:3456: bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet // GarP_1,48.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3458: nīlarudrāṃśca maitraṃ ca atharvaścottare japet // GarP_1,48.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3460: tāmrapātre śarāve vā yathāvibhavato 'pi vā // GarP_1,48.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3462: astreṇa jvālayedvahniṃ kavacena tu veṣṭayet // GarP_1,48.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3464: pātraṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ ca kuṇḍaṃ bhrāmya tataḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,48.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3465: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena paraṃ tejastu niḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:3468: dikṣudikṣu tato dadyātparidhiṃ viṣṭaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,48.68 //
GP12garup1_u:3474: agnestu rakṣaṇārthāya yaduktaṃ karma ntravit // GarP_1,48.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3476: pavitraṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtim // GarP_1,48.72 //
GP12garup1_u:3484: pūjayitvā tato vahniṃ kuṇḍeṣu viharettathā // GarP_1,48.76 //
GP12garup1_u:3486: purṇāhutiṃ śatasyānte sarveṣāṃ caiva homayet // GarP_1,48.77 //
GP12garup1_u:3490: niṣkṛṣya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3491: bhūtānāṃ caiva devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ca prayogataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3492: tilāśca samidhaścaiva homadravyaṃ dvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,48.80 //
GP12garup1_u:3494: paruṣasuktaṃ pūrveṇaiva rudracaiva tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.81 //
GP12garup1_u:3498: evaṃ madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.83 //
GP12garup1_u:3504: caraṇāvagnimīḷe tu iṣetvo gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,48.86 //
GP12garup1_u:3505: agna āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevīti jānunī /
GP12garup1_u:3514: lauhabījāni siddhāni paścāddevaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,48.91 //
GP12garup1_u:3515: na garbhe sthāpayeddevaṃ na garbhaṃ tu parityajet /
GP12garup1_u:3516: īṣanmadhyaṃ parityajya tato doṣāpahaṃ tu tat // GarP_1,48.92 //
GP12garup1_u:3518: oṃ sthiro bhava śivo bhava prajābhyaśca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,48.93 //
GP12garup1_u:3519: devasya tvā saviturvaḥ ṣaḍbhyo vai vinyasedguruḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3524: arghyaṃ dattvā namaskṛtya tato devaṃ kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,48.96 //
GP12garup1_u:3526: ṛttvigbhyaśca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā caiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,48.97 //
GP12garup1_u:3528: āhutīnāṃ śataṃ hutvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet // GarP_1,48.98 //
GP12garup1_u:3532: mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ chatraṃ keyūraṃ kaṭisūtrakam // GarP_1,48.100 //
GP12garup1_u:3536: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3541: viprādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa taddharmaṃ vyāsa / vai śṛṇu // GarP_1,49.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3548: bhikṣācaryātha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3557: kuṭumbabharaṇe yuktaḥ sādhako 'sau gṛhī bhavet // GarP_1,49.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3559: ekākī yastu vicaredudāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ // GarP_1,49.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3565: sanyāsī sa hi vijñeyo vānaprasthāśrame sthitaḥ // GarP_1,49.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3567: jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ // GarP_1,49.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3569: samyak ca damasampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣurucyate // GarP_1,49.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3570: bhaikṣyaṃ śrutaṃ ca maunitvaṃ tapo dhyānaṃ viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3571: samyak ca jñānavairāgyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ bhikṣuke mataḥ // GarP_1,49.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3574: yogī ca trividho jñeyo bhautikaḥ kṣattra evaca /
GP12garup1_u:3576: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa(duṣka) rabhāvanā /
GP12garup1_u:3577: tṛtīye cāntimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī // GarP_1,49.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3579: pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // GarP_1,49.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3584: satyaṃ saṃtoṣa āstikyaṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.22 //
GP12garup1_u:3588: prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // GarP_1,49.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3593: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva vana (guru) vāsinām /
GP12garup1_u:3594: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ sthānaṃ tadvai vanaukasām // GarP_1,49.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3596: ānandaṃ brahma tatsthānaṃ yasmānnāvartate muniḥ // GarP_1,49.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3600: yamāḥ pañca tvahiṃsādyā ahiṃsā prāṇyahiṃsanam // GarP_1,49.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3608: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpyuktaṃ puraṇātpūrakaḥ sa ca // GarP_1,49.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3612: brahmātmacintā dhyānaṃ syāddhāraṇā manaso dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,49.36 //
GP12garup1_u:3614: ahamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakam // GarP_1,49.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3622: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3626: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya dharmamarthaṃ ca cintayet // GarP_1,50.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3628: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // GarP_1,50.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3630: prataḥ snānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto janāḥ // GarP_1,50.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3632: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṣṭakaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,50.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3635: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca duḥ svapnaṃ durvicintitam /
GP12garup1_u:3636: prataḥ snānena pāpāni dhūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,50.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3637: na ca snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ prāśastyaṃ karma saṃsmṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3638: home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,50.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3640: ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi mārjanaṃ kāyikaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,50.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3643: brāhmaṃ tu mārjanaṃ mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3645: gavāṃ hi rajasā proktaṃ vāyavyaṃ snānamuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:3651: apāmārgaṃ ca vilvaṃ ca karavīraṃ ca dhāvane /
GP12garup1_u:3656: saṃmārjya mantrai rātmānaṃ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhaiḥ // GarP_1,50.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3660: prākkūleṣu tataḥ sthitvā darbheṣu susamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3662: yā sandhyā sā jagatsūtirmāyātītā hi niṣkalā // GarP_1,50.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3664: dhyātvā raktāṃ sitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ gāyattrīṃ vai japedvudhaḥ // GarP_1,50.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3670: yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3682: tvameva brahma paramamāpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam // GarP_1,50.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3689: ṛtvik putro 'tha patnī vā śiṣyo vāpi sahodaraḥ // GarP_1,50.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3691: vinā ma (ta) ntreṇa yatkarma nāmutreha phalapradam // GarP_1,50.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3693: guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta hitaṃ cāsya samācaret // GarP_1,50.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3702: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca /
GP12garup1_u:3705: mṛdaikayā śiraḥ kṣālyaṃ dvābhyāṃ nābhestathopari // GarP_1,50.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3706: adhaśca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyaṃ pādau ṣaṭbhistathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3716: tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3723: drupadāṃ vātha sāvitrariṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,50.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3725: apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte // GarP_1,50.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3731: haṃsaḥ śuciṣadetena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,50.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3732: anyaiḥ saurairvaidikaiśca gāyattrīṃ ca tato japet /
GP12garup1_u:3736: kartavyā tvakṣālā syādantarā tatra sā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:3738: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyāṃ darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3739: pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tataḥ kṣitau // GarP_1,50.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3747: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata /
GP12garup1_u:3748: niṣpīḍya snānavastraṃ vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ // GarP_1,50.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3750: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ sūryaṃ tathaiva madhusūdanam // GarP_1,50.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3752: pradadyādvātha puṣpādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3753: āpo vā devatāḥ sarvāstena samyak samarcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3754: dhyātvā praṇavapūrvaṃ vai devaṃ vārisamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3756: narte hyārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam // GarP_1,50.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3758: tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.67 //
GP12garup1_u:3763: mānuṣaṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca pañca yajñānsamācaret // GarP_1,50.69 //
GP12garup1_u:3765: kṛtvā manuṣyayajñaṃ vai tataḥ svādhyāyamācaret // GarP_1,50.70 //
GP12garup1_u:3766: vaiśvadevastu kartavyo devayajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3767: bhūtayajñaḥṛ sa vai jñeyo bhūtebhyo yastvayaṃ baliḥ // GarP_1,50.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3775: manovākkarmabhiḥ śāntaṃ svāgataiḥ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,50.75 //
GP12garup1_u:3783: akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3784: bhuñjate cetsa mūḍhātmā tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:3789: aśaucaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā // GarP_1,50.82 //
GP12garup1_u:3796: śudhyenmāsena vai śūdro yatīnāṃ nāsti pātakam /
GP12garup1_u:3798: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3808: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vimalaṃ dānamīritam // GarP_1,51.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3810: anuddiśya phalaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇāya tu nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,51.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3811: yattu pāpopaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupāṃ kare /
GP12garup1_u:3816: cetasā sattvayuktena dānaṃ tadvimalaṃ śivam // GarP_1,51.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3818: dadāti vedaviduṣe sa na bhūyo 'bhijāyate // GarP_1,51.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3819: bhūmidānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:3820: vidyāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahmaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,51.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3823: vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu brāhmaṇānsapta pañca ca /
GP12garup1_u:3826: prīyatāṃ dharmarājeti yathā manasi vartate // GarP_1,51.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3829: dadāti yastu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3830: ghṛtānnamudakaṃ caiva vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3834: yo hi yāṃ devatāmicchetsamārādhayituṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,51.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3840: bhogakāmo hi śaśinaṃ balakāmaḥ samīraṇam // GarP_1,51.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3842: akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā pūjayettu gadādharam // GarP_1,51.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3848: anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ puṣṭāṃ godo bradhnasya viṣṭapam // GarP_1,51.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3850: dhānyadaḥ śāvataṃ saukhyaṃ brahmado brahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,51.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3858: yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe // GarP_1,51.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3860: ayena viṣuve caiva grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // GarP_1,51.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3862: prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3868: mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahmahā sa tu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,51.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3869: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3873: brahmahā ca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,52.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3876: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:3877: kuryādanaśanaṃ vātha bhṛgoḥ patanameva ca // GarP_1,52.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3878: jvalantaṃ vā viśedagniṃ jalaṃ vā praviśetsvayam /
GP12garup1_u:3879: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇānparityajet // GarP_1,52.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3880: dattvā cānnaṃ ca viduṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati /
GP12garup1_u:3881: aśvamedhāvabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3885: setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,52.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3887: surāpastu surāṃ pītvā agnivarṇāṃ dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,52.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3889: suvarṇasteyī muktaḥ syānmusalena hato nṛpaiḥ // GarP_1,52.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3894: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryātpañca catvāri vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3895: patitena ca saṃsargaṃ kurute yastu vai dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3899: cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca vidhinā kṛtaṃ caivātikṛcchrakam // GarP_1,52.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3901: amāvasyāṃ tithiṃ prāpya yaḥ samārādhayedbhavam // GarP_1,52.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3907: snātvā nadyāṃ tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3920: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇotsukā /
GP12garup1_u:3921: na tasyā vidyate pāpamiha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,52.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3925: ityāha bhagavānviṣṇuḥ purā mama yatavratāḥ // GarP_1,52.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3926: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3940: dadyācchrutāya maitrīṃ ca yāti nityaṃ ca rājabhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3941: dravyārthaṃ śatruṇā nāśaṃ saṃgrāme cāpi saṃvrajet // GarP_1,53.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3942: makaraḥ kacchapaścaiva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau /
GP12garup1_u:3948: rajastamomayo nandī ādhāraḥ syātkulasya ca // GarP_1,53.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3949: stutaḥ prīto bhavati vai bahubhāryā bhavanti ca /
GP12garup1_u:3950: pūrvamitreṣu śaithilyaṃ prītimanyaiḥ karoti ca // GarP_1,53.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3954: ekasya syānnidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayaṃ bhuṅkte dhanādi(nta)kam // GarP_1,53.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3960: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanidhivarṇanaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3964: medhāmedhātithirbhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putra eva ca // GarP_1,54.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3968: vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānāṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // GarP_1,54.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3970: jalopari mahī yātā maurivāste sarijjale // GarP_1,54.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3972: kuśaḥ krauñcastathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ // GarP_1,54.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3981: nīlaḥ śvetaśca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3982: plakṣādiṣu narā rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ // GarP_1,54.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3986: ramyo hiraṇmayākhyaśca kururbhadrāśva eva ca // GarP_1,54.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3988: nābhestu merudevyāṃ tu putro 'bhūdṛṣabho hara // GarP_1,54.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3989: tatputro bharato nāma śālagrāme sthito vratī /
GP12garup1_u:3994: pṛthuśca tatsuto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3999: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4019: vedasmṛtir narmadā ca varadā surasā śivā // GarP_1,55.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4020: tāpī payoṣṇī sarayūḥ kāverī gomatī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4023: ṛṣikulyā ca kāverī mattagaṅgā payasvinī // GarP_1,55.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4024: vidarbhā ca śatadrūśca nadyaḥ pāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4025: āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ madhyadeśādayo janāḥ // GarP_1,55.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4038: strīrājyāḥ saindhavā mlecchā nāsti kā yavanāstathā /
GP12garup1_u:4039: paścimena ca vijñeyā māthurā naiṣadhaiḥ saha // GarP_1,55.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4047: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4052: sukhodayastathā nandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemaka eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:4053: dhruvaśca saptamasteṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te // GarP_1,56.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4055: somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo baibhrājaścātra saptamaḥ // GarP_1,56.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4056: anutaptā śikhī caiva vipāśā tridivā kramuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4057: amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāstatra nimnagāḥ // GarP_1,56.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4063: yonitoyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukla vimocanī // GarP_1,56.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4065: jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe sapta putrāḥ śṛṇuṣvatān // GarP_1,56.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4077: gaurī kumudvatī caiva sandhyā rātrirmanojavā // GarP_1,56.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4082: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā /
GP12garup1_u:4083: ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā // GarP_1,56.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4087: tāvaccaiva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // GarP_1,56.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4093: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4098: atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ ca gabhastimat /
GP12garup1_u:4099: mahākhyaṃ sutalaṃ cāgryaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam // GarP_1,57.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4101: bhūyastatra daiteyā vasanti ca bhujaṅgamāḥ // GarP_1,57.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4102: raudre tu puṣkaradvīpe narakāḥ santi tāñchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:4105: rudhirākhyo vaitaraṇī kṛmiśaḥ kṛmibho janaḥ // GarP_1,57.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4107: tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālastvadhaḥ śirāḥ // GarP_1,57.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4116: aṇḍaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyāptaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,57.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4117: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4121: yojānānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava // GarP_1,58.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4131: dvitīye 'kṣe tu taccakraṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānasācale // GarP_1,58.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4139: hāhā rathasvanaścaiva jyeṣṭhe bhāno rathe sthitāḥ // GarP_1,58.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4144: pramlocā ca nabhasyete sarpāścārke tu santi vai // GarP_1,58.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4148: suṣeṇo 'nyo dhṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau // GarP_1,58.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4161: viśvāmitrastathā rakṣo yajñāpeto hi phālgune // GarP_1,58.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4163: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvairgoyate puraḥ // GarP_1,58.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4174: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān // GarP_1,58.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4180: svarbhānosturagā hyaṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham // GarP_1,58.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4182: tathā keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau te vātaraṃhasaḥ // GarP_1,58.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4185: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4190: caturlakṣaṃ jyotiṣasya sāraṃ rudrāya sarvadaḥ // GarP_1,59.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4197: sāvitraśca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,59.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4204: vāsavastu tathā ṛkṣaṃ dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4205: tathā śatabhiṣā proktaṃ nakṣatraṃ vāruṇaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4211: pañcamyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā // GarP_1,59.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4213: saptamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare // GarP_1,59.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4216: dvādaśyāṃ ca caturthyāṃ tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4219: puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭhamucyate // GarP_1,59.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4221: aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū // GarP_1,59.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4229: revatī cāśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū // GarP_1,59.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4230: anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4235: rohiṇyārdrāṃ tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā cottarātrayam // GarP_1,59.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4236: vāruṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva nava cordhvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4237: eṣu rājyābhiṣekaṃ ca paṭṭabandhaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,59.24 //
GP12garup1_u:4239: caturtho cāśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā // GarP_1,59.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4240: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tadvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
GP12garup1_u:4241: aśuklā pratipacchreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā // GarP_1,59.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4246: reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā // GarP_1,59.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4248: trayodaśī śukrabhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4250: dvādaśīṃ dahate bhānuḥ śaśī caikādaśīṃ dahet // GarP_1,59.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4251: kujo dahecca daśāmīṃ navamīṃ ca budho dahet /
GP12garup1_u:4252: aṣṭamīṃ dahate jīvaḥ saptamīṃ bhārgavo dahet // GarP_1,59.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4256: meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyāṃ mithune 'ṣṭamī // GarP_1,59.33 //
GP12garup1_u:4257: vṛṣe kumbhe caturtho ca dvādaśī makare tule /
GP12garup1_u:4258: daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanurmone caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4259: etā dagdhā na gantavyaṃ pīḍādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4262: rohiṇyāditrayaṃ jīve śukre puṣyātrayaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4266: kṛttikāsu budhaścaiva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ // GarP_1,59.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4274: bhāge dviśeṣe strīnāśaḥ pusaḥ syādekaśūnyayoḥ // GarP_1,59.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4275: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4276: ṣaḍgaṇḍe cātigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghātavajrayoḥ // GarP_1,59.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4277: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dinedine /
GP12garup1_u:4278: etai mṛtyuyutā hyeṣu sarvakarmāṇi varjayet // GarP_1,59.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4279: haster'kaśca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4280: rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumaṃ somena vai śubham // GarP_1,59.44 //
GP12garup1_u:4281: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4283: bhārgave bhaparaṇī caiva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja / /
GP12garup1_u:4284: bhaume cai vottarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara / // GarP_1,59.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4290: śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hastāśvanīmṛgāstathā // GarP_1,59.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4295: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4298: ṣaḍāditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4299: aṣṭāvaṅgārake cava budhai spatadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,60.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4311: mithunasya budho jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca // GarP_1,60.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4312: sūryakṣetraṃ bhavetsiṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetraṃ budhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:4313: bhārgavasya tulā kṣetraṃ vṛścikoṅgārakasya ca // GarP_1,60.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4317: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe // GarP_1,60.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4329: artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahobhavet // GarP_1,60.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4331: vilikhya ravicakraṃ tu bhāskaro narasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,60.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4335: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekaṃ nābhau pradāpayet // GarP_1,60.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4337: nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravipāde niyojayet // GarP_1,60.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4343: mastake padṛvastraṃ syānnakṣatraṃ yadi sthitam // GarP_1,60.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4344: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍaṃ prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4350: candrasya dvādaśāvasthā bhavanti śṛṇu tā api // GarP_1,61.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4357: pravāso hānimṛnyṛ ca jayo hāseratiḥ sukham // GarP_1,61.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4358: śoko bhogo jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukhaṃ ceti kramātphalam /
GP12garup1_u:4359: janmasthaḥ kurute tuṣṭiṃ dvitīye nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,61.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4361: pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strīlābho vai tathā bhavet // GarP_1,61.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4362: ghanadhānyāgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4365: dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyureva na saṃkhayaḥ // GarP_1,61.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4366: kṛttikādau ca pūrveṇa saptarkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:4369: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau // GarP_1,61.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4372: śukracandrau hi janmasthau śubhadau ca dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:4373: śaśijñaśukrajīvāśca rāśau rāśau cātha tṛtīyake // GarP_1,61.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4376: mandākārai ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe gurucandrau ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4377: jñaśukrāvaṣṭame śreṣṭhau navamastho guruḥ śubhaḥ // GarP_1,61.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4379: budho 'tha dvādaśe caiva bhārgavaḥ sukhado bhavet // GarP_1,61.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4380: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣa uttamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4381: tulayā saha mīnastu kumbhena sahakarkaṭaḥ // GarP_1,61.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4382: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭho mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4385: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇāṃ śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4386: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4393: kūrmonnatau ca caraṇau syātāṃ nṛpavarasya hi // GarP_1,63.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4395: sūrpākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau viralāṅgulī // GarP_1,63.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4396: duḥ khadāridyadau syātā nātra kāryāṃ vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4399: dvedve romṇī paṇḍitānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,63.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4403: viṣamestrīcañcalo vai nṛpaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe same // GarP_1,63.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4407: bhogāḍhyāḥ samajaṭharā niḥ svāḥ syurghaṭasannibhāḥ // GarP_1,63.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4409: lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisro rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ // GarP_1,63.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4410: sukhī putrasamāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭiṃ jīvate naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4417: triśūlaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ vāpi lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
GP12garup1_u:4418: dhanaputra samāyuktaḥ sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4423: madhyamāmūlagā rekhā āyūrekhā ataḥ param // GarP_1,63.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4425: acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4431: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4434: yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśā mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalam /
GP12garup1_u:4435: nābhiśca dakṣiṇāvartā sā kanyā kulavardhinī // GarP_1,64.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4437: sahasrāṇāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ bhavetsāpi pativratā // GarP_1,64.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4438: vakrakeśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍalākṣī ca yā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4439: bhartā ca mriyate tasyā niyataṃ duḥ khabhāginī // GarP_1,64.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4441: viśālanetrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham // GarP_1,64.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4446: streheṣu bhāryā mātā syādveśyā ca śayane śubhā // GarP_1,64.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4447: aṅkuśaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ yasyāḥ pāṇitale bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4448: putraṃ prasūyate nārī narendraṃ labhate patim // GarP_1,64.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4449: yasyāstu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau /
GP12garup1_u:4450: annatau cādharoṣṭhau ca kṣipraṃ mārayate patim // GarP_1,64.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4456: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4458: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4460: tvacaḥ snehena śāyyāṃ ca pādasnehena vāhanam // GarP_1,64.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4464: śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hastikaropamau // GarP_1,64.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4467: aromā trivalī nāryā hṛtstanau romavarjitau // GarP_1,64.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4468: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4476: śū(sar) pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau // GarP_1,65.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4479: vicchittidau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku (pakra) sannibhau /
GP12garup1_u:4484: nṛpāṇāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dvedve śriye ca dhīmatām // GarP_1,65.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4485: tryādyairniḥ svā mānavāḥ syurduḥ svabhājaśca ninditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4486: keśāśca vai kuñcitāśca pravāse mriyate naraḥ // GarP_1,65.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4488: vikaṭaiśca daridrāḥ syuḥ samāṃsai rājyameva ca // GarP_1,65.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4496: balavānyuddhaśīlaśca laghuśektaḥ sa eva ca // GarP_1,65.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4498: samābhyāṃ kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śatābdavān // GarP_1,65.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4506: samaiḥ strīratnadhanino madhye nimnaiśca kanyakāḥ // GarP_1,65.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4508: puṣpagandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhugandhe dhanaṃ bahuḥ // GarP_1,65.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4509: putrāḥ śukre matsyagandhe tanuśukre ca kanyakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4513: māṃsalasphik sukhī syācca siṃhasphik bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4514: bhavetsiṃhakaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapikaṭirnaraḥ // GarP_1,65.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4515: sarpodarā daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiśca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4516: dhanino vipulaiḥ pārśvairniḥ svā raktaiśca nimnagaiḥ // GarP_1,65.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4522: vāmāvartaśca sādhyaṃ vai medhāṃ dakṣiṇatastathā // GarP_1,65.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4524: adho gavāḍhyaṃ kuryācca nṛpatvaṃ padmakarṇikā // GarP_1,65.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4526: trivaliḥ kṣmāpa ācārya ṛjubhirvālibhiḥ sukhī // GarP_1,65.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4532: samonnataṃ ca hṛdayamakampaṃ māṃsalaṃ pṛthu // GarP_1,65.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4544: saṃmāsau caiva bhugnālpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau // GarP_1,65.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4546: niḥ svānāṃ romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau karikara prabhau // GarP_1,65.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4548: medhāvināṃ ca sūkṣmāḥ syurbhṛtyānāṃ cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,65.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4575: śatāyuṣaṃ ca kurute chinnayā taruto bhayam /
GP12garup1_u:4576: niḥ svāśca bahurekhāḥ syunirdravyāścibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ // GarP_1,65.53 //
GP12garup1_u:4580: tīkṣṇā dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhā jihvā raktā samā śubhā // GarP_1,65.55 //
GP12garup1_u:4581: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhanakṣaye /
GP12garup1_u:4582: kṛṣṇe ca paruṣo vakraṃ samaṃ saumyaṃ ca saṃvṛtam // GarP_1,65.56 //
GP12garup1_u:4583: bhūpānāmamalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ viparītaṃ ca duḥ khinām /
GP12garup1_u:4584: mahā duḥ khaṃ durbhagāṇāṃ strīmukhaṃ putramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,65.57 //
GP12garup1_u:4585: āḍhyānāṃ vartulaṃ vakraṃ nirdravyāṇāṃ ca dīrghakam /
GP12garup1_u:4588: sampūrṇaṃ bhogināṃ kāntaṃ śmaśru snigdhaṃ śubhaṃ mṛdu // GarP_1,65.59 //
GP12garup1_u:4600: svalpacchidrau supuṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpeśvare // GarP_1,65.65 //
GP12garup1_u:4601: krūre dakṣiṇavakrā syādvalināṃ ca kṣutaṃ sakṛt /
GP12garup1_u:4602: syādviniṣpiṇḍitaṃ hrādi sānunādaṃ ca jīvakṛt // GarP_1,65.66 //
