GP12garup1_u:4606: jihyaiśca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyo gajalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.68 //
GP12garup1_u:4608: nīlotpa lākṣā vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyaṃ śyāmacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,65.69 //
GP12garup1_u:4610: maṇḍalākṣāśca pāpāḥ syurniḥ svāḥ syurdenalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.70 //
GP12garup1_u:4614: āḍhyo niḥ svaśca khaṇḍabhrṛrmadhye ca vinatabhruvaḥ // GarP_1,65.72 //
GP12garup1_u:4615: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ sutārthe parivarjitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4623: pracurāśrudīnaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca ruditaṃ ca sukhāvaham /
GP12garup1_u:4643: vipulastriṣu gambhīro dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaśca pañcasu // GarP_1,65.86 //
GP12garup1_u:4645: nābhiḥ svaraśca sasattvaṃ ca trayaṃ gambhīramīritam // GarP_1,65.87 //
GP12garup1_u:4647: cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syur nṛpakṛkāṭikāḥ // GarP_1,65.88 //
GP12garup1_u:4648: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam /
GP12garup1_u:4649: pṛṣṭhaṃ catvāri raktāni karatālvadharā nakhāḥ // GarP_1,65.89 //
GP12garup1_u:4653: narāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,65.91 //
GP12garup1_u:4654: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4655: śliṣṭāṅgulī connatāgrau tāṃ pāpya nṛpatirbhavet // GarP_1,65.92 //
GP12garup1_u:4659: jaṅghe ca romarahite suvṛtte viśire śubhe // GarP_1,65.94 //
GP12garup1_u:4661: ūrū karikarākārāvaromau ca samau śubhau // GarP_1,65.95 //
GP12garup1_u:4664: gūḍho maṇiśca śubhado nitambaśca guruḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4667: aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanāvaviṣamau śubhau // GarP_1,65.98 //
GP12garup1_u:4668: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdugrīvā ca kambubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4669: āraktāvadharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalaṃ vartulaṃ mukham // GarP_1,65.99 //
GP12garup1_u:4672: nāsā samā samapuṭā strīṇāṃ tu rucirā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4674: na pṛthū bālendunibhe bhruvau cātha lalāṭakam /
GP12garup1_u:4677: snigdhā nīlāśca mṛdavo mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ // GarP_1,65.103 //
GP12garup1_u:4678: strīṇāṃ samaṃ śiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pāde pāṇitale 'tha vā /
GP12garup1_u:4684: na nimnaṃ nonnataṃ strīṇāṃ bhavetkaratalaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:4686: rekhā yā maṇibandhotthā gatā madhyāṅguliṃ kare // GarP_1,65.107 //
GP12garup1_u:4687: gatā pāṇitale yā ca yordhvapādatale sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:4688: strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ tathā sā syādrājyāya ca sukhāya ca // GarP_1,65.108 //
GP12garup1_u:4695: śubhaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ proktaṃ tvaśubhamanyathā // GarP_1,65.111 //
GP12garup1_u:4696: kaniṣṭhikānāmikā vā yasyā na spṛśate mahīm /
GP12garup1_u:4697: aṅguṣṭhaṃ vā gatātītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā // GarP_1,65.112 //
GP12garup1_u:4700: vāmāvartaṃ nimnamalpaṃ duḥ khitānāṃ ca guhyakam /
GP12garup1_u:4701: grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svā dīrghayā ca kulakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,65.114 //
GP12garup1_u:4703: kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lolekṣaṇā satī // GarP_1,65.115 //
GP12garup1_u:4704: smite kūpe gaṇḍayośca sā dhruvaṃ vyabhicāriṇī /
GP12garup1_u:4705: pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaraṃ hanti cāṅganā // GarP_1,65.116 //
GP12garup1_u:4706: udare śvaśuraṃ hanti patiṃ hanti sphicordvayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4707: yā tu romottarauṣṭhī syānna śubhā bhartureva hi // GarP_1,65.117 //
GP12garup1_u:4708: stanau saromāvaśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4709: karālā viṣamā dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te // GarP_1,65.118 //
GP12garup1_u:4716: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4728: ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktirna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,66.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4729: śālagrāmo dvārakā ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā /
GP12garup1_u:4730: vārāṇasī prayāgaśca kurukṣetraṃ ca sūkaram // GarP_1,66.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4731: gaṅgā ca narmadā caiva candrabhāgā sarasvatī /
GP12garup1_u:4734: prabhavo vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodo 'tha prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,66.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4735: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:4736: īśvaro bahudhānyaśca pramāthī vikramo viṣuḥ // GarP_1,66.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4738: sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ // GarP_1,66.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4740: hemalambo vilaṃbaśca vikāraḥ śarvarī plavaḥ // GarP_1,66.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4743: paridhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso nalaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4746: aśobhanāḥ śobhanāśca nāmnaivaite hi vatsarāḥ // GarP_1,66.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4748: rājā sā(mā) jā udāsā ca pīḍā mṛtyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,66.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4749: ā ī ū ai au svarāṃśca likhetpañcāgnikoṣṭhake /
GP12garup1_u:4751: tithī ekā gnikoṣṭheṣu trayo rājātha sā (mā) jayāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4757: kalāliṅgā ca yā tiṣṭhetpañcamastasya vai mṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4758: kalā tithistathā vāro nakṣatraṃ māsameva ca // GarP_1,66.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4759: nāmodayasya pūrvaṃ ca tathā bhavati nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:4763: trailokyamohanaṃ bījaṃ nṛsiṃhasya tu padma(nna)gam // GarP_1,66.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4765: bhūrje tu dhāritāḥ kaṇṭhe bāhau ceti jayādidāḥ // GarP_1,66.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4766: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4770: hareḥ śrutvā haro gaurīṃ dehasthaṃ jñānamabravīt // GarP_1,67.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4771: kujo vahnī raviḥ pṛthvī saurirāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4776: sthānasevāṃ tathā dhyānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ rājadarśanam // GarP_1,67.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4780: śubhāśubhaviveko hi jñāyate tu svarodayāt // GarP_1,67.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4784: cakravacca sthitāstāstu sarvāḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,67.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4786: vāmā somātmikā proktā dakṣiṇā ravisannibhā // GarP_1,67.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4788: vāmā hyamṛtarūpā ca jagadāpyāyane sthitā // GarP_1,67.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4791: nirgame tu bhavedvāmā praveśe dakṣaiṇā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:4798: śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyāṃ viṣakarmaṇi // GarP_1,67.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4800: dvābhyāṃ caiva pravāhe ca krūrasaumyavivarjane // GarP_1,67.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4804: yuddhādibhojane ghāte strīṇāṃ caiva tu saṃgame // GarP_1,67.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4808: vāmācāre 'thavā dakṣe pratyaye yatra nāyakaḥ // GarP_1,67.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4809: tanusthaḥ pṛcchate yastu tatra siddhirna saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4810: vaicchando vāmadevastu yadā vahati cātmani // GarP_1,67.21 //
GP12garup1_u:4812: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra saṃkramate śivā // GarP_1,67.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4813: ghore ghorāṇi kāryāṇi saumye vai madhyamāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:4814: prasthite bhāgato haṃse dvābhyāṃ vai sarvavāhinī // GarP_1,67.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4818: agrato vāmikā śreṣṭhā pṛṣṭhato dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4819: vāmena vāmikā proktā dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4820: vāme vāmā śubhe caiva dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4821: jīvo jīvati jīvena yacchūnyaṃ tastvaro bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4825: yāvatṣaṣṭhī tu pṛcchāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ prathamo jayet /
GP12garup1_u:4828: pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣamākṣaram // GarP_1,67.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4829: anyatra vāmavāhe tu nāma vai viṣamākṣaram /
GP12garup1_u:4832: jā(ja) yate nātra sandeho nāḍīmaghye tu lakṣayet // GarP_1,67.32 //
GP12garup1_u:4835: na dātuṃ jāyate so 'pi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4836: atha saṃgrāmamadhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet // GarP_1,67.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4837: sā diśā jayamāpnoti śūnye bhaṅgaṃ vinirdiśet /
GP12garup1_u:4839: jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4840: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra sañcarate śivam // GarP_1,67.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4842: śaśisūryapravāhe tu sati yuddhaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,67.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4844: yāṃ diśaṃ vahate vāyustāṃ diśaṃ yāvadājayaḥ // GarP_1,67.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4845: jāyate nātra sandeha handro yadyagrataḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4846: meṣyādyā daśa yā nāḍyo dakṣiṇā vāma saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_1,67.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4848: nirgame nirgamaṃ yāti saṃgrahe saṃgrahaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,67.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4850: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi pañcatattvasthitaḥ śive // GarP_1,67.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4852: madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā // GarP_1,67.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4854: madhye stambhaṃ vijānīyānmokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage // GarP_1,67.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4855: iti śrīgāruḍemahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4859: indrādyā nirjitāstena vijetuṃ tairna śakyate // GarP_1,68.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4871: yadyatpapāta ratnānāṃ bījaṃ kracana kiñcana // GarP_1,68.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4872: mahodadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane 'pi vā /
GP12garup1_u:4875: prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathaiva viguṇāni ca // GarP_1,68.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4880: ākāravarṇau prathamaṃ guṇadoṣau tatphalaṃ parīkṣā ca /
GP12garup1_u:4885: dhāraṇaṃ saṃgraho vāpi kāryaḥ śriyamabhīpsatā // GarP_1,68.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4887: ta eva mūlyamātrāyā vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,68.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4890: tasyāsthileśo nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcideva /
GP12garup1_u:4894: ātāmrā himaśailajāśca śaśibhā veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tvasitābjameghasadṛśāstābhrāśca saurāṣṭrajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4895: kāliṅgāḥ kana kāvadātarucirāḥ pītaprabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍrabhavā mataṅgaviṣaye nātyantapītaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,68.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4897: loke 'sminparāmāṇumātramapi yadvajraṃ kraciddṛśyate tasmindevasamāśrayo hyavitathastīkṣṇāgradhāraṃ yadi // GarP_1,68.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4904: dvau vajravarṇau pṛthivīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau /
GP12garup1_u:4905: yaḥ syājjavāvidrumabhaṅgaśoṇo yo vā haridrārasannikāśaḥ // GarP_1,68.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4909: tataḥ kaṣṭataro vajravarṇānāṃ saṅkaro mataḥ // GarP_1,68.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4910: na ca mārgavibhāgamātravṛttyā viduṣā vajraparigraho vidheyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4912: ekamapi yasya śṛṅgaṃ vidalitamavalokyate viśīrṇaṃ vā /
GP12garup1_u:4913: guṇavadapi tanna dhāryaṃ vajraṃ śreyo 'rthibhirbhavane // GarP_1,68.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4915: na hi vajrabhṛto 'pi vajramāśu śriyamapyāśrayalālasāṃ na kuryāt // GarP_1,68.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4917: na tanna kuryāddhriyamāṇamāśu svacchandamṛtyorapi jīvitāntam // GarP_1,68.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4918: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāśca ṣaḍaṣṭau dvādaśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:4920: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvamamalaṃ sphuṭatīkṣṇadhāraṃ varṇānvitaṃ laghu supārśvamapetadoṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4922: tīkṣṇāgraṃ vimalamapetasarvadoṣaṃ dhatte yaḥ prayatatanuḥ sadaiva vajram /
GP12garup1_u:4927: maṇiśāstravido vadanti tasya dviguṇaṃ rūpakalakṣamagramūlyam // GarP_1,68.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4930: yattaṇḍulairdvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ pradiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:4937: sva (sa) mūlyāddaśamaṃ bhāgaṃ vajraṃ labhati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,68.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4939: sva (su) mūlyācchataśo bhāgo vajrasya na vidhīyate // GarP_1,68.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4941: ratnānāṃ parikarmārthaṃ mūlyaṃ tasya bhavellaghu // GarP_1,68.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4942: prathamaṃ guṇasampadābhyupetaṃ pratibaddhaṃ samupaiti yacca doṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4943: alamābharaṇena tasya rājño guṇahīno 'pi maṇirna bhūṣaṇāya // GarP_1,68.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4949: parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ suparīkṣakaiḥ // GarP_1,68.45 //
GP12garup1_u:4951: pṛthivyāṃ yāni ratnāni ye cānye lohadhātavaḥ // GarP_1,68.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4955: jātirajātiṃ vilikhati jātiṃ vilikhanti vajrakuruvindāḥ // GarP_1,68.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4957: vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayo ye ca kecana jātayaḥ // GarP_1,68.49 //
GP12garup1_u:4964: saudā minīvisphuritābhirāmaṃ rājā yathoktaṃ kaliśaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4966: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4970: muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣāṃ ca śuktyudbhavameva bhūri // GarP_1,69.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4971: tatraiva caikasya hi mūlamātra niviśyate ratnapadasya jātu /
GP12garup1_u:4972: vedhyaṃ tu śuktayudbhavameva teṣāṃ śeṣāṇyavedhyāni vadanti tajjñāḥ // GarP_1,69.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4974: prāyo vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalyatayā tathāpi // GarP_1,69.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4976: kambūdbhavaṃ teṣvadhamaṃ pradiṣṭamutpadyate yacca gajendrakumbhāt // GarP_1,69.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4980: mataṅgajāścāpi viśuddhavaṃśyāste mauktikānāṃ prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ // GarP_1,69.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4982: pāṭhīnapṛṣṭhasya samānavarṇaṃ mīnātsuvṛttaṃ laghu cātisūkṣmam // GarP_1,69.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4983: utpadyate vāricarānaneṣu matsyāśce te madhyacarāḥ payodheḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4987: te veṇavo divyajanopabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye /
GP12garup1_u:4990: prāpyātiratnāni mahāprabhāṇi rājyaṃ śriyaṃ vā mahatīṃ durāpām // GarP_1,69.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4992: jijñāsayā ratnadhanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ śubhemuhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt // GarP_1,69.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4993: rakṣāvidhānaṃ sumahadvidhāya harmyopariṣṭhaṃ kriyate yadā tat /
GP12garup1_u:4996: na taṃ bhujaṅgā na tu yātudhānā na vyādhayo nāpyupasargadoṣāḥ // GarP_1,69.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4997: hiṃsanti yasyāhiśiraḥ samutthaṃ muktāphalaṃ tiṣṭhati kośamadhye /
GP12garup1_u:4998: nābhyeti meghaprabhavaṃ dharitrīṃ vipradgataṃ tadvibudhā haranti // GarP_1,69.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5001: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaraṃ tathaiva tamo 'vagāḍhāsvapi tanniśāsu /
GP12garup1_u:5003: mūlyaṃ na vā syāditi niścayo me kṛtsnā mahī tasya muvarṇapūrṇā /
GP12garup1_u:5005: sāpatnyahīnāṃ sa mahīṃ samagrāṃ bhunakti tattiṣṭhati yāvadeva /
GP12garup1_u:5006: na kevalaṃ tacchubhakṛnnṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānāmapi tasya janma // GarP_1,69.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5008: nakṣatramāleva divo viśīrṇā dantāvalistasya mahāmurasya // GarP_1,69.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5009: vicitravarṇeṣu viśuddhavarṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasāṃ papāta /
GP12garup1_u:5018: cintyā na tasyākarajā viśeṣā rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān /
GP12garup1_u:5019: na ca vyavasthāsti guṇāguṇeṣu sarvatra sarvākṛtayo bhavanti // GarP_1,69.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5021: mūlyaṃ sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇāṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyādhikāni pañca // GarP_1,69.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5023: yanmāṣakāṃstrīnbibhṛyātsahasre dve tasya mūlyaṃ paramaṃ pradiṣṭam // GarP_1,69.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5024: ardhādhikau dvau vahato 'sya mūlyaṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyadhikaṃ sahasram /
GP12garup1_u:5025: dvimāṣa konmānitagauravasya śatāni cāṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam // GarP_1,69.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5026: ardhādhikaṃ māṣakamunmitasya samaṃ ca viṃśatritayaṃ śatānām /
GP12garup1_u:5027: guñjāśca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyaṃ paraṃ tasya vadanti tajjñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5029: kṛtaṃ śataṃ syānmūlyaṃ guṇaistasya samanvitasya // GarP_1,69.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5031: adhikaṃ daśabhiḥ śataṃ ca mūlyaṃ samavāpnotyapi bāliśasya hastāt // GarP_1,69.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5033: navasaptatimāpnuyātsvamūlyaṃ yadi na syādguṇasampadā vihīnam // GarP_1,69.31 //
GP12garup1_u:5034: triṃśatā dharaṇaṃ pūrṇaṃ śikyaṃ tasyeti kīrtyate /
GP12garup1_u:5037: pañcāśattu bhavetsomastasya mūlyaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ // GarP_1,69.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5042: ghṛṣṭaṃ tato mṛdutanūkṛtapiṇḍamūlaiḥ kuryādyatheṣṭamanu mauktikamāśu viddham // GarP_1,69.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5043: mṛlliptamatsyapuṭamadhyagataṃ tu kṛtvā paścātpacettanu tataśca biḍālapuṭyā /
GP12garup1_u:5044: dugdhe tataḥ payasi taṃ vipacetsudhāyāṃ pakraṃ tato 'pi payasā śucicikraṇena // GarP_1,69.36 //
GP12garup1_u:5046: vyāḍirjagāda jagatāṃ hi mahāprabhāvaḥ siddho vidagdhahitatatparayā dayāluḥ // GarP_1,69.37 //
GP12garup1_u:5049: evaṃ hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5054: sitaṃ pramāṇavatsnigdhaṃ guru svacchaṃ sunirmalam // GarP_1,69.41 //
GP12garup1_u:5055: tejo 'dhikaṃ suvṛttaṃ ca mauktikaṃ guṇavatsmṛtam // GarP_1,69.42 //
GP12garup1_u:5058: evaṃ samastena guṇodayena yanmauktikaṃ yogamupāgataṃ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5059: na tasya bhartāramanarthajāta eko 'pi kaścit samupaiti doṣaḥ // GarP_1,69.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5060: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanaṃ nāma muktāphalaparīkṣā nāmaikonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5064: asṛggṛhītvā carituṃ pratasthe nistriṃśanīlena nabhaḥ sthalena // GarP_1,70.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5066: laṅkādhipenārdhapathe sametya svarbhānuneva prasabhaṃ niruddhaḥ // GarP_1,70.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5071: tataḥ prabhṛtyeva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnairnicitāni tasyāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5078: sāṃdre 'pi rāge prabhayā svayaiva bhānti svalakṣyāḥ sphuṭamadhyaśobhāḥ // GarP_1,70.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5084: anye punaḥ santi ca puṣpitānāṃ tulyatviṣā kokanadottamānām // GarP_1,70.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5087: kāmaṃ tu rāgaḥ kuruvindajeṣu sa naiva yādṛk sphaṭikodbhaveṣu /
GP12garup1_u:5088: nirarciṣo 'ntarbahulā bhavanti prabhāvavanto 'pi nataiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5092: na jāyante hi ye kecinmūlyaleśamavāpnuyuḥ // GarP_1,70.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5094: sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante svalpamūlyā hi te smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,70.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5096: arciṣmattā mahattā ca maṇīnāṃ guṇasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,70.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5098: na te praśastā maṇayo bhavanti samānato jātiguṇaiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5106: kārṣṇyāttathā siṃhaladeśajātaṃ muktābhidhānaṃ nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt // GarP_1,70.22 //
GP12garup1_u:5108: yastāmrikāṃ puṣyati padmarāgo yogāttuṣāṇāmiva pūrṇamadhyaḥ // GarP_1,70.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5109: strehapradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaśca yo vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim /
GP12garup1_u:5110: ākrāntamūrdhā ca tathāṅgulibhyāṃ yaḥ kālikāṃ pārśvagatāṃ bibharti // GarP_1,70.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5112: tulyapramāṇasya ca tulyajāteryo vā gurutvena bhavettu tulyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5113: prāpyāpi ratnākarajā svajātiṃ lakṣedgurutvena guṇena vidvān // GarP_1,70.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5116: vajraṃ vā kuruvindaṃ vā vimucyānena kenacit /
GP12garup1_u:5118: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇerna jātu vijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5119: tathāpi nānākaraṇārthameva bhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,70.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5120: guṇopapannena sahāvabaddhomeṇirna dhāryo viguṇo hi jātyā /
GP12garup1_u:5121: na kaustubhenāpi sahāvabaddhaṃ vidvānvijātiṃ bibhṛyātkadācit // GarP_1,70.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5122: cāṇḍāla eko 'pi yathā dvijātīnsametya bhūrīnapi hantyayatnāt /
GP12garup1_u:5125: na padmarāgasya mahāguṇasya bhartāramāpatspṛśatīha kācit // GarP_1,70.31 //
GP12garup1_u:5127: guṇaiḥ samuttejitacārurāgaṃ yaḥ padmarāgaṃ prayato bibharti // GarP_1,70.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5132: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5136: dvidhā kurvanniva vyoma satvaraṃ vāsukiryayau // GarP_1,71.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5145: tatraiva kiñcitpatatastu pittādupetya jagrāha tato garutmān /
GP12garup1_u:5146: mūrchāparītaḥ sahasaiva ghoṇārandhradvayena pramumoca sarvam // GarP_1,71.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5148: kalhāraśaṣpakabhujaṅgabhujāñca patraprāptatviṣo marakatāḥ śubhadā bhavanti // GarP_1,71.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5150: tasyākarasyātitarāṃ sa deśo duḥ khopalabhyaśca guṇaiśca yuktaḥ // GarP_1,71.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5159: yuktaṃ saṃsthānaguṇaiḥ samarāgaṃ gauraveṇa na vihīnam /
GP12garup1_u:5168: tadapi guṇavatsaṃjñāmāpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam // GarP_1,71.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5172: śreyaskāmairna taddhāryaṃ kretavyaṃ vā katañcana // GarP_1,71.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5175: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptiṃ tyajati putrikā /
GP12garup1_u:5176: lāghavenaiva kācasya śakyā kartuṃ vibhāvanā // GarP_1,71.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5179: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santyanye ye ca keciddvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5188: saṃgrāme vicaradbhiśca dhāryaṃ marakataṃ budhaiḥ // GarP_1,71.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5193: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5197: deśe papāta ditijasya nitāntakāntaṃ protphullanīrajasamadyuti netrayugmam // GarP_1,72.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5208: tata eva hi jāyante maṇayastatra bhūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5215: ta eva pratyayā dṛṣṭā indranīlamaṇerapi // GarP_1,72.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5223: kathitā vijātaya ime sadṛśā maṇinendranīlena // GarP_1,72.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5231: nīlatāṃ tannayetsarvaṃ mahānīlaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,72.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5233: tadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyātu litasya mūlyam // GarP_1,72.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5234: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma dvisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5238: parīkṣāṃ brahmaṇā proktāṃ vyāsena kathitāṃ dvijā // GarP_1,73.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5250: cāṣāgrapakṣapratimaśriyo ye na te praśastā maṇiśāstravidbhiḥ // GarP_1,73.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5258: tadeva vaidūryamaṇeḥ pradiṣṭaṃ paladvayonmāpi tagauravasya // GarP_1,73.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5259: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇestu yādṛgvijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5261: sukhopalakṣyaśca sadā vicāryo hyayaṃ prabhedo viduṣā nareṇa /
GP12garup1_u:5262: snehaprabhedo laghutā mṛdutvaṃ vijātiliṅgaṃ khalu sārvajanyam // GarP_1,73.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5266: yadi nāma bhavanti doṣahīnā maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇamāpnuvanti mūlyam // GarP_1,73.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5268: mūlyametanmaṇīnāṃ tu na sarvatra mahītale // GarP_1,73.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5270: tasya saptatimo bhāgaḥ saṃjñārūpaṃ kariṣyati // GarP_1,73.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5272: palasya daśamo bhāgo dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,73.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5273: itthaṃ maṇividhiḥ prokto ratnānāṃ mūlyaniścaye // GarP_1,73.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5274: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5281: kaukaṇṭakanāmā syātsa eva yadi lohitāpītaḥ // GarP_1,74.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5282: ālohitastu pītaḥ svacchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ sa ekoktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5285: atyantalohito yaḥ sa eva khalu padmarāgasaṃjñaḥ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5286: api cendranīlasaṃjñaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ sunīlaḥ san // GarP_1,74.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5288: dhāraṇaphalaṃ ca tadvatkiṃ tu strīṇāṃ sutaprado bhavati // GarP_1,74.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5289: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5293: tataḥ prasūtaṃ pavanopapannaṃ karketanaṃ pūjayatamaṃ pṛthivyām // GarP_1,75.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5295: nīlaṃ punaḥ khalu sitaṃ paruṣaṃ vibhinnaṃ vyādhyādidoṣakaraṇena ca tadvibhāti // GarP_1,75.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5296: snigdhā viśuddhāḥ samarāgiṇaśca āpītavarṇā guravo vicitrāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5298: patreṇa kāñcanamayena tu veṣṭayitvā taptaṃ yadā hutavahe bhavati prakāśam /
GP12garup1_u:5299: rogapraṇāśanakaraṃ kalināśanaṃ tadāyuṣkaraṃ kulakaraṃ ca sukhapradaṃ ca // GarP_1,75.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5300: evaṃvidhaṃ bahuguṇaṃ maṇimāvahanti karketanaṃ śubhalaṅkṛtaye narā ye /
GP12garup1_u:5301: te pūjitā bahudhanā bahubāndhavāśca nityojjvalāḥ pramuditā apite bhavanti // GarP_1,75.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5303: tejo 'tidīpti kulapuṣṭivihīnavarṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśaṃ vapurudvahanti // GarP_1,75.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5305: tasyottamasya maṇi śāstravidāṃ mahimnā tulyaṃ tu mūlyamuditaṃ tulitasya kāryam // GarP_1,75.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5306: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5314: bhīṣmamaṇiṃ grīvādiṣu susampadaṃ sa sarvadā labhate // GarP_1,76.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5326: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5329: puṇyeṣu parvatavareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthānāntareṣu ca tathottaradeśagatvāt /
GP12garup1_u:5330: saṃsthāpitāḥ svanakhabāhugateḥ prakāśaṃ saṃpūjya dānavapatiṃ prathite pradeśe // GarP_1,77.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5333: gandharvavahnikadalīsadṛśāvabhāsā ete praśastāḥ pulakāḥ prasūtāḥ // GarP_1,77.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5336: maṅgalyayuktā bahubhakticitrā vṛddhipradāste pulakā bhavanti // GarP_1,77.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5338: mṛtyupradāśca viduṣā parivarjanīyā mūlyaṃ palasya kathitaṃ ca śatāni pañca // GarP_1,77.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5339: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5347: madhyendupāṇḍuramatīva viśuddhavarṇaṃ taccendranīlasadṛśaṃ paṭalaṃ tule syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5348: saiśvaryabhṛtyajananaṃ kathitaṃ tadaiva pakrañca tatkila bhavetsuravajravarṇam // GarP_1,78.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5349: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5357: saṃskṛtaṃ śilpinā sadyo mūlyaṃ kiñcillabhettataḥ (dā) // GarP_1,79.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5358: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikonāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5362: cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ subhahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,80.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5364: sunīlakaṃ devakaromakañca sthānāni teṣu prabhavaṃ surāgam // GarP_1,80.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5365: anyatra jātaṃ ca na tatpradhānaṃ mūlyaṃ bhavecchilpiviśeṣayogāt /
GP12garup1_u:5366: prasannaṃ komalaṃ snigdhaṃ surāgaṃ vidrumaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,80.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5370: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5376: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgātriṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā // GarP_1,81.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5378: prayāgaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhuktimuktidam // GarP_1,81.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5380: vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ viśveśo yatra keśavaḥ // GarP_1,81.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5382: prabhāsaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ somanātho hi tatra ca // GarP_1,81.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5384: prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvataṃ param // GarP_1,81.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5388: śvetadvīpaṃ purī māyā naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:5389: ayodhyā cārghyatīrthaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ ca gomatī // GarP_1,81.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5396: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā /
GP12garup1_u:5397: ekāmraṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ brahmeśaṃ devakoṭakam // GarP_1,81.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5398: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaścaiva mahānadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5399: jambūsaro mahātīrthaṃ tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca // GarP_1,81.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5400: sūryaḥ śivo gaṇo devī hariryatra ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:5401: eteṣu ca yathānyeṣu snānaṃ dānaṃ japastapaḥ // GarP_1,81.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5402: pūjā śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5403: śālagrāmaṃ sarvadaṃ syāttīrthaṃ paśupateḥ param // GarP_1,81.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5409: puṇḍravardhanakaṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaśca yatra ca // GarP_1,81.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5411: mahendraparvatastīrthaṃ kāverī ca nadī parā // GarP_1,81.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5413: vindhyaḥ pāpaharaṃ tīrthaṃ narmadābheda uttamaḥ // GarP_1,81.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5414: gokarṇaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ māhiṣmatī purī /
GP12garup1_u:5416: kṛte śauce muktidaṃ ca śārṅgadhārī tadantike /
GP12garup1_u:5417: virajaṃ sarvadaṃ tīrthaṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tīrthamuttamam // GarP_1,81.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5419: nāsikyaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ govardhanamataḥ param // GarP_1,81.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5421: tīrthaṃ bindusaraḥ puṇyaṃ viṣṇupādodakaṃ param // GarP_1,81.22 //
GP12garup1_u:5423: damastīrthaṃ tu paramaṃ bhavaśuddhiḥ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,81.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5425: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,81.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5426: idaṃ tīrthamidaṃ neti ye narā bhedadarśinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5427: teṣāṃ vidhīyate tīrthagamanaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,81.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5431: śrīraṅgaṃ ca harestīrthaṃ tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī // GarP_1,81.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5433: mahālakṣmīryatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī // GarP_1,81.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5436: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavenna punarbhave /
GP12garup1_u:5438: etānyanyāni tīrthāni snānādyaiḥ sarvadāni hi // GarP_1,81.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5442: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5452: śaraṇaṃ harirūce tān bhavitavyaṃ śivātmabhaiḥ // GarP_1,82.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5458: tasya deho liṅgarūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,82.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5461: yajñaṃ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ snānādi kurute naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5462: sa svargaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchenna narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,82.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5463: gayātīrthaṃ paraṃ jñātvā yāgaṃ cakre pitāmahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5470: mā bhūttraipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūttraipuruṣaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,82.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5473: lokāḥ puṇyā gayāyāṃ hi śrāddhino brahmalokagāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5474: yuṣmānye pūjayiṣyanti tairahaṃ pūjitaḥ sadā // GarP_1,82.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5476: vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktireṣā caturvidhā // GarP_1,82.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5478: snātukāmā gayātīrthaṃ vyāsa yāsa yānti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,82.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5481: asaṃskṛtā mṛtā ya ca paśucorahatāśca ye /
GP12garup1_u:5482: sarpadaṣṭā gayāśrāddhānmuktāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_1,82.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5484: na tacchakyaṃ mayā vaktuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi // GarP_1,82.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5485: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5488: kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ vanam /
GP12garup1_u:5489: viṣayaścāraṇaḥ puṇyo nadīnāṃ ca punaḥ punā // GarP_1,83.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5499: taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt // GarP_1,83.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5501: kāleśvaraṃ ca kedāraṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5503: lokaṃ tvanāmayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,83.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5505: taṃ praṇamya prayatnena na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5507: dṛṣṭvā maunena viprarṣe pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5509: gāyattrīṃ pratarutthāya yastu paśyati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,83.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5511: sāvitrīṃ caiva madhyāhne dṛṣṭvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5512: sarasvatīṃ ca sāyāhne dṛṣṭvā dānaphalaṃ labhet /
GP12garup1_u:5515: devaṃ gṛdhreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,83.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5517: prabhāseśaṃ prabhāse ca dṛṣṭvā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_1,83.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5521: brahmeśvaraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,83.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5523: phalgvīśaṃ phalgucaṇḍīṃ ca gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalām // GarP_1,83.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5525: aṅgāreśaṃ ca siddheśaṃ gayādityaṃ gajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,83.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5527: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,83.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5528: etena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ nṝṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām /
GP12garup1_u:5530: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthānī ye samudrāḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12garup1_u:5532: pṛthivyāṃ ca gayā puṇyā gayāyāṃ ca gayāśiraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5533: śreṣṭhaṃ tathā phalgutīrthaṃ tanmukhaṃ ca surasya hi // GarP_1,83.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5539: koṭitītha gayālole vaitaraṇyāṃ ca gomake // GarP_1,83.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5543: uttare mānase śrāddhī na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5547: gṛdhreśvare tathā śrāddhī pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5549: tiladhenupradaḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā dhenuṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5550: aindre vā naratīrthe ca vāsave vaiṣṇave tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5552: gāyattre caiva sāvitre tīrthe sārasvate tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5554: pitṝṇāṃ tu kulaṃ brahmalokaṃ nayati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5559: dharmayūpe ca kūpe ta pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5562: rāmatīrthe narāḥ snātvā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsake /
GP12garup1_u:5566: gayāyāṃ na hi tatsthānaṃ yatra tīrthaṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5567: pañcakrośe gayākṣetre yatra tatra tu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5569: janārdanasya haste tu piṇḍaṃ dadyātsvakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,83.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5570: eṣa piṇḍe mayā dattastava haste janārdana / /
GP12garup1_u:5573: gayāyāṃ dharmapṛṣṭhe ca sarasi brahmaṇastathā // GarP_1,83.42 //
GP12garup1_u:5577: brahmāraṇyaṃ mahānadyāḥ paścimo bhāga ucyate // GarP_1,83.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5579: bharatasyāśrame śrāddhī mataṅgasya pade bhavet // GarP_1,83.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5581: tatsmṛtaṃ campakavanaṃ tatra pāṇḍuśilāsti hi // GarP_1,83.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5585: padāni tatra krauñcasya śrāddhī svargaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.48 //
GP12garup1_u:5591: sāvitre paṭhyate sandhyā kṛtā syāddvādaśābdikī // GarP_1,83.51 //
GP12garup1_u:5592: śuklakṛṣṇāvubhau pakṣau gayāyāṃ yo vasennaraḥ punātyāsaptamaṃ caiva kulaṃ nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.52 //
GP12garup1_u:5593: gayāyāṃ muṇāḍapṛṣṭhaṃ ca aravindaṃ ca parvatam /
GP12garup1_u:5594: tṛtīyaṃ kraiñcapādaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,83.53 //
GP12garup1_u:5596: durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gayāyāṃ piṇḍapātanam // GarP_1,83.54 //
GP12garup1_u:5600: yatra māheśvarī dhārā śrāddhī tatrānṛṇo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5601: puṇyāṃ viśālāmāsādya nadīṃ trailokya viśrutām // GarP_1,83.56 //
GP12garup1_u:5603: śrāddhī māsapade snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.57 //
GP12garup1_u:5605: gayāstho yo dadātyannaṃ pitarastena putriṇaḥ // GarP_1,83.58 //
GP12garup1_u:5609: pabhdyāmapi jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā asmabhyaṃ kila dāsyati // GarP_1,83.60 //
GP12garup1_u:5610: ātmajo vā tathānyo vā gayākūpe yadā tadā /
GP12garup1_u:5611: yannāmnā pātayetpiṇḍaṃ taṃ nayedbrahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,83.61 //
GP12garup1_u:5613: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā // GarP_1,83.62 //
GP12garup1_u:5619: teṣāṃ brahmasadaḥ sthānaṃ somapānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,83.65 //
GP12garup1_u:5621: pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ // GarP_1,83.66 //
GP12garup1_u:5623: sthānaṃ dehaparityāge gayāyāṃ tu vidhīyate // GarP_1,83.67 //
GP12garup1_u:5625: agniṣṭomaśataṃ puṇyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.68 //
GP12garup1_u:5629: tebhyo vyāsagayābhūmau piṇḍo deyo vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,83.70 //
GP12garup1_u:5631: mataṅgavāpyāṃ snātvā ca gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.71 //
GP12garup1_u:5633: vasiṣṭhasyāśrame snātvā vājapeyaṃ ca vindati // GarP_1,83.72 //
GP12garup1_u:5636: samīpe tvagnidhāreti viśrutā kapilā hi sā /
GP12garup1_u:5640: somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā somalokaṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:5641: saṃvartasya naro vāpyāṃ subhagaḥ syāttu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.76 //
GP12garup1_u:5642: dhautapāpo naro yāti pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5646: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma tryaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5649: udyatastu gayāṃ gantuṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5656: varjayitvā kurukṣetraṃ viśālāṃ virajāṃ gayām // GarP_1,84.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5657: divā ca sarvadā rātrau gayāyāṃ śrāddhakṛdbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5658: vārāṇasyāṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrthe śoṇanade tathā // GarP_1,84.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5660: uttaraṃ mānasaṃ gatvā siddhiṃ prāpnotyanuttamām // GarP_1,84.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5662: kāmānsa labhate divyānmokṣopāyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,84.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5663: dakṣiṇaṃ mānasaṃ gatvā maunī piṇḍādi kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:5667: nāmnā kanakhalaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:5669: tatra snātvā divaṃ yāti śrāddhaṃ dattamathākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5674: madīyāḥ pitaro ye ca kule jātāḥ sanābhayaḥ // GarP_1,84.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5678: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,84.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5684: śrāddhaṃ piṇḍodakaṃ kāryaṃ madhye vai kūpayūpayoḥ // GarP_1,84.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5686: tṛtīye 'bahni brahmasado gatvā snātvātha tarpaṇam // GarP_1,84.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5687: kṛtvā śrāddhādikaṃ piṇḍaṃ madhye vai yūpakūpayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5696: anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ mṛtavāsare // GarP_1,84.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5697: atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddhamanyatra patinā saha /
GP12garup1_u:5698: snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devaṃ pitāmaham // GarP_1,84.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5699: rudrapādaṃ naraḥ spṛṣṭvā na cehāvartate punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5703: pitaro yānti devatvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:5704: muṇḍapṛṣṭe padaṃ nyastaṃ mahādevena dhīmatā // GarP_1,84.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5706: gayāśīrṣe tu yaḥ piṇḍānnāmnā yeṣāṃ tu nirvapet // GarP_1,84.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5708: pañcame 'hni gandālole snātvā vaṭatale tataḥ // GarP_1,84.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5712: kṛte śrāddhe 'kṣayavaṭe dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,84.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5714: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ puttrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,84.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5724: gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,84.38 //
GP12garup1_u:5726: dṛṣṭvākāśe sitaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puruṣamabravīt // GarP_1,84.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5727: ke yūyaṃ teṣu caivaikaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakam /
GP12garup1_u:5728: ahaṃ sitaste janaka indralokaṃ gataḥ śabham // GarP_1,84.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5729: mama putra pitā rakto brahmahā pāpakṛtparam /
GP12garup1_u:5730: ayaṃ pitāmahaḥ kṛṣṇa ṛṣayo 'nena ghātitāḥ // GarP_1,84.41 //
GP12garup1_u:5731: avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptau muktau jātau ca piṇḍada /
GP12garup1_u:5733: kṛtakṛtyo viśālo 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ yayau /
GP12garup1_u:5736: yeṣāṃ dāho na kriyāca ye 'gnidagdhāstathāpare // GarP_1,84.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5737: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:5740: tathā mātāmahaścaiva pramātāmaha eva ca // GarP_1,84.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5744: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5749: asmatkule mṛtā ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5751: pitavaṃśe mṛtā ye ca mātṛvaṃśe ca ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5753: mātāmahakule ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5755: ajātadantā ye kecidye ca garbhe prapīḍitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5758: svagotre paragotre vā gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5761: ātmopaghātino ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5763: daṃṣṭribhiḥ śṛṅgibhirvāpi teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5765: vidyuccaurahatā ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5766: raurave cāndhatāmistre kālasūtre ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5768: asipatravane ghore kaṃbhīpāke ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5773: athavā vṛkṣayoni sthāstebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5777: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ yeṣāṃ tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5781: te sarve tṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā // GarP_1,85.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5782: ye me pitṛkule jātāḥ kule mātustathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:5783: guruśvaśurabandhūnāṃ ye cānye bāndhavā mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,85.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5785: kriyālo pahatā ye ca jātyandhāḥ paṅgavastathā // GarP_1,85.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5789: maya gayāṃ samāsādya pitṝṇāṃ niṣkatiḥ kṛtā // GarP_1,85.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5795: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5798: yeyaṃ pretaśilā khyātā gayāyāṃ sā tridhā sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:5801: pretatvaṃ ye gatā nṝṇāṃ mitrādyā bāndhavādayaḥ // GarP_1,86.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5803: ato 'tra munayo bhūpā rājapatnyādayaḥ sadā // GarP_1,86.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5805: gayāsurasya yanmuṇḍaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhe śilā yataḥ // GarP_1,86.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5811: gadādharādayo devā ādyā ādau vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_1,86.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5819: yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kṛṣṇobuddho 'tha kalkyapi // GarP_1,86.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5823: gadādharaṃ suraiḥ sārdhamādyaṃ gatvā dadāti yaḥ // GarP_1,86.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5824: arghyaṃ pātraṃ ca pādyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
GP12garup1_u:5825: dīpaṃ naivaidyamutkaṣṭaṃ mālyāni vividhāni ca // GarP_1,86.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5835: jñānaṃ prāpya śriyaṃ putrānvrajanti puruṣottamam // GarP_1,86.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5844: vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ prārcya lakṣmīṃ saṃpūjya ca śriyam /
GP12garup1_u:5851: subhadrāṃ pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyaṃ paramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5853: nārāyaṇaṃ tu saṃpūjya narāṇāmadhipo bhavet // GarP_1,86.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5854: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃhaṃ saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5861: brahmeśvaraṃ naraḥ stutvā brahmalokāya kalpyate // GarP_1,86.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5863: kedāraṃ pūjayitvā tu śivaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,86.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5864: siddheśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya siddho brahmapuraṃ vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:5865: ādyai rudrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyādigadādharam // GarP_1,86.34 //
GP12garup1_u:5871: putrānputrārthinī strī ca saubhāgyaṃ ca tadarthinī // GarP_1,86.37 //
GP12garup1_u:5875: pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthebhyo yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī // GarP_1,86.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5877: tasmindṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yataḥ sarvaṃ gadādharaḥ // GarP_1,86.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5878: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5889: sa hato viṣṇunā daityaścakreṇa sumahātmanā // GarP_1,87.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5891: citrako vinataścaiva karṇānto vidyuto raviḥ // GarP_1,87.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5893: ūrja stambastathā prāṇa ṛṣabho niścala (ra) stathā // GarP_1,87.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5895: tuṣitā dvādaśa proktāstathā pārāvatāśca ye // GarP_1,87.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5899: vinītaśca suketuśca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,87.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5905: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:5906: indraḥ svaśāntistacchukraḥ pralambo nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5908: tāmasasya manoḥ putrā jānujaṅgho 'tha nirbhayaḥ // GarP_1,87.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5913: munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta surāgāḥ sudhiyastathā // GarP_1,87.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5914: harayo devatāmāṃ ca catvāraḥ pañca (sapta) viṃśakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5915: gaṇā indraḥ śivistasya śatrurbhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,87.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5917: raivatasya manoḥ putro mahā prāṇaśca sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,87.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5927: śāntaḥ śatrurhato daityo haṃsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5935: āryāḥ prabhūtā bhāvyāśca lekhāśca pṛthukāstathā // GarP_1,87.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5936: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktā divaukasām /
GP12garup1_u:5941: nariṣyantastathā pāṃsurnabho nediṣṭha eva ca // GarP_1,87.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5947: ekādaśā tathā rudrā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5950: tejasvī nāma vai śakro hiraṇyākṣo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5955: aśvatthāmā kṛpo vyāso gālavo dīptimānatha // GarP_1,87.34 //
GP12garup1_u:5957: sutapā amṛtābhāśca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ // GarP_1,87.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5958: teṣāṃ gaṇastu devānā mekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5964: pṛtuśravā bṛhadūdyumna ṛcīko bṛhato guṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.38 //
GP12garup1_u:5970: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5972: dhamaputrasya putrāṃstu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:5980: baliḥ śatrustaṃ hariśca gadayā ghātayiṣyati // GarP_1,87.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5982: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ pururguruḥ // GarP_1,87.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5996: surārayo gaṇāścaite pratyekaṃ daśako gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.52 //
GP12garup1_u:6009: indro divaspatiḥ śatrustviṣṭibho nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.57 //
GP12garup1_u:6012: ururgabhīro dhṛṣṭaśca tarasvīgrā (gra) ha eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:6014: tejasvī durlabhaścaiva bhautyasyaite manoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,87.59 //
GP12garup1_u:6016: ajito muktaśukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.60 //
GP12garup1_u:6018: vacovṛddhā devagaṇāḥ pañca proktāstu saptakāḥ // GarP_1,87.61 //
GP12garup1_u:6020: eko devaścaturdhā tu vyāsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.62 //
GP12garup1_u:6022: aṅgāni caturo vedā mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ // GarP_1,87.63 //
GP12garup1_u:6024: dhanurvedaśca gāndharvo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ // GarP_1,87.64 //
GP12garup1_u:6025: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe manutadvaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma spatāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6029: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pitṛsto traṃ krauñcukiṃ prāha tacchṛṇu // GarP_1,88.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6034: nimuktasaṃgaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā procuḥ svapitaro munim // GarP_1,88.3 //
GP12garup1_u:6036: vatsa kasmāttvayā puṇyo na kṛto dāra saṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6046: akṛtvā ca kathaṃ māṇḍyaṃ svargatiṃ prāptumicchasi // GarP_1,88.8 //
GP12garup1_u:6048: mṛtasya narakaṃ tyaktvā kleśa evānyajanmani // GarP_1,88.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6051: bhavatyato mayā pūrvaṃna kṛto dārasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,88.10 //
GP12garup1_u:6055: mama tvapaṅkadigdho 'pi vidyāmbhobhirvaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,88.12 //
GP12garup1_u:6060: kiṃ tu nopāyamārgo 'yaṃ yatastvaṃ putra vartase // GarP_1,88.14 //
GP12garup1_u:6063: evaṃ na bandho bhavati kurvataḥ kāraṇātmakam /
GP12garup1_u:6064: na ca bandhāya tatkarma bhavatyanatisannibham // GarP_1,88.16 //
GP12garup1_u:6066: sukhaduḥ khātmakairvatsa puṇyā puṇyātmakaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,88.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6071: tatkathaṃ karmaṇo mārge bhavanto yojayanti mām // GarP_1,88.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6074: kiṃ tu vidyāpariprāptau hetuḥ karma na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,88.20 //
GP12garup1_u:6075: vihitākaraṇānartho na sadbhiḥ kriyate tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6080: anuṣṭhānā bhyupāyena bandhayogyāpi no hi sā // GarP_1,88.23 //
GP12garup1_u:6084: vṛddho 'haṃ sāmprataṃ ko me pitaraḥ sampridāsyati /
GP12garup1_u:6088: nūnaṃ bhāvi bhavitrī ca nābhinandasi no vacaḥ // GarP_1,88.26 //
GP12garup1_u:6090: babhūvuḥ sahasādṛśyā dīpā vātahatā iva // GarP_1,88.27 //
GP12garup1_u:6093: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmajñānamā nāmāṣṭāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6101: kiṃ karomi kra gacchāmi kathaṃ me dārasaṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6107: ārādhanāya sa tadā paraṃ niyamamāsthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6114: sṛṣṭvā prajāḥ sutānvipra samutpādya kriyāstathā // GarP_1,89.8 //
GP12garup1_u:6116: satvaṃ yathoktaṃ pitṛbhiḥ kuru dāraparigraham // GarP_1,89.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6118: ta eva tuṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ pradāsyanti tavepsitam /
GP12garup1_u:6119: patnīṃ sutāṃśca santuṣṭāḥ kiṃ na dadyuḥ pitāmahāḥ // GarP_1,89.10 //
GP12garup1_u:6122: nadyā vivikte puline cakāra pitṛtarpaṇam // GarP_1,89.11 //
GP12garup1_u:6127: devairapi hi tarpyante ye śrāddheṣu svadhottaraiḥ // GarP_1,89.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6128: namasye 'haṃ pitṝn svarge ye tarpyante maharṣibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6147: santarpyate jagatkṛtsnaṃ nāmnā khyātāḥ sukālinaḥ // GarP_1,89.23 //
GP12garup1_u:6154: pitṝnnamasye nivasanti sākṣādye devaloke 'tha mahītale vā /
GP12garup1_u:6155: tathāntarikṣe ca surāripūjyāste vai pratīcchantu mayopanītam // GarP_1,89.27 //
GP12garup1_u:6156: pitṝnnamasye paramārthabhūtā ye vai vimāne nivasantyamūrtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6158: pitṝnnamasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhābhujaḥ kāmyaphalābhisandhau /
GP12garup1_u:6160: tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaraḥ samastā icchāvatāṃ ye pradiśanti kāmān /
GP12garup1_u:6162: somasya ye raśmiṣu yer'kabimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti /
GP12garup1_u:6164: yeṣāṃ hute 'gnau haviṣā ca tṛptirye bhuñjate vipraśarīrasaṃsthāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6165: ye piṇḍadānena mudaṃ prayānti tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyaiḥ // GarP_1,89.32 //
GP12garup1_u:6167: kālena śākena maharṣivaryaiḥ saṃprīṇitāste mudamatra yāntu // GarP_1,89.33 //
GP12garup1_u:6168: kavyānyaśeṣāṇi ca yānyabhīṣṭānyatīva teṣāṃ mama pūjitānām /
GP12garup1_u:6169: teṣāñca sānnidhyamihāstu puṣpagandhāmbubhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu // GarP_1,89.34 //
GP12garup1_u:6170: dinedine ye pratigṛhṇater'cāṃ māsāntapūjyā bhuvi ye 'ṣṭakāsu /
GP12garup1_u:6171: ye vatsarānte 'bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me pitaro 'tra tuṣṭim // GarP_1,89.35 //

GP12garup1_u:7245: śamīṃ śiśre viniḥ kṣipya araṇiṃ vṛṣaṇe kṣipet // GarP_1,107.33 //

GP12garup1_u:7284: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha satkathām /

GP12garup1_u:7287: paraveśmani vāsaṃ ca na kurvīta kadācana // GarP_1,108.13 //

GP12garup1_u:7292: sa bhṛtyo yo vidheyastu tadbījaṃ yatprarohati /

GP12garup1_u:7296: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā /

GP12garup1_u:7298: nitya snātā sugandhā ca nityaṃ ca priyavādinī /

GP12garup1_u:7309: alpālpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā // GarP_1,108.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7311: sasarpe ca gṛhe vāsomṛtyureva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,108.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7314: vyālīkaṇṭhapradeśāhyapi ca phaṇabhṛdbhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā vyākulāgī rudhiranayanasaṃvyākulā vyāghrakalpā /
GP12garup1_u:7315: krodhe yaivogravaktrā sphuradanalaśikhā kākajihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā parapuragamanā bhrāntacittā virākta // GarP_1,108.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7316: saktiḥ sutoke sukṛtaṃ kṛtaghne śatiṃ ca vahnau (sītāpahau hyatapayaiva)?haime /
GP12garup1_u:7317: utpadyate daivavaśātkadācidveśyāsu rāgo na bhavetkadācit // GarP_1,108.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7318: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭidṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsāvinivartite ca /
GP12garup1_u:7319: dehe ca bālyādivayo 'nvite ca kālā vṛto 'sau labhate dhṛtiṃ kaḥ // GarP_1,108.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7320: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7326: grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7327: varaṃ hi narake vāso na tu duścarite gṛhe /
GP12garup1_u:7330: na parīkṣya paraṃ sthānaṃ pūrvamāyatanaṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7333: arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena kena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhāgrahasaṃkulena /
GP12garup1_u:7334: rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena // GarP_1,109.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7335: adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7336: arthairvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavatyakāle svajano 'pi śatruḥ // GarP_1,109.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7337: āpatsu mitraṃ jānī yādraṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim /
GP12garup1_u:7338: māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim // GarP_1,109.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7339: vṛkṣaṃ kṣīṇaphalaṃ tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkaṃ saraḥ sārasānirdravyaṃ puruṣaṃ tyajanti gaṇikā bhraṣṭaṃ nṛpaṃ mantriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7340: puṣpaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ dargdha vanāntaṃ mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kāryavaśājjano hi ramate kasyāsti ko vallabhaḥ // GarP_1,109.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7342: mūrkhaṃ chandānuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam // GarP_1,109.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7343: sadbhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ satpuruṣā dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7347: yasyayasya hi yo bhāvastasyatasya hitaṃ vadan /
GP12garup1_u:7349: nadīnāṃ ca nakhīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām /
GP12garup1_u:7350: viśvāso naiva gantavyaḥ striṣu rājakuleṣu ca // GarP_1,109.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7352: vañcanaṃ cāpa mānaṃ ca matimānna prikāśayet // GarP_1,109.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7355: kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko pīḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7356: kena na vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ // GarP_1,109.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7357: kor'thaṃ prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpadonāgatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7358: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ kor'tho gato gauravaṃ ko vā durjanavāgurānipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān // GarP_1,109.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7361: vipattau ca mahadduḥkhaṃ tadvudhaḥ kathamācaret // GarP_1,109.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7362: yasmindeśe na saṃmānaṃ na prītirna ca bāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7363: na ca vidyāgamaḥ kaścittaṃ deśaṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,109.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7364: dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7365: mṛtaṃ ca yanna mucyate samarjayasva taddhanam // GarP_1,109.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7366: yadarjitaṃ prāṇaharaiḥ pariśramairmṛtasya taṃ vai vibhajantirikthinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7367: kṛtaṃ ca yadduṣkṛtamarthalipsayā tadeva doṣopahatasya yautukam // GarP_1,109.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7369: ākhoriva kadaryasya dhanaṃ duḥ khāya kevalam // GarP_1,109.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7372: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehīti kṛpaṇā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7374: sañcitaṃ kratuśatairna yujyate yācitaṃ guṇavate na dīyate /
GP12garup1_u:7376: na devebhyo na viprobhyo bandhubhyo naiva cātmane /
GP12garup1_u:7379: arervā praṇipātena mā bhūtaste kadācana // GarP_1,109.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7381: vyādhīnāṃ bhojanaṃ jīrṇaṃ śatrorghātaḥ prapañcatā // GarP_1,109.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7383: pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇāṃ brāhmaṇasyānimantraṇam // GarP_1,109.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7384: durjanāḥ śilpino dāsā duṣṭāśca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7385: tāḍitā mārdavaṃ yānti na te satkārabhājanam // GarP_1,109.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7387: mitramāpadi kāle ca bhāryāñca vibhavakṣaye // GarP_1,109.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7388: strīṇāṃ dviguṇa āhāraḥ prajñā caiva caturguṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7390: na svapnena jayennidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet /
GP12garup1_u:7391: na cendhanairjayedvahniṃ na madyena tṛṣāṃ jayet // GarP_1,109.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7395: hṛdyaṃ hi puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // GarP_1,109.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7396: suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam /
GP12garup1_u:7397: yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ hi śaunaka / // GarP_1,109.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7399: toyaiśca doṣaiśca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ // GarP_1,109.38 //
GP12garup1_u:7400: nadī pātayate kūlaṃ nārī pātayate kulam /
GP12garup1_u:7401: nārīṇāñca nadīnāṃ ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ // GarP_1,109.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7403: nāntakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ // GarP_1,109.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7405: sukhānāñca sutānāñca jīvitasya varasya ca // GarP_1,109.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7406: rājā na tapto dhanasaṃcayena na sāgarastṛptimagājjalena /
GP12garup1_u:7407: na paṇḍitastṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptaṃ na cakṣurnṛpadarśanena // GarP_1,109.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7408: svakarma dharmārjitajīvitānāṃ śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām /
GP12garup1_u:7412: na dānena na mānena nārjavena na savayā /
GP12garup1_u:7413: na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamā striyaḥ // GarP_1,109.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7415: śanaiḥ kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca pañcaitāni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_1,109.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7417: śāśvataṃ saguṇā vidyā suhṛnmitraṃ ca śāśvatam // GarP_1,109.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7418: ye bālabhāvānna paṭhanti vidyāṃ ye yauvanasthā hyadhanātmadārāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7419: te śocanīyā iha jīvaloke manuṣyarūpeṇa mṛgāścaranti // GarP_1,109.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7422: ye bālabhāve na paṭhanti vidyāṃ kāmāturā yauvananaṣṭavittāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7423: te vṛddhabāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathābjam // GarP_1,109.50 //
GP12garup1_u:7424: tarke 'pratiṣṭhā śrutayo vibhinnāḥ nāsāvṛṣiryasya mataṃ na bhinnam /
GP12garup1_u:7425: dharmasya tattvaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ // GarP_1,109.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7428: anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pareṅgitajñānaphalā hi buddhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7429: udīritorthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti darśitam // GarP_1,109.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7430: arthādbhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchetsatyādbhraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca /
GP12garup1_u:7431: yogādbhraṣṭaḥ satyaghṛtiñca gacchedrājyādbhraṣṭo mṛgayāyāṃ vrajecca // GarP_1,109.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7432: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7436: dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hyadhruvaṃ naṣṭameva ca // GarP_1,110.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7437: vāgyantrahīnasya narasya vidyā śastraṃ yathā kāpuruṣasya haste /
GP12garup1_u:7438: na tuṣṭimutpādayate śarīre hyandhasya dārā iva darśanīyāḥ // GarP_1,110.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7440: vibhave dānaśaktiśca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_1,110.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7445: arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7446: ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret // GarP_1,110.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7451: na rājñā saha mitratvaṃ na sarpo nirviṣaḥ kracit /
GP12garup1_u:7452: na kulaṃ nirmalaṃ tatra strījano yatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7456: na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana // GarP_1,110.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7458: athavā pṛthivīpālo mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ // GarP_1,110.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7460: mūrdhni vā sarvalokānāṃ śīrṣataḥ patito vane // GarP_1,110.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7462: na ca virauti na cāpi sa śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā // GarP_1,110.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7466: adhaḥ khalenāpi kṛtasya vahnernādhaḥ śikhā yāti kadācideva // GarP_1,110.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7467: na sadaśvaḥ kaśāghātaṃ siṃho na gajagarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:7468: vīro vā paranirdiṣṭaṃ na sahedbhīmaniḥ svanam // GarP_1,110.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7469: yadi vibhavavihīnaḥ pracyuto vāśu daivānna tu khalajanasevāṃ kāṅkṣayennaiva nīcām /
GP12garup1_u:7470: na tṛṇamadanakārye sukṣudhārto 'tti siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiramuṣṇaṃ prāyaśaḥ kuñcarāṇām // GarP_1,110.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7474: tānyeva kāleṣu vipatkarāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇyapi dāruṇāni // GarP_1,110.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7478: svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ // GarP_1,110.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7480: bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya vai sadā // GarP_1,110.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7482: sānukūle tu daive śaṃ puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7484: āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sadā bhavet // GarP_1,110.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7485: dhaninaḥ śrotriyo rājā nadī vaidyastu pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7486: pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāttatratra saṃsthitim // GarP_1,110.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7488: pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasaṃ vaset // GarP_1,110.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7490: ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,110.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7492: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ na jānāti sarvajño nāsti kutracit // GarP_1,110.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7493: na sarvavitkaścidihāsti loke nātyantamūrkho bhuvi cāpi kaścit /
GP12garup1_u:7494: jñānena nīcottamamadhyamena yo 'yaṃ vijānāti sa tena vidvān // GarP_1,110.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7495: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7499: sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyaṅnityaṃ parīkṣayet // GarP_1,111.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7501: nirjitya parasainyāni kṣitaṃ dharmeṇa pālayet // GarP_1,111.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7505: pararāṣṭraṃ mahīpālairbhoktavyaṃ na ca dūṣayet // GarP_1,111.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7506: nodhaśchindyāttu yo dhenvāḥ kṣārārtho labhate payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7507: evaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prayogeṇa pīḍyamānaṃ na vardhate // GarP_1,111.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7511: prajāḥ pālayituṃ śaktaḥ pārthivo vijitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,111.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7514: satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7515: kintu vai vanitāpāṅgabhaṅgilolaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,111.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7516: vyāghrīva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāśca śatrava iva prabhavanti gātre /
GP12garup1_u:7517: āyuḥ paristravati bhinnaghaṭādivāmbho loko na cātmahitamācaratīha kaścit // GarP_1,111.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7518: niḥ śaṅkaṃ kiṃ manuṣyāḥ kuruta parahitaṃ yuktamagre hitaṃ yanmodadhvaṃ kāminībhirmadanaśarahatā mandamandātidṛṣṭyā /
GP12garup1_u:7519: mā pāpaṃ saṃkurudhvaṃ dvijahariparamāḥ saṃbhajadhvaṃ sadaiva āyurniḥ śeṣameti skhalati jalaghaṭībhūtamṛtyucchalena // GarP_1,111.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7521: ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7523: yadeṣāṃ sarvakāryeṣu vaco na pratihanyate // GarP_1,111.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7525: rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ taddvijātaye // GarP_1,111.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7527: sa rājā vardhate yogādvyādhibhiśca na badhyate // GarP_1,111.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7531: yasyārthāḥ sa mumāṃllāke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7532: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanairvihīnaṃ putrāśca dārāśca suhṛjjanāśca /
GP12garup1_u:7533: te cārthavantaṃ punarāśrayanti hyartho hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ // GarP_1,111.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7534: andhā hi rājā bhavati yastu sāstravivarjitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7535: andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati // GarP_1,111.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7537: indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyaṃ ciraṃ na hi // GarP_1,111.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7541: sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,111.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7542: manastāpaṃ na kurvīta āpadaṃ prāpya pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7543: samabuddhiḥ prasannātmā prasannātmā sukhaduḥkhe samo bhavet // GarP_1,111.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7545: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodati punaḥ śaśī // GarP_1,111.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7546: dhigdhik śarīrasukhalālitamānaveṣu mā khedayeddhanakṛśaṃ hi śarīrameva /
GP12garup1_u:7547: saddārakā hyadhanapāṇḍusutāḥ śrutā hi duḥkhaṃ vihāya punareva sukhaṃ prapannāḥ // GarP_1,111.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7550: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7553: mānave śrotriye caiva bhṛtyavarge sadaiva hi // GarP_1,111.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7555: śāsane sarvadā kṣipraṃ ripubhiḥ paribhūyate // GarP_1,111.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7556: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7557: vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyānrājādhamaṇa śāsti ca /
GP12garup1_u:7559: sukhapravṛttaiḥ sādhyantai śatravo vigrahe sthitaiḥ // GarP_1,111.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7561: ṣaḍvidho yasya utsāhastasya devo 'pi śaṅkate // GarP_1,111.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7562: udyogena kṛte kārye siddharyasya na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:7563: daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā // GarP_1,111.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7564: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre ekādaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7569: bhṛtye parikṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yasyayasya hi yo guṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7570: tamimaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathākathitaṃ kila // GarP_1,112.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7572: tathā caturbhirbhṛtakaṃ parīkṣayedvatena śīlena kalena karmaṇā // GarP_1,112.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7578: apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7580: sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ // GarP_1,112.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7582: krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7586: śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7588: āyuḥ śīlaguṇopeto vaidya eva vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7596: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,112.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7597: akāraṇaviṣkṛtakopadhāriṇaḥ khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:7598: viṣaṃ mahāherviṣamasya durvacaḥ saduḥ sahaṃ sannipatetsadā mukhe // GarP_1,112.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7600: ardharājyaharaṃ bhṛtyaṃ yo hanyātsa na hanyate // GarP_1,112.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7602: prāgeva paścādviparī tarupā ye te tu bhṛtyā na hitā bhavanti // GarP_1,112.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7604: sukhaduḥ khasamā dhīrā bhṛtyā lokeṣu durlabhāḥ // GarP_1,112.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7607: aśakto bhayabhītaśca rājñā tyaktavya eva saḥ // GarP_1,112.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7609: durge praveśitavyāni tataḥ śatruṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,112.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7614: yatkiñcitkurute karma śubhaṃ vā yādi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7615: tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmato bhṛtyakāryataḥ // GarP_1,112.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7618: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatyukta nītiptāre dvādaśottarakaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7622: paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāśca kevalāḥ // GarP_1,113.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7626: bandhstho 'pi tiṣṭhecca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha // GarP_1,113.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7630: vatsāpekṣī duhetkṣīraṃ bhūmiṃ gāñcaiva pārthipaḥ // GarP_1,113.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7632: tathā vittamu pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam // GarP_1,113.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7637: vane 'pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi pañcendriyanigrahastapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7638: akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛttarāgasya gṛhaṃ tapovanam // GarP_1,113.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7639: satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:7640: mṛjayā rakṣyate pātraṃ kulaṃ śalina rakṣyate // GarP_1,113.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7641: varaṃ vindhyāṭavyāṃ nivasanamabhuktasya maraṇaṃ varaṃ sarpākīrṇe śayanamatha kūpe nipatanam /
GP12garup1_u:7642: varaṃ bhrāntāvarte sabhayajalamadhye praviśanaṃ na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanamaṇu dehīti kathanam // GarP_1,113.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7644: pūrvārjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana // GarP_1,113.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7645: viprāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vidyā pṛthivyā bhūṣaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7646: nabhaso bhūṣaṇaṃ candraḥ śīlaṃ sarvasya bhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7647: ete te candratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śurāḥ satyapratijñā dinakaravapuṣaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7648: te vai duṣṭagrahasthāḥ kṛpaṇavaśagatā bhaikṣyacaryāṃ prayātāḥ ko vā kasminsamartho bhavati vidhivaśādbhrāmayetkarmarekhā // GarP_1,113.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7649: brahmā yena kulālavanniyamito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare viṣṇuryena daśāvatāragahane kṣipto mahāsaṅkaṭe /
GP12garup1_u:7650: rudroyena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nityameva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe // GarP_1,113.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7651: dātā baliryācakako murārirdānaṃ mahī vipramukhasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:7652: dattvā phalaṃ bandhanameva labdhaṃ namo 'stu te daiva yatheṣṭakāriṇe // GarP_1,113.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7657: ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥ khamātmanā vihitaṃ sakham /
GP12garup1_u:7659: na cāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivarapraveśe /
GP12garup1_u:7660: na mātṛmūrdhni pradhṛtastathāṅke tyaktuṃ kṣamaḥ karma kṛtaṃ naro hi // GarP_1,113.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7661: dugastrikūṭaḥ parikhā samudro rakṣāṃsi yodhāḥ paramā ca vṛttiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7662: śāstrañca vai tūśanasā pradiṣṭaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ kālavaśādvinaṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,113.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7663: yasminvayasi yatkāle yaddivā yacca vā niśi /
GP12garup1_u:7664: yanmuhūrte kṣaṇe vāpi tattathā na tadanyathā // GarP_1,113.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7667: purādhītā ca yā vidyā purā dattañca yaddhanam /
GP12garup1_u:7668: purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hyagre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ // GarP_1,113.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7671: sthūlajaṅgho yadā rāmaḥ śabdagāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7672: ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaste duḥ khabhājanam // GarP_1,113.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7673: na pituḥ karmaṇā putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7674: svayaṃ kṛtena gacchanti svayaṃ baddhāḥ svakarmaṇā // GarP_1,113.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7676: śarā iva patantīha vimuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // GarP_1,113.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7679: bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaśca yaḥ karoti śubhāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7683: prāptavyamarthaṃ labhate manuṣyo devo 'pi taṃ vārayituṃ na śaktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7684: ato na śocāmi na vismayo me lalāṭalekhā na punaḥ prayāti (yadasmadīyaṃ na tu tat pareṣām // GarP_1,113.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7685: sarpaḥ kūpe gajaḥ skandhe bila ākhuśca dhāvati /
GP12garup1_u:7686: naraḥ śīghratarādeva karmaṇaḥ kaḥ palāyate // GarP_1,113.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7689: yer'thā dharmeṇa te satyā ye 'dharmeṇa gatāḥ śriyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7690: dharmārtho ca mahāṃlloke tatsmṛtvā hyarthakāraṇāt // GarP_1,113.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7691: annārtho yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇo janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7692: tānyeva yadi dharmārtho na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam // GarP_1,113.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7694: yo 'nnārthaiḥ śuciḥ śaucānna mṛdā vāriṇā śuciḥ // GarP_1,113.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7696: sarvabhūte dayā śaucaṃ jalaśaucañca pañcamam // GarP_1,113.38 //
GP12garup1_u:7697: yasya satyañca śaucañca tasya svargo na durlabhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7698: satyaṃ hi vacanaṃ yasya so 'śvamedhādviśiṣyate // GarP_1,113.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7701: yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaścaiva susaṃyatam /
GP12garup1_u:7702: vidyā tapaśca kīrtiśca sa tīrthaphalamaśnute // GarP_1,113.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7704: na kruddhaḥ paruṣaṃ brūyādetatsādhostu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7706: kāle śrutvā hitaṃ vākyaṃ na kaścitparituṣyati // GarP_1,113.43 //
GP12garup1_u:7708: alabhyaṃ labhyate martyaistatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,113.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7712: prabhāte 'nyadiśo yānti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7714: yastvekastvarito yāti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7718: kuśāgreṇa tu saṃspṛṣṭaṃ prāptakālo na jīvati // GarP_1,113.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7720: prāptavyānyeva prāpnāti duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,113.50 //
GP12garup1_u:7722: ācodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7723: svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam // GarP_1,113.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7724: śīlaṃ kulaṃ naiva na caiva vidyā jñānaṃ guṇā naiva na bījaśuddhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7725: bhāgyāni pūrvaṃ tapasārjitāni kāle phalantyasya yathaiva vṛkṣāḥ // GarP_1,113.52 //
GP12garup1_u:7726: tatra mṛtyuryatra hantā tatra śrīryatra sampadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7727: tatra tatra svayaṃ yāti preryamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_1,113.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7729: yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindanti mātaram // GarP_1,113.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7731: sukṛtaṃ bhuṅkṣva cātmīyaṃ mūḍha kiṃ paritapyase // GarP_1,113.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7732: yathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7733: tathā janmāntare tadvai kartā ramanugacchati // GarP_1,113.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7735: ātmano balivamātrāṇi paśyannapi na paśyati // GarP_1,113.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7737: vicārya khalu paśyāmi tatsukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,113.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7738: yatra sneho bhayaṃ tatra sneho duḥ khasya bhājanam /
GP12garup1_u:7739: snehamūlāni duḥ khāni tasmistyakte mahatsukham // GarP_1,113.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7740: śarīramevāyatanaṃ duḥ khasya ca sukhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7741: jīvitañca śarīrañca jātyaiva saha jāyate // GarP_1,113.60 //
GP12garup1_u:7742: sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥ khaṃ sarva mātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7744: sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥ khaṃ duḥ khasyānantaraṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7745: śukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cakravatparivartate // GarP_1,113.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7747: vartamānena varteta na sa śokena bādhyate // GarP_1,113.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7748: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre trayośottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7756: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,114.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7757: na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na cātmaje /
GP12garup1_u:7761: mātrā svastrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano vaset /
GP12garup1_u:7764: yathopāyo vadho daṇḍastathaiva hyanu vartate // GarP_1,114.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7766: śakyate prasaro boddhuṃ na hyaraktasye catasaḥ // GarP_1,114.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7767: kṣaṇo nāsti raho nāsti na sti prārthayitā janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7773: parādhīnā nidrā paradṛdayakṛtyānusaraṇaṃ sadā helā hāsyaṃ niyatamapi śokena rahitam /
GP12garup1_u:7774: paṇe nyastaḥ kāyo viṭajanakhurairdāritagalo bahūtkaṇṭhavṛtirjagati gaṇikrāyā bahumataḥ // GarP_1,114.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7775: agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7776: nityaṃ paropasevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7778: śāstrakuśalo vipro bhavetpaṇḍitaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadi daṇḍanītikuśalo rājā bhaveddhārmikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7779: kiṃ citraṃ yadi rūpayauvanavatī sādhvī bhavetkāminī taccitraṃ yadi nirdhano 'pi puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkracit // GarP_1,114.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7783: yadi no cikurodbhedāllabhyante kaiḥ striyo na hi // GarP_1,114.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7785: na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛtavairo bahiḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,114.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7786: sa paṇḍito yo hyanuñjayedvai miṣṭena bālaṃ viniyena śiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:7787: arthena nārīṃ tapasā hi devānsarvāṃśca lokāṃśca susaṃgraheṇa // GarP_1,114.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7788: chalena mitraṃ kaluṣeṇa dharmaṃ paropatāpena samṛddhibhāvanam /
GP12garup1_u:7789: sukhena vidyāṃ puruṣeṇa nārīṃ vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāste // GarP_1,114.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7791: niṣphalaṃ tasya vai kāryāṃ mahādoṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,114.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7792: sadhano hi tapasvī ca dūrato vai kṛtaśramaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7793: madyapa strī satītyevaṃ vipra na śraddadhāmyaham // GarP_1,114.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7795: kadācitkupitaṃ mitraṃ sarvaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśayet // GarP_1,114.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7800: vṛddhāḥ striyo navaṃ madyaṃ śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ trimūlakam /
GP12garup1_u:7801: rātrau dadhi divā svapnaṃ vidvānṣaṭ parivarjayet // GarP_1,114.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7802: viṣaṃ goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam /
GP12garup1_u:7803: viṣaṃ kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,114.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7805: priyaṃ dānaṃ daridrasya bhūnaścataruṇī priyā // GarP_1,114.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7807: divāśayo jāgaraṇañca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ // GarP_1,114.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7810: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā bālārkastaruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7811: prabhāte maithunaṃ nidrā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7812: sadyaḥ pakraghṛtaṃ drākṣā bālā strī kṣīrabhojanam /
GP12garup1_u:7813: uṣṇodakaṃ tarucchāyā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7817: trayo balaharāḥ sadyo hyadhvā ve maithunaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,114.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7818: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ payo nityaṃ bhāryāmitraiḥ sahaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:7819: na bhāktavyaṃ nṛpaiḥ sārdhaṃ viyogaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt // GarP_1,114.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7821: sūryodaye hyastamaye 'pi śāyinaṃ vimuñcati śrīrapi cakrapāṇinam // GarP_1,114.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7822: nityaṃ chedastṛṇānaṃ dharaṇivilakhanaṃ pādayoścāpamārṣṭiḥ dantānāmapyaśaucaṃ malinavasanatā rūkṣatā mūrdhajānām /
GP12garup1_u:7823: dve sadhye cāpi nidrā vivasanaśayanaṃ grāsahāsātirekaḥ svāṅge pīṭhe ca vādyaṃ nidhanamupanayetkeśavasyāpi lakṣmīm // GarP_1,114.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7826: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7828: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyāsanasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7830: bālātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7831: āyuṣkāmo na seveta tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ // GarP_1,114.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7839: keśāmbu mārjanīreṇurhanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,114.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7841: antareṇa na gantavyaṃ hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca // GarP_1,114.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7843: bhogāsvādeṣu viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartumarhati // GarP_1,114.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7846: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvasto yadi tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:7847: sa vṛkṣāgre prasupto hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate // GarP_1,114.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7849: mṛdunaiva mṛduṃ hanti dāruṇenaiva dāruṇam // GarP_1,114.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7852: namanti phalino vṛkṣā namanti guṇino janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7853: śuṣkavṛkṣāśca mūrkhāśca bhidyante na namanti ca // GarP_1,114.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7854: aprārthitāni duḥ khāni yathaivāyānti yānti ca /
GP12garup1_u:7855: mārjāra iva lumpeta tathā prārthayitāra naraḥ // GarP_1,114.52 //
GP12garup1_u:7857: viparītamanārye ca yathecchasi tathā cara // GarP_1,114.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7859: dvikarṇasya tu mantrasya brahmāpyanta na budhyate // GarP_1,114.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7860: tayā gavā kiṃ kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī /
GP12garup1_u:7861: kor'tha putreṇa jātena yo na vidvānna dhārmikaḥ // GarP_1,114.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7863: kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7865: vanaṃ suvāsitaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7866: eko hi guṇavānputro nirguṇena śatena kim /
GP12garup1_u:7867: candro hanti tamāṃsyeko na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam // GarP_1,114.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7869: prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putraṃ mitravadācaret // GarP_1,114.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7875: yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktamaśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ // GarP_1,114.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7877: snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayo vai hyanākulāḥ // GarP_1,114.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7878: jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka /
GP12garup1_u:7879: sarveṣāṃ sa pitā hi syātsarveṣāmanupālakaḥ // GarP_1,114.64 //
GP12garup1_u:7884: apahṛtya parasvaṃ hi yastu dānaṃ prayacchati /
GP12garup1_u:7885: sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthāstasya tatphalam // GarP_1,114.67 //
GP12garup1_u:7888: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā /
GP12garup1_u:7889: niṣkṛtirvihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // GarP_1,114.69 //
GP12garup1_u:7893: caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñjātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ // GarP_1,114.71 //
GP12garup1_u:7896: nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7897: dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate // GarP_1,114.73 //
GP12garup1_u:7899: madīyā iti matvā vai na hi harṣayuto bhavet // GarP_1,114.74 //
GP12garup1_u:7900: cittāyattaṃ dhātuvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ citte naṣṭe dhātavo yānti nāśam /
GP12garup1_u:7901: tasmāccittaṃ sarvadā rakṣaṇīyaṃ svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti // GarP_1,114.75 //
