GP12garup1_u:8776: aiśvaryavittādi sadākṣayaṃ me tathāstu me santatirakṣayaiva // GarP_1,137.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8778: tvaṃ parataḥ parasmātsa brahmabhūtaḥ parataḥ parasmāt /
GP12garup1_u:8779: tathācyutaṃ me kuru vāñchitaṃ sadā mayā kṛtaṃ pāpaharāprameya // GarP_1,137.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8786: saptamīṃ pūjayedviṣṇuṃ durgāṃ śambuṃ raviṃ kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:8787: teṣāṃ lokaṃ samāpnoti sarvakāmāṃśca nirmalaḥ // GarP_1,137.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8791: dhanado 'gniḥ pratipadi nāsatyo dastra arcitaḥ // GarP_1,137.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8793: nāgāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kārtikeyaḥ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ // GarP_1,137.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8795: indro daśamyāṃ dhanada ekādaśyāṃ munīśvarāḥ // GarP_1,137.18 //
GP12garup1_u:8797: caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaro 'pare // GarP_1,137.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8798: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tithivāranakṣatrādivratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8803: viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā dakṣo 'ṅguṣṭhācca tasya vai // GarP_1,138.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8804: tato 'pitarvivasvāṃśca tataḥ sūnurvivasvataḥ manurikṣvākuśaryātī nṛgo dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ // GarP_1,138.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8805: nariṣyantaśca nābhāgo diṣṭaḥ śaśaka eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:8807: ilāyāṃ tu budhājjāto rājā rudra purūravāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8810: karūṣātkṣattriyā jātā kārūṣā iti viśrutāḥ // GarP_1,138.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8828: tatputraśca sumantiśca ete vaiśālakā nṛpāḥ // GarP_1,138.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8860: vijayādruruko jajñe rurukāttu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.29 //
GP12garup1_u:8862: ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyāṃ sagarāddhara // GarP_1,138.30 //
GP12garup1_u:8870: sudāsasya ca saudāso nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8873: tato daśaratho rājā tasya cailavilaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.36 //
GP12garup1_u:8881: kuśasya cātithiḥ putro niṣadho hyatitheḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.40 //
GP12garup1_u:8882: niṣadhasya nalaḥ putro nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8893: maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putrastasya codāvasuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.46 //
GP12garup1_u:8911: kṣemāri tastvanenāśca tasya rāmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.55 //
GP12garup1_u:8917: vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.58 //
GP12garup1_u:8919: bahulāśvo dhṛteḥ putro bahulāśvātkṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.59 //
GP12garup1_u:8920: janakasya dvaye vaṃśe ukto yogasamāśrayaḥ // GarP_1,138.60 //
GP12garup1_u:8921: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8924: sūryasya kathito vaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /
GP12garup1_u:8926: atreḥ somastasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā /
GP12garup1_u:8927: somāttarā budhaṃ jajñe budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ // GarP_1,139.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8933: balākāśvastasya putro balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8936: kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā /
GP12garup1_u:8949: vibhostu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ // GarP_1,139.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8955: vijayaḥ saṃjayasyāpi vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8961: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata // GarP_1,139.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8962: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruñca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī /
GP12garup1_u:8972: jayadhvajo madhuḥ śūro vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8986: kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tataścaidyo nṛpaḥ kila /
GP12garup1_u:8987: kuntiḥ kilāsya putro 'bhūtkuntervṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.32 //
GP12garup1_u:8989: daśārhasya suto vyomā jīmūtaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.33 //
GP12garup1_u:8991: tato madhuratho jajñe śakunistasya cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.34 //
GP12garup1_u:8995: puruhotro hyanoḥ putro hyaṃśuśca puruhotrataḥ // GarP_1,139.36 //
GP12garup1_u:9015: tadātmajo vilomā ca vilomnastumburuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.46 //
GP12garup1_u:9017: tasyāhukaścāhukī ca kanyā caivāhukasya tu // GarP_1,139.47 //
GP12garup1_u:9020: śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9029: pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ // GarP_1,139.53 //
GP12garup1_u:9031: sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍostasyāṃ dharmānilendrakaiḥ // GarP_1,139.54 //
GP12garup1_u:9033: mādrayāṃ nāsatyadastrābhyāṃ kuntyāṃ karṇaḥ purābhavat // GarP_1,139.55 //
GP12garup1_u:9041: niśaṭhaścolmuko jāto devakyāṃ ṣaṭ ca jajñire // GarP_1,139.59 //
GP12garup1_u:9043: ṛjudāso bhadradevaḥ kaṃsa evāvadhīcca tān // GarP_1,139.60 //
GP12garup1_u:9047: śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī cāṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutānbahūn // GarP_1,139.62 //
GP12garup1_u:9078: iti śrīgāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9086: jaleyuḥ santateyuśca rodrāśvasya sutā varāḥ // GarP_1,140.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9092: narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putro gargo vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9093: gargādamanyuḥ putro vai śiniḥ putro vyajāyata /
GP12garup1_u:9100: bṛhatkarmā tasya putrastasya putro jayadrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9104: nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiśca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9112: purañjayaḥ sudhīrācca tasya putro vidūrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9130: sudhanuśca pīkṣicca jahnuścaiva kuroḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,140.25 //
GP12garup1_u:9138: sahadevācca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavānsutaḥ // GarP_1,140.29 //
GP12garup1_u:9152: dhṛrāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuñca taddāsyāṃ vidurantathā // GarP_1,140.36 //
GP12garup1_u:9154: śataputraṃ duryodhanādyaṃ pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire // GarP_1,140.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9156: śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyāṃ pañca vai kramāt // GarP_1,140.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9157: yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī caiva subhadrikā /
GP12garup1_u:9158: vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyastu sutāḥ kramāt // GarP_1,140.39 //
GP12garup1_u:9162: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9168: nṛcakṣuśca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ // GarP_1,141.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9172: kṣemakaśca tataḥ śūdraḥ pitā pūrvastataḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,141.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9179: kṛtañjayo dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākya eva ca // GarP_1,141.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9185: kṣemyaśca suvrato dharmaḥ śmaśrulo dṛḍhasenakaḥ // GarP_1,141.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9187: iṣuñjayaśca ityete nṛpā bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,141.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9191: yāti bhūḥ pralayaṃ cāpsu hyāpastejasi pāvakaḥ // GarP_1,141.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9193: ahaṃ buddhau matirjove jīvo 'vyakte tadātmani // GarP_1,141.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9195: avināśyaparaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsvargādi nāśi hi // GarP_1,141.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9197: dharmaṃ kuryātsthiraṃ yena pāpaṃ hitvā hariṃ vrajet // GarP_1,141.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9198: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhaviṣya rājavaṃśa dṛ nāmaikacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9204: matsyo bhūtvā hayagrīvaṃ daityaṃ hatvājikaṇṭakam // GarP_1,142.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9206: mandaraṃ dhārayāmāsa kūrmo bhūtvā hitāya ca // GarP_1,142.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9210: amṛtaṃ pāyayāmāsa strīrūpī ca surānhariḥ // GarP_1,142.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9216: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ cakre niḥ kṣattriyāṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,142.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9218: yāgaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhurmahendre parvate sthitaḥ // GarP_1,142.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9226: rāvaṇaṃ cānujaṃ tasya laṅkāpuryāṃ vibhīṣaṇam // GarP_1,142.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9228: āruhya puṣpakaṃ sārdhaṃ sītayā patibhaktayā // GarP_1,142.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9230: rājyaṃ cakāra devādīnpālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ // GarP_1,142.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9232: sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇaiva yathāsukham // GarP_1,142.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9233: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:9234: karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavaṃ sadā // GarP_1,142.17 //
GP12garup1_u:9235: pativratā tu sā sītā hyanasūyā yathaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:9236: pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_1,142.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9238: taṃ tathā vyādhitaṃ bhāryā patiṃ devamivārcayat // GarP_1,142.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9246: tacchrutvā prāha tadbhāryā sūryo nodayameṣyati // GarP_1,142.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9248: bahūnyabdapramāṇāni tato devā bhayaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,142.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9255: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hyanasūyā pativratā /
GP12garup1_u:9258: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daśāvatāradṛ nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9270: astragrāmaṃ tato yakṣīṃ tāṭakāṃ prajaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9272: janakasya kratuṃ gatvā upayeme 'tha jānakīm // GarP_1,143.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9273: ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇo vīro bharato māṇḍavīṃ sutām /
GP12garup1_u:9274: śatrughno vai kīrtimatīṃ kuśadhvajasute ubhe // GarP_1,143.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9278: sa rāmāya tatputrāya kaikeyyā prārthitastadā // GarP_1,143.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9280: rāmaḥ pitṛhitārthañca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā // GarP_1,143.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9282: rathaṃ tyaktvā prayāgañca citrakūṭagiriṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,143.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9283: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargaṃ samāśritaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9286: sa naicchatpāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu // GarP_1,143.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9288: nandigrāme sthito bhakto hyayodhyāṃ nāviśadvratī // GarP_1,143.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9292: nikṛtya karṇo nāse ca rāmeṇāthāpavāritā // GarP_1,143.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9298: sītayā prerito rāmo mārīcaṃ nijaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9299: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte /
GP12garup1_u:9302: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnaṃ sītā hṛteti saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9304: jaṭāyuṣaṃ vinirbhidya yayau laṅkāṃ tato balī /
GP12garup1_u:9306: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyāñca parṇaśālāṃ dadarśa ha /
GP12garup1_u:9307: śokaṃ kṛtvātha jānakyā mārgaṇaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,143.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9309: gatvā sakhyaṃ tataścakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ // GarP_1,143.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9315: pratīcīmuttarāṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ gatvā samāgatāḥ // GarP_1,143.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9316: dakṣiṇāntu diśaṃ ye ca mārgayanto 'tha jānakīm /
GP12garup1_u:9323: bhava bhāryeti vadatā cintayantīñca rāghavam // GarP_1,143.31 //
GP12garup1_u:9325: rāmasya tasya dūto 'haṃ śokaṃ mā kuru maithili // GarP_1,143.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9326: svābhijñānañca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:9327: tacchrutvā pradadau sītā veṇīratnaṃ hanūmate // GarP_1,143.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9328: yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā vācyaṃ tvayā kape /
GP12garup1_u:9329: tathetyuktvā tu hanumānvanaṃ divyaṃ babhañja ha // GarP_1,143.34 //
GP12garup1_u:9335: dagdhvā laṅkāṃ samāyāto rāmapārśvaṃ sa vānaraḥ // GarP_1,143.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9337: veṇīratnañca rāmāya rāmo laṅkāpurrī yayau // GarP_1,143.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9339: vibhīṣaṇo 'pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇaṃ rāghavaṃ prati // GarP_1,143.39 //
GP12garup1_u:9341: rāmo nalena setuñca kṛtvābdhau cottatāra tam // GarP_1,143.40 //
GP12garup1_u:9343: atha te vānarā vīrā nīlāṅgadanalādayaḥ // GarP_1,143.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9347: rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇo hatvā sakapiḥ sarvarākṣasān // GarP_1,143.43 //
GP12garup1_u:9354: sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītvātha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9355: savānaraḥ samāyāto hyayodhyāṃ pravarāṃ purīm // GarP_1,143.47 //
GP12garup1_u:9359: putrau kuśalavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // GarP_1,143.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9361: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ jaghne śailūṣaṃ bhatastataḥ // GarP_1,143.50 //
GP12garup1_u:9363: svargaṃ gato janaiḥ sārdhamayodhyāsthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ // GarP_1,143.51 //
GP12garup1_u:9364: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9370: kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍhaṃ pūtanāmanayatkṣayam // GarP_1,144.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9372: damitaḥ kāliyo nāgo dhenuko vinipātitaḥ // GarP_1,144.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9376: keśī vinihato daityo gopādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ // GarP_1,144.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9378: rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādyāḥ hyaṣṭau patnyo hareḥ parāḥ // GarP_1,144.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9380: tāsāṃ putrāśca pautrādyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // GarP_1,144.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9385: narako nihato yena pārijātaṃ jahāra yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9386: balaśca śisupālaśca hataśca dvividaḥ kapiḥ // GarP_1,144.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9387: aniruddhādabhūdvajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau /
GP12garup1_u:9389: mathurāyāṃ cograsenaṃ pālanaṃ ca divaukasām // GarP_1,144.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9390: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9400: śantanoḥ satyavatyāṃ ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9407: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāñca mādyāṃ ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,145.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9412: dagdhā jatugṛhe vīrāste muktāḥ svadhiyāmalāḥ // GarP_1,145.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9418: ardvarājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā indraprasthe purottame // GarP_1,145.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9423: gāṇḍīvaṃ nāma taddivyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:9425: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavo jātavedasam /
GP12garup1_u:9428: yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nītivide mudā // GarP_1,145.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9443: pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha /
GP12garup1_u:9448: ānande tu pade līno vimale muktakilbiṣe // GarP_1,145.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9449: tato droṇo yayau yoddhuṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:9451: yatra te pṛthivīpālā hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare /
GP12garup1_u:9455: nimagnaḥ sūryalokantu tataḥ prāpa sa vīryavān // GarP_1,145.30 //
GP12garup1_u:9456: tataḥ śalyo yayau yoddhuṃ dharmarājena dhīmatā /
GP12garup1_u:9461: aśvatthāmā gato drauṇiḥ suptasainyaṃ tato niśi // GarP_1,145.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9465: aiṣikāstreṇa taṃ jitvā jagrāhārjuna uttamam // GarP_1,145.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9467: snātvā santarpya devāṃśca pitṝnatha pitāmahān // GarP_1,145.36 //
GP12garup1_u:9471: śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāmasahasrakam // GarP_1,145.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9477: duṣṭānāñca vadhārthāya hyavatāraṃ karoti ca // GarP_1,145.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9482: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9487: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaro vyādhirvikāro duṣṭa āmayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9490: saṃprāptiścaiti vijñānaṃ rogāṇāṃ pañcadhā smṛtam // GarP_1,146.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9492: nidānamāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpaṃ yena lakṣyate // GarP_1,146.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9496: saṃsthānāṃ vyañjanaṃ liṅgaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamākṛtiḥ // GarP_1,146.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9499: vidyādupaśayaṃ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyamiti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9504: sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti // GarP_1,146.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9510: sarveṣāmeva rogāṇāṃ nidānaṃ kupitā malāḥ // GarP_1,146.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9522: pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān // GarP_1,146.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9533: rasāyanaṃ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate // GarP_1,146.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9534: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe sarvaroganidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9543: indramado jaladeṣvapsu nīlikā jyotiroṣadhīṣu bhūmyāmūṣaro nāma // GarP_1,147.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9545: aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāśca kaphodbhave // GarP_1,147.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9553: na vijīrṇaṃ na ca mlānirjvarasyāmasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,147.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9562: mohastandrāliptatiktāsyatā ca jñeyaṃ rūpaṃ śleṣmapittajvarasya // GarP_1,147.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9564: taducchītaṃ mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,147.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9565: sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahāsvedo hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9569: sasvanau sarujau karṇau mahāśītau hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9572: koṣṭhānāṃ śyāvaraktānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ ca darśanam // GarP_1,147.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9583: tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāhaṃ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā // GarP_1,147.21 //
GP12garup1_u:9585: śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syānditaśoṣite // GarP_1,147.22 //
GP12garup1_u:9586: pitte śānte 'tha vai mūrchā madastṛṣṇā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9587: dāhādau punaranteṣu tandrālasye vamiḥ kramāt // GarP_1,147.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9589: caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedo dāhādyairabhighātajaḥ // GarP_1,147.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9604: iti jvaro 'ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāddvibidhastu saḥ // GarP_1,147.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9606: prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ sāmo nirāmakaḥ // GarP_1,147.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9607: pūrvaṃ śarire śarīre tāpo manasi mānase /
GP12garup1_u:9609: dāhaḥ pittayute miśraṃ miśre 'ntaḥ saṃśraye punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9610: jvare 'dhikaṃ vikārāḥ syurantaḥ kṣobho malagrahaḥ // GarP_1,147.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9611: bahireva bahirvege tāpo 'pi ca sa sādhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9613: vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ sādhyaḥ prāyaśca prākṛto 'nilāt /
GP12garup1_u:9614: varṣāsu māruto duṣṭaḥ pittaśleṣmānvitaṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9615: kuryācca pittaṃ śaradi tasya cānucaraḥ kaphaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9632: malaṃ jvaroṣṇadhātūnvā sa śīghraṃ kṣapayettataḥ // GarP_1,147.46 //
GP12garup1_u:9635: prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṃ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:9636: ityagniveśasya mataṃ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,147.48 //
GP12garup1_u:9637: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamyekādaśī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:9638: eṣā tridoṣamaryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca // GarP_1,147.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9644: doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṃ sve kāle jvarayanbalī // GarP_1,147.52 //
GP12garup1_u:9646: kṣīṇadoṣo jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣveva līyate // GarP_1,147.53 //
GP12garup1_u:9649: āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptidoṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9652: doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti santataṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.56 //
GP12garup1_u:9670: kramo yatnena vicchinnaḥ satāpo lakṣyate jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.65 //
GP12garup1_u:9675: bhūmau sthitaṃ jalaiḥ siktaṃ kālaṃ naiva pratīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:9676: aṅkurāya yathā bījaṃ doṣabījaṃ bhavettathā // GarP_1,147.68 //
GP12garup1_u:9680: utkleśo gauravaṃ dainyaṃ bhaṅgo 'ṅgānāṃ vijṛmbhaṇam // GarP_1,147.70 //
GP12garup1_u:9686: svedo 'titṛṣṇā vamanaṃ daurgandhyaṃ vā sahiṣṇutā // GarP_1,147.73 //
GP12garup1_u:9689: antardāho bahiḥ śaityaṃ śvāso hikkā hi majjame /
GP12garup1_u:9692: uttarottaraduḥ sādhyāḥ pañcānye tu viparyaye // GarP_1,147.76 //
GP12garup1_u:9698: sa vai hāridrako nāma jvarabhedo 'ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,147.79 //
GP12garup1_u:9700: tīkṣṇo 'tha vā divā mando jāyate rātrijo jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.80 //
GP12garup1_u:9704: tadardhaṃ śītalaṃ dehe hyardhaṃ coṣṇaṃ prajāyate // GarP_1,147.82 //
GP12garup1_u:9705: kāye pittaṃ yadā nyastaṃ śleṣmā cānte vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9706: uṣṇatvaṃ tena dehasya śītatvaṃ karapādayoḥ // GarP_1,147.83 //
GP12garup1_u:9712: svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛtiyogimano 'nnalipsā kaṇḍūśca mūrdhni vigatjvaralakṣaṇāni // GarP_1,147.86 //
GP12garup1_u:9713: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaranidānādikaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9719: kupitaṃ paittikaiḥ pittaṃ dravaṃ raktañca mūrchati // GarP_1,148.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9725: chardhitaśchardibai bhatsyaṃ kāsaḥ śvāso bhramaḥ klamaḥ // GarP_1,148.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9733: bahvauṣadhāni pittasya vireko hi varauṣadham // GarP_1,148.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9734: anubandhī kapho yatra tatra tasyāpi śuddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:9735: kaṣāyāḥ svādavo yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalā hitāḥ // GarP_1,148.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9739: anubandhi balaṃ yasya śāntapittanarasya ca // GarP_1,148.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9743: na hi saṃśodhanaṃ kiñcidasya ca pratilominaḥ // GarP_1,148.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9746: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:9747: tatra doṣo 'tra gamanaṃ śivāstra iva lakṣyate // GarP_1,148.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9749: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe raktapittanidānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9752: āśukārī yataḥ kāsaḥ sa evātaḥ pravakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:9755: teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatāṃ rūpaṃ kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūrarocakaḥ // GarP_1,149.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9757: ūrdhvaṃ pravṛttaḥ prāpyo rastasminkaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan // GarP_1,149.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9759: kṣipannivākṣiṇī kliṣṭasvaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan // GarP_1,149.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9763: soṃgaharṣo kaphaṃ śuṣkaṃ kṛchrānmuktvālpatāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,149.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9765: pittāsṛgvamanaṃ tṛṣṇā vaisvaryaṃ dhūmako madaḥ // GarP_1,149.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9771: upasyantaḥ kṣato vāyuḥ pittenānugato balī // GarP_1,149.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9772: kupitaḥ kurute kāsaṃ kaphaṃ tena saśoṇitam /
GP12garup1_u:9773: pītaṃ śyāvañca śuṣkañca grathitaṃ kupitaṃ bahu // GarP_1,149.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9784: supyate tudyata iva hṛdayaṃ pacatīva ca /
GP12garup1_u:9789: yāpyau vā balināṃ tadvatkṣatajo 'pi navau tu tau // GarP_1,149.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9791: miśrā yāpyāśca ye sarve jarasaḥ sthavirasya ca // GarP_1,149.20 //
GP12garup1_u:9794: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kāsanidānā nāmaikonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9807: preritaḥ prerayankṣudraṃ svayaṃ sa samalaṃ marut /
GP12garup1_u:9808: pratilomaṃ śirā gacchedudīrya pavanaḥ kapham // GarP_1,150.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9817: sa yāpyastamakaḥ sādhyo narasya balino bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:9828: yo dīrghamucchvasityūrdhvaṃ na ca pratyāharatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,150.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9830: ūrdhvaṃ samīkṣate bhrāntamakṣiṇī paritaḥ kṣipan // GarP_1,150.17 //
GP12garup1_u:9832: ete sidhyeyuravyaktāḥ vyaktāḥ prāṇaharā dhruvam // GarP_1,150.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9833: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śvāsanidānā nāma pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9838: hikrā bhakṣyodbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:9841: karoti hikrāṃ śvasanaḥ mandaśabdāṃ kṣudhānugām // GarP_1,151.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9842: samaṃ sandhyānnapānena yā prayāti ca sānnajā /
GP12garup1_u:9843: āyāsātpavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrāṃ hikrāṃ pravartayet // GarP_1,151.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9845: vṛddhimāyāsato yāti bhuktamātre ca mārdabam // GarP_1,151.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9847: pariṇāmānmukhe vṛddhiṃ pariṇāme ca gacchati // GarP_1,151.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9848: kampayantī śiro grīvāṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /
GP12garup1_u:9850: yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā /
GP12garup1_u:9852: stambhayantī tanuṃ vācaṃ smṛtiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca muñcatī /
GP12garup1_u:9858: gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet // GarP_1,151.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9859: ādye dve varjayedanye sarvaliṅgāṃ ca veginīm /
GP12garup1_u:9862: sarve 'pi rogā nāśāya na tvevaṃ śāghrakāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,151.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9863: hikrāśvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyukāle kṛtālayau // GarP_1,151.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9864: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hikrānidānā nāmaikapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9871: yacca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tato mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9876: tairudīrṇo 'nilaḥ pittaṃ vyarthaṃ codīrya sarvataḥ // GarP_1,152.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9878: mukhāni srotasāṃ ruddhvā tathaivātivisṛjya vā // GarP_1,152.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9880: rūpaṃ bhaviṣyatastasya pratiśyāyo bhṛśaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,152.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9886: bāhvoḥ pratodo jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsyadarśanam // GarP_1,152.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9892: jyotirdivi davāgnīnāṃ jvalatāṃ ca mahīruhām // GarP_1,152.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9895: sthite pārśve ca rugbodhe sandhisthe bhavati jvaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9906: vidāho manasaḥ sthāne bhavantyanye hyupadravāḥ // GarP_1,152.20 //
GP12garup1_u:9909: raso hyasya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat /
GP12garup1_u:9910: upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantācca kevalaṃ vartate kṣayī // GarP_1,152.22 //
GP12garup1_u:9914: svarabhedo bhavettasya kṣāmo rūkṣaścalaḥ svaraḥ // GarP_1,152.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9916: pittāttālugale dāhaḥ śoṣo bhavati santatam // GarP_1,152.25 //
GP12garup1_u:9918: svayaṃ viruddhaiḥ sarvaistu sarvāliṅgaiḥ kṣayo bhavet // GarP_1,152.26 //
GP12garup1_u:9921: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yakṣmanidānā nāma dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9939: madhuraṃ lavaṇaṃ bhūri prasaktaṃ lomaharṣaṇam // GarP_1,153.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9945: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'rocakanidānā nāma tripañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9949: kṛmihṛdrogaliṅgaiśca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛdgatāḥ // GarP_1,154.1 //
GP12garup1_u:9951: bhidyate śuṣyate stabdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ śūnyatā bhramaḥ // GarP_1,154.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9959: tamaḥ praveśo hṛllāsaḥ śothaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaphastrutiḥ // GarP_1,154.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9964: ṣaṣṭhī syādupasargācca vātapitte ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,154.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9968: saṃśoṣya tṛṣṇā jāyante tāsāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam // GarP_1,154.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9985: yā ca pānātipānotthā tīkṣṇāgre snehapākajā // GarP_1,154.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9989: yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sopasargātmikā smṛtā // GarP_1,154.20 //
GP12garup1_u:9990: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āmlapittanidānā nāma catuḥ pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10003: madhyamottamayoḥ sandhiṃ prāpya rājāsano madaḥ // GarP_1,155.5 //
GP12garup1_u:10008: niśceṣṭaḥ sannavākśete tṛtīye 'tra made sthitaḥ // GarP_1,155.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10010: dharmādharmaṃ sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ mānānarthaṃ hitāhitam // GarP_1,155.8 //
GP12garup1_u:10017: vibhedaṃ prasabhaṃ tṛṣṇā saumyo glānirjvaro 'ruciḥ // GarP_1,155.11 //
GP12garup1_u:10021: pittāddāhajvaraḥ svedo moho nityaṃ ca vibhramaḥ // GarP_1,155.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10023: sarvaje sarvaliṅgatvaṃ jñātvā madyaṃ pibettu yaḥ // GarP_1,155.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10030: vikāraiḥ kliśyate jātu na sa śarīramānasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10045: kāsaḥ śyāvāruṇā cchāyā mūrchāyāṃ mārutātmakaḥ // GarP_1,155.25 //
GP12garup1_u:10046: pittena raktaṃ pītaṃ vā nabhaḥ paśyanviśettamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10060: mriyeta śīghraṃ śīghraṃ ceccikitsā na prayujyate // GarP_1,155.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10064: yuktāyuktaṃ ca samaṃ yuktiṃ yuṅkte na madyena // GarP_1,155.34 //
GP12garup1_u:10067: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe madātyayādinidānaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10070: athārśasāṃ nidānaṃ ca vyākhyāsyami ca suśruta / /
GP12garup1_u:10071: sarvadā prāṇināṃ māṃse kīlakāḥ prabhavanti ye // GarP_1,156.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10081: tatra hetuḥ sahotthānāṃ bālye bījopataptatā // GarP_1,156.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10083: devatānāṃ prakope hi sānnipātasya cānyataḥ // GarP_1,156.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10105: mārutaḥ purato mūḍhaḥ prāyo nābheradhaścaran // GarP_1,156.17 //
GP12garup1_u:10110: indriyārtheṣu laulyaṃ ca krodho duḥ khopacārataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10111: āśaṅkā grahaṇī śothaḥ pāṇḍugulmodareṣu ca // GarP_1,156.20 //
GP12garup1_u:10117: kṛśo bhṛśaṃ hatotsāho dīnaḥ kṣāmo 'tha niṣprabhaḥ // GarP_1,156.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10155: na stravanti na bhidyante pāṇḍusnigdhatvagādayaḥ // GarP_1,156.42 //
GP12garup1_u:10161: kekābhaḥ pīḍyate duḥ khaiḥ śoṇitakṣayasambhavaiḥ // GarP_1,156.45 //
GP12garup1_u:10167: tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭhapṛṣṭhahṛtpārśvagā bhavet // GarP_1,156.48 //
GP12garup1_u:10169: bastau ca sutarāṃ śūlo gaṇḍaśvayathusaṃbhavaḥ // GarP_1,156.49 //
GP12garup1_u:10174: ete ca vātajā rogā jāyante bhṛśadāruṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10177: sahajāni tu doṣāṇi yāni cābhyantare valau // GarP_1,156.53 //
GP12garup1_u:10179: dvandvajāni dvitīyāyāṃ valā yānyāśritāni ca // GarP_1,156.54 //
GP12garup1_u:10181: bāhyāyāṃ tu valau jātānyekadoṣolbaṇāni ca // GarP_1,156.55 //
GP12garup1_u:10183: meḍhrādiṣvapi vakṣyante yathāsvaṃ nābhijāni tu // GarP_1,156.56 //
GP12garup1_u:10185: vyāno gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇaṃ karotyarśastvaco bahiḥ // GarP_1,156.57 //
GP12garup1_u:10192: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'śonidānā nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10208: rūkṣaṃ saphenamacchaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ va muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10217: bhayena kṣubhite citte śāyite drāvayetsa (ccha) kṛt // GarP_1,157.11 //
GP12garup1_u:10224: atīsāreṣu yo nāti yatnavān grahaṇīgadaḥ // GarP_1,157.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10226: sāmaṃ śakṛnnirāmaṃ vā jīrṇaṃ yenātisāryate // GarP_1,157.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10228: sāmaṃśīrṇamajīrṇena jīrṇe pakvaṃ tu naiva ca // GarP_1,157.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10231: sa caturdhā pṛthagdoṣaiḥ sannipātācca jāyate // GarP_1,157.17 //
GP12garup1_u:10235: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kārśyaṃ vamaka stamako jvaraḥ // GarP_1,157.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10242: cirādduḥ khaṃ dravaṃ śuṣkaṃ tundāraṃ śabdaphenavat /
GP12garup1_u:10257: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍetisāranidāna nāma saptañcāśaduttaraśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10271: sapicchaṃ saniruddhaṃ ca sarvaiḥ sarvātmakaṃ malaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10273: mūtraṃ sapittaṃ sakaphaṃ saśukraṃ vā tadā kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:10274: saṃjāyate 'śmarī ghorā pittaṃ goriva rocanā // GarP_1,158.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10280: baddhaṃ baddhvā sukhaṃ mehedacchaṃ gomedakopamam // GarP_1,158.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10286: pittena dahyate bastiḥ pacyamāna ivoṣṇavān // GarP_1,158.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10288: bastirnistudyata iva śleṣmaṇā śītalo guruḥ // GarP_1,158.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10289: aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhuvarṇātha vā sitā /
GP12garup1_u:10290: etā bhavanti bālanāṃ teṣāmeva ca bhūyasām // GarP_1,158.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10292: sukrāśmarī tu mahatī jāyate śukradhāraṇāt // GarP_1,158.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10298: asau vā vāyunā bhinnā sā tvasminnamulomage // GarP_1,158.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10304: binduśaśca pravarteta mūtraṃ bastau tu pīḍite // GarP_1,158.22 //
GP12garup1_u:10315: na nireti niruddhaṃ vā mūtrātītaṃ tadalparuk // GarP_1,158.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10320: ākṣiptamalpamūtrasya vastau nābhau ca vā male /
GP12garup1_u:10323: antarvasti mukhe tṛṣṇā sthirālpaṃ sahasā bhavet // GarP_1,158.31 //
GP12garup1_u:10325: mūtritasya striyaṃ yāto vāyunā śukramuddhṛtam // GarP_1,158.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10333: mūtraṃ vartayate pūrvaṃ saraktaṃ raktameva vā // GarP_1,158.36 //
GP12garup1_u:10334: uṣṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ kṛcchrāduṣṇavātaṃ vadanti tam /
GP12garup1_u:10337: pittaṃ kapho dvādapi vā saṃhanyetenilenacet // GarP_1,158.38 //
GP12garup1_u:10338: kṛcchrānmūtraṃ tadā pītaṃ raktaṃ śvetaṃ ghanaṃ sṛjet /
GP12garup1_u:10341: iti vistārataḥ proktā rogā mūtrapravartitāḥ // GarP_1,158.40 //
GP12garup1_u:10342: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mūtrāghātamūtrākṛcchanidāna nāmāṣṭapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10346: pramehā viṃśatistatra śleṣmaṇo daśa pittataḥ // GarP_1,159.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10352: majjābhaṃ majjamiśraṃ vā majjamehī muhurmuhuḥ // GarP_1,159.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10354: salasīkaṃ vivaddhaṃ ca hastimehī pramehati // GarP_1,159.5 //
GP12garup1_u:10355: madhumehī madhusamaṃ jāyate sa kila dvidhā /
GP12garup1_u:10360: madhuraṃ yacca meheṣu prāyo madhviva mehati // GarP_1,159.8 //
GP12garup1_u:10380: same samakṛtā doṣe paramatvāttathāpi ca // GarP_1,159.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10390: śukrābhaṃ śukramiśraṃ vā śukramehī pramehati // GarP_1,159.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10400: sadāhā kūrmasaṃsthānā jñeyā kacchapikā budhaiḥ // GarP_1,159.28 //
GP12garup1_u:10401: mahatī piḍikā nīlā vinatā nāma sā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:10403: raktā sitā sphoṭacitā dāruṇā tvalajī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:10404: masūrākṛti saṃsthānā vijñeyā tu masūrikā // GarP_1,159.30 //
GP12garup1_u:10406: putriṇī mahatī cālpā susūkṣmā piḍikā smṛtā // GarP_1,159.31 //
GP12garup1_u:10408: vidradherlakṣaṇairyuktā jñeyā vidradhikā tu sā // GarP_1,159.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10409: putriṇī ca vidārī ca duḥ sahā bahumedasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10419: bhaviṣyato mehagaṇasya rūpaṃ mūtre 'pi dhāvanti pipīlikāśca // GarP_1,159.37 //
GP12garup1_u:10420: tṛṣṇā pramehe madhuraṃ prapicchaṃ madhvāmaye syādvividhovikāraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10421: sampūraṇādvā kaphasambhavaḥ syātkṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣvanilātmako vā // GarP_1,159.38 //
GP12garup1_u:10422: sampūrṇarūpāḥ kaphapittamehāḥ krameṇa ye vai ratisambhavāśca /
GP12garup1_u:10423: sakrāmate pittakṛtāstu yāpyāḥ sādhyo 'sti meho yadi nāsti diṣṭam // GarP_1,159.39 //
GP12garup1_u:10424: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pramehanidāna nāmaikonaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10436: vṛttaḥ syādāyato yo vā smṛto rogaḥ sa vidradhiḥ // GarP_1,160.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10438: vahate tatra tatrāṅge dāruṇe grathito 'strutaḥ // GarP_1,160.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10453: kṣatottho vāyunā kṣiptaḥ sa raktaḥ pittamīrayan /
GP12garup1_u:10456: nābhau hi dhmātaṃ cedbastau mūtrakṛcchrañcajāyate // GarP_1,160.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10460: kukṣipārśvāntare caiva kukṣau doṣopajanma ca // GarP_1,160.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10462: pārśvayośca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam // GarP_1,160.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10470: mṛte tu garbhage caiva sambhavecchvayatharghanaḥ // GarP_1,160.20 //
GP12garup1_u:10476: doṣo medaḥsu tatrāste savṛddhiḥ saptadhā gadaḥ // GarP_1,160.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10478: vātapūrṇaḥ kharasparśo rūkṣo vātācca dāhakṛt // GarP_1,160.24 //
GP12garup1_u:10492: supīḍito 'ntaḥ svanavān prayāti pradhmāpayanneti punaśca mūrdhni // GarP_1,160.31 //
GP12garup1_u:10496: ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇāṃ jāyate 'ṣṭamaḥ // GarP_1,160.33 //
GP12garup1_u:10502: śuddho vā suddhihānirvā bhajeta spandanāni vā // GarP_1,160.36 //
GP12garup1_u:10510: tataḥ piṇḍakavacchleṣmā malasaṃsṛṣṭa eva ca // GarP_1,160.40 //
GP12garup1_u:10513: vedhaḥ sūcyeva viḍbhraṃśaḥ kṛcchre mūtraṃ pravartate /
GP12garup1_u:10514: gātre mukhe pade śothaḥ hyagnimāndyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,160.42 //
GP12garup1_u:10520: hīyate dīpyate śleṣmā svasthānaṃ dahatīvaca // GarP_1,160.45 //
GP12garup1_u:10528: ṛtau yā caiva śūlārtā yati vā yonirogiṇī // GarP_1,160.49 //
GP12garup1_u:10538: pākañcireṇa bhajate naidhate vidradhiḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,160.54 //
GP12garup1_u:10552: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidradhigulmanidāna nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10556: rogāḥ sarve 'pi mandāgnau sutarāmudarāṇi tu // GarP_1,161.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10560: ādhmāpya kukṣimudaramaṣṭadhā te ca bhedataḥ // GarP_1,161.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10564: puruṣāḥ syuḥ pretarūpā bhāvinastasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,161.5 //
GP12garup1_u:10566: jīrṇānnaṃ yo na jānāti so 'pathyaṃ sevatenaraḥ // GarP_1,161.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10573: sarvatra toye maraṇaṃ śocanaṃ tatra niṣphalam /
GP12garup1_u:10578: nātimātraṃ bhavellaulyaṃ narasya virasaṃ mukham // GarP_1,161.12 //
GP12garup1_u:10584: ādhmātamudare śabdamadbhutaṃ vā karoti saḥ // GarP_1,161.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10586: pittodare jvaro mūrchā dāhitvaṃ kaṭukāsyatā // GarP_1,161.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10611: pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddhamalo gude /
GP12garup1_u:10614: apāno jaṭhare tena saṃruddho jvararukkaraḥ // GarP_1,161.30 //
GP12garup1_u:10618: nābherupari ca prāyo gopucchākṛti jāyate // GarP_1,161.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10624: vardhate tadadho nābherāśu caiti jalātmatām // GarP_1,161.35 //
GP12garup1_u:10625: udrikte doṣarūpe ca vyāpte ca śvāsatṛṭbhramaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10640: hīnabalaṃ tathā ghoraṃ nāḍyāṃ spṛṣṭañca sapati // GarP_1,161.43 //
GP12garup1_u:10644: janmanaivodaraṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ kṛcchratamaṃ matam // GarP_1,161.45 //
GP12garup1_u:10645: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10653: tvaṅmāṃsayostu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān // GarP_1,162.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10654: svayaṃ haridrā hāridraṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ teṣu cādhikam /
GP12garup1_u:10655: yāto 'yaṃ prahatedugraḥ sa rogastena gauravam // GarP_1,162.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10661: mandaśaktirjvarī śvāsī karṇaśūlī tathā bhramī // GarP_1,162.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10675: srotasāṃ saṃkṣayaṃ kuryādanurudhya ca pūrvavat // GarP_1,162.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10678: yaḥ pittarogī seveta pittalaṃ tasya kāmalam /
GP12garup1_u:10683: upekṣayā ca śothādyāḥ sakṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ // GarP_1,162.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10685: vātapitte bhramastṛṣṇā strīṣu harṣo mṛdujvaraḥ // GarP_1,162.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10688: śothaḥ pradhānaḥ kathitaḥ sa evāto nigadyate /
GP12garup1_u:10701: pacyate mārgagamanaṃ yānena kṣobhiṇāpi vā // GarP_1,162.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10713: śīghraṃ nāsau vā praśamenmadhye prāgdahate tanum // GarP_1,162.33 //
GP12garup1_u:10715: sābhilāṣī śakṛdbhedo gandhaḥ sparśasaho mṛduḥ // GarP_1,162.34 //
GP12garup1_u:10728: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pāṇḍusothanidānaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10734: yathāttarañca duḥ sādhyastatra doṣo yathāyatham // GarP_1,163.2 //
GP12garup1_u:10736: dehe śīghraṃ viśantīha te 'ntare hi sthitā bahiḥ // GarP_1,163.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10749: yaṃyaṃ deśaṃ visarpaśca visarpati bhavetsasaḥ // GarP_1,163.9 //
GP12garup1_u:10750: śāntāṅgārāsito nīlo rakto vāsu ca cīyate /
GP12garup1_u:10751: agnidagdha iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghragatvāddrutaṃ sa ca // GarP_1,163.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10758: kaphena ruddhaḥ pavano bhittvātaṃ bahudhā kapham /
GP12garup1_u:10768: āmopaveśanaṃ lepaḥ srotasāṃ sa ca sarpati // GarP_1,163.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10775: śavagandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardamākhyamuśanti tam // GarP_1,163.21 //
GP12garup1_u:10782: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vīsarpanidānaṃ nāma tripaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10790: tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyaṃ śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭhamuśantitam // GarP_1,164.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10796: kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthagdvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // GarP_1,164.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10798: vātena kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ pittenaudumbaraṃ kaphāt // GarP_1,164.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10802: puṇḍarīkaṃ savisphoṭaṃ pāmā carmadalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,164.9 //
GP12garup1_u:10804: puṇḍarīkaryajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu // GarP_1,164.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10812: kāpālaṃ todabahulaṃ tatkuṣṭhaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,164.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10816: sthiraṃ satyānaṃ guru snigdhaṃ śvetaraktaṃ malānvitam // GarP_1,164.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10825: antā rūkṣaṃ bahiḥ snigdhamantarghṛṣṭaṃ rajaḥ kiret /
GP12garup1_u:10836: puṇḍarīkaṃ bhavettaddhi citaṃ sphoṭaiḥ sitāruṇaiḥ // GarP_1,164.26 //
GP12garup1_u:10838: sūkṣmā śyāmāruṇā rūkṣā prāyaḥ sphikpāṇikūrpare // GarP_1,164.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10848: tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇyarūkṣātā // GarP_1,164.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10858: sadāhaṃ romavidhvaṃsi kaphācchvetaṃ ghana guru // GarP_1,164.37 //
GP12garup1_u:10867: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10881: śvetāstāmrāvabhāsāśca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te // GarP_1,165.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10883: cyuravo darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāste ca kurvate // GarP_1,165.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10895: sausurādāḥ saśūlākhyā lelihā janayanti hi // GarP_1,165.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10898: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kriminidānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10902: sarvathānarthakathane vighna eva ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,166.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10904: sa viśvakarmā viśvātmā viśvarūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,166.2 //
GP12garup1_u:10906: tadvaduktaṃ ca yatnena yatitavyamataḥ sadā // GarP_1,166.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10928: tatra sthānasthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathukṛcchratām // GarP_1,166.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10932: yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddho 'bhyeti muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10935: tadāvaṣṭabhya hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet // GarP_1,166.17 //
GP12garup1_u:10936: sakṣipetparito gātraṃ hanuṃ vā cāsya nāmayat /
GP12garup1_u:10938: kapota iva kūjecca niḥ saṃgaḥ sopatantrakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10939: sa eva vāmanāsāyāṃ yuktastu marutā hṛdi // GarP_1,166.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10943: vyāpnoti sakalaṃ dehaṃ yatra cāyāmyate punaḥ // GarP_1,166.21 //
GP12garup1_u:10945: karoti jṛmbhāṃ sadanaṃ daśanānāṃ hatodyamam // GarP_1,166.22 //
GP12garup1_u:10947: dehasya bahirāyāmaṃ pṛṣṭhato hṛdaye śiraḥ // GarP_1,166.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10948: uraścotkṣipyate tatra skandho vā nāmyate tadā /
GP12garup1_u:10949: danteṣvāsye ca vaivarṇyaṃ hyasvedastatra gātrataḥ // GarP_1,166.24 //
GP12garup1_u:10965: tato 'sya kurute mṛdvīṃ vākśaktiṃ stabdhanetratām // GarP_1,166.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10971: raktamāśritya ca śirāḥ kuryānmūrdhadharāḥ śirāḥ? // GarP_1,166.35 //
GP12garup1_u:10973: tanuṃ gṛhītvā vāyuśca snāyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,166.36 //
GP12garup1_u:10981: asādhya eva sarvo hi bhaveddaṇḍāpatānakaḥ // GarP_1,166.40 //
GP12garup1_u:10985: bāhvoḥ karmakṣayakarī vipūcī veti socyate // GarP_1,166.42 //
GP12garup1_u:10987: tadā khañjo bhavejjantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnordvayorvadhāt // GarP_1,166.43 //
GP12garup1_u:10995: tadāsthi snāti tenorostathā śītānilena tu // GarP_1,166.47 //
GP12garup1_u:11003: satikṣepaṃ nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate // GarP_1,166.51 //
GP12garup1_u:11004: hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetāṃ cāpi suptakau /
GP12garup1_u:11008: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātavyādhinidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11014: sthūlānāṃ sukhināṃ cāpi kupyate vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.2 //
GP12garup1_u:11018: tathā vāto gude pīḍāṃ balāsaṃ vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.4 //

GP12garup1_u:11917: sudhāṃ ca bālāṃ gaṇikāṃ saptaparṇasuvarcikām // GarP_1,174.18 //

GP12garup1_u:11930: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brāhmīghṛtādivarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11939: vātajvaraharaḥ kvātho guḍūcyā mustakena ca // GarP_1,175.3 //
GP12garup1_u:11942: sājyaḥ kvāthaḥ śleṣmajaṃ tu saśuṇṭhiḥ sadurālabhaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:11954: āmalakyā guḍūcyā ca madhuyuktaṃ sacandanam // GarP_1,175.10 //
GP12garup1_u:11964: bilvādipa pañcamūlasya kvāthaḥ syādvātike jvare // GarP_1,175.15 //
GP12garup1_u:11966: vātajvare tvayaṃ kvātho dattaḥ śāntikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,175.16 //
GP12garup1_u:11968: vidhāne kriyamāṇe 'pi ysaya saṃjñā na jāyate // GarP_1,175.17 //
GP12garup1_u:11970: tiktā pāṭhā parpaṭāśca viśālā triphalā trivṛt /
GP12garup1_u:11972: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaraharanānāyogādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11984: baddhamūlā ghanā dīrghāḥ snagdhāḥ syurnotpatanti ca // GarP_1,176.5 //
GP12garup1_u:11991: nīlī ca karavīraṃ ca guḍametaiḥ samaṃ śṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:11995: jīrṇaṃ pakvaṃ lohacūrṇaṃ kāñjikaṃ kṛṣṇakeśakṛt // GarP_1,176.10 //
GP12garup1_u:11998: saindhavaṃ ca vacā hiṅgu kuṣṭhaṃ nāgeśvaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:11999: śatapuṣpā devadāru ebhistailaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,176.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12011: valkalaiḥ sādhitairliptaṃ liṅgaṃ tena vivardhate // GarP_1,176.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12012: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe keśotpattyādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12023: puṣpaṃ rātryandhatāṃ hanti timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12024: caturbhāgāni śaṅkhasya tadardhena manaḥ śilā // GarP_1,177.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12026: chāyāśuṣkāṃ tu vaṭikāṃ kṛtvā nayanamañjayet // GarP_1,177.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12027: timiraṃ paṭalaṃ hanti piciṭaṃ ca mahauṣadham /
GP12garup1_u:12028: trikaṭu triphalāṃ caiva karaṃ jasya phalāni ca // GarP_1,177.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12034: saindhaṃvaṃ kaṭutailaṃ ca apāmārgasya mūlakam // GarP_1,177.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12037: oṃ dadru sara kroṃ hrīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ dadru sara hrīṃ hrīṃ oṃ uṃ ū sara krīṃ krīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12038: ādyā hi vaśāmāyānti mantreṇānena cāñjanāt // GarP_1,177.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12045: prabhāte netrarogaiśca nityaṃ sarvaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,177.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12051: guñjāmūlaṃ chāgamūtre ghṛṣṭaṃ timiranucca tat raupyatāmrasuvarṇānāṃ hastaghṛṣṭaśalākayā // GarP_1,177.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12060: dhuttūrakaṃ gairikaṃ ca etaiḥ sādhitasikthakam // GarP_1,177.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12062: jātīpatraṃ ca carvitvā vidhṛtaṃ mukharoganut // GarP_1,177.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12064: muṣṭakaṃ kuṣṭhamelā ca yaṣṭikaṃ madhuvālakam // GarP_1,177.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12066: kaṣāyaṃ kaṭukaṃ vāpi tiktaśākasya bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,177.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12068: dantavraṇāni sarvāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchantyanena tu // GarP_1,177.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12072: mātuluṅgadalānyelā yaṣṭī madhu ca pippalī // GarP_1,177.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12073: jātīpatramathaiṣāṃ ca cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā tathā kṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12085: trisaptāhaṃ vāḥ piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi /
GP12garup1_u:12090: dvibhāgaṃ chāgadugdhena tailaprasthaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,177.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12094: ebhiśca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,177.39 //
GP12garup1_u:12098: dāhaṃ pittaṃ jvaraṃ śoṣaṃ mūrchāṃ caiva kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,177.41 //
GP12garup1_u:12103: dugdhaṃ pītaṃ tu saṃyuktaṃ gopurīṣarasena ca /
GP12garup1_u:12110: siddhaṃ tailaṃ kāñjikena tathā sarjarasena ca // GarP_1,177.47 //
GP12garup1_u:12114: śauvāñjanaṃ gokṣuraṃ vā varuṇacchannameva ca // GarP_1,177.49 //
GP12garup1_u:12115: saubhāñjanasya mūlaṃ ca etaiḥ kvathitavāri ca /
GP12garup1_u:12123: pītaṃ takreṇa mūlaṃ ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12134: sarjarasāḥ sikthakaṃ ca jīrakaṃ ca harītakī /
GP12garup1_u:12142: pākaṃ ca vedanāṃ caiva saṃspṛśedvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.62 //
GP12garup1_u:12145: śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā caiṣāṃ tu mūlakam /
GP12garup1_u:12148: pākapūtiṃ vedanāṃ ca hanti vai rohito vraṇe // GarP_1,177.65 //
GP12garup1_u:12152: bhakṣayitvā hyajīrṇasya nāśo bhavati śaṅkara / // GarP_1,177.67 //
GP12garup1_u:12163: kṛtvā tu vaṭikāṃ nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet // GarP_1,177.71 //
GP12garup1_u:12168: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarvavaśyaprayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarvakāmakṛt // GarP_1,177.73 //
GP12garup1_u:12170: citāgnau bhasma tacchatrordattaṃ śirasi śaṅkara // GarP_1,177.74 //
GP12garup1_u:12172: niḥ kṣiptaṃ ca purīṣaṃ vai vanamūṣikacarmaṇi // GarP_1,177.75 //
GP12garup1_u:12174: kṛṣṇakākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca // GarP_1,177.76 //
GP12garup1_u:12175: cyutadale madhyamadhye tato niḥ kṣipyate hara / /
GP12garup1_u:12176: sa khādyate kākavṛndairnārī puruṣa eva ca // GarP_1,177.77 //
GP12garup1_u:12187: śarīraṃ yena sa pumānvṛddherdarpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_1,177.81 //
GP12garup1_u:12191: tadbhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptaṃ śatraṇāṃ bhaṅgakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,177.83 //
GP12garup1_u:12193: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha cāhīhicāhīhi svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12195: sudarśanāyā malaṃ tu puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12196: niḥ kṣiptaṃ gṛhamadhye tu bhujaṅgā varjayanti tat // GarP_1,177.85 //
GP12garup1_u:12200: chāga mūtreṇa tallipto mūṣiko mūṣikānharet // GarP_1,177.87 //
GP12garup1_u:12201: mukto hi mandire rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:12205: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12211: tāmbūlaṃ yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syātsumantrataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12214: cūrṇokṛtya yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:12216: vaibhī takaṃ śākhoṭakaṃ mūlaṃ patreṇa saṃyutam /
GP12garup1_u:12217: sthāpyate yadgṛhadvāre tatra vai kalaho bhavet // GarP_1,178.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12218: khañjarīṭasya māṃsaṃ tu madhunā saha peṣayet /

GP12garup1_u:12230: oṃ rudraṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ varaśaktā tvaritāvidyā /
GP12garup1_u:12234: oṃ namaḥ sarvasattvebhyo namaḥ siddhiṃ kuru kuru svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12236: strīṇāmagre bhrāmayacca kṣaṇādvai sā vaśe bhavet // GarP_1,178.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12237: brahmadaṇḍīṃ vacāṃ patraṃ madhunā saha peṣayet /

GP12garup1_u:12241: bhṛṅgarājasya mūlaṃ tu piṣṭaṃ śukreṇa saṃyutam /

GP12garup1_u:12248: oṣṭhe netre lalāṭe ca mūrdhni candrakalāḥ sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12249: strīṇāṃ pakṣe site kṛṣṇe ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitā nṛṇām // GarP_1,178.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12251: catuḥ ṣaṣṭi kalāḥ proktāḥ kāmaśāstre vaśīkarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12255: oṃ hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyaṃ putravaśādi dehi me /
GP12garup1_u:12270: tatpītvā labhate garbhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,178.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12274: palāśasya tu bījāni kṣaudreṇa saha peṣayet /

GP12garup1_u:12282: dantāḥ syurlohitāḥ puṃsaḥ śvetā rudra na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.2 //

GP12garup1_u:12289: pacettailaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ naśyetkledaḥ prapūraṇāt // GarP_1,179.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12291: satapuṣpāvacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāru śigra rasāñjanam // GarP_1,179.6 //

GP12garup1_u:12297: haridrā nimbapatrāṇi pippalyo maricāni ca // GarP_1,179.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12299: gomūtreṇa ca piṣṭvaiva kṛtvā ca vaṭikāṃ hara / /
GP12garup1_u:12302: eṣā ca śaṅkarī vartiḥ sarvanetrāmayā pahā // GarP_1,179.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12303: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12306: vacā māṃsī ca bilvañca tagaraṃ padmakesaram /
GP12garup1_u:12313: āliptā strī vaśaṃ yāti nānyaṃ puruṣamicchati // GarP_1,180.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12314: oṃ raktacāmuṇḍe amukaṃ me vaśamānaya ānaya oṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hraḥ phaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:12315: imaṃ japtvāyutaṃ mantraṃ tilakena ca śaṅkara / /
GP12garup1_u:12318: madhu sarpiḥ sitāyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ tadbhagalepanāt // GarP_1,180.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12320: śaṅkapuṣpī vacā māṃsī soma rājī ca phalgukam // GarP_1,180.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12322: samūlāni sa patrāṇi kṣīreṇājyena peṣayet // GarP_1,180.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12324: daśavāraṃ prasūtāpi punaḥ kanyā bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,180.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12325: sarṣapāśca vacā caiva madanasya phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12332: tena lepanato yonau bhagastambhastu jāyate // GarP_1,180.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12333: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12337: tathā payaḥ samāyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ śūlaharaṃ param // GarP_1,181.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12338: harītakī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12339: kāse śvāse ca hikkāyāṃ lihyātkṣaudraṃ ghṛplutam // GarP_1,181.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12341: naśyate pīnasaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaśca balavattaraḥ // GarP_1,181.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12343: śvāsaṃ kāsañca hikkāñca madhumiśraṃ vṛṣadhvaja / // GarP_1,181.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12344: nīlotpalaṃ śarkarā ca madhukaṃ padmakaṃ samam /
GP12garup1_u:12346: śuṇṭhī ca śarkarā caiva tathā kṣaudreṇa saṃyutā /
GP12garup1_u:12352: sudhā ca haritālañca śaṅkhabhasma manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12355: śaṅkhamāmalakaṃ patraṃ dhātakyāḥ kusumāni ca // GarP_1,181.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12357: snigdhāḥ śvetāśca dantāśca bhavanti vimalaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,181.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12358: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12362: hemante śiśire caiva varṣāsu dadhi śasyate // GarP_1,182.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12363: bhukte tu śarkarā pītā navanītena buddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12370: kandarpasadṛśo martyo nityaṃ bhavati śaṅkara / // GarP_1,182.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12372: ebhiśca racitāṃ jagdhvā taruṇo balavānbhavet // GarP_1,182.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12373: hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ pītvā tu kvathitodakaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12376: durbalaśca bhavetsthūlo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12378: kṣīrāśī ca kṣayī puṣṭiṃ medhāñcaivātulāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,182.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12381: manaḥ śilā śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ tailapakvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:12382: lomāni śātayatyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12383: mālūrasya rasaṃ gṛhya jalaukāṃ tatra peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12390: muṇḍītvakca vacā mustaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12391: carvitvā ca tvimaṃ sadyo jihvayā jvalanaṃ lihet // GarP_1,182.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12395: oṃ namo bhagavate jalaṃ stambhaya saṃ saṃ saṃ keka kekaḥ caracara /
GP12garup1_u:12398: areryo nikhaneddvāre pañcatvamu payāti saḥ // GarP_1,182.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12401: puṣpeṇa tu samaṃ piṣṭvā rocanāyāḥ palaikataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12404: brahmadaṇḍī tu puṣyeṇa bhakṣye pāne vaśīkaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12405: yaṣṭi madhu palaikena pakvamuṣṇodakaṃ pibet // GarP_1,182.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12411: maricaṃ dadhi kuṣṭhañca nasye pāne viṣaṃ haret // GarP_1,182.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12417: vṛścikasya viṣaṃ hanti lepo 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja / // GarP_1,182.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12423: sukhaṃ prasūyate nārī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12426: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvyāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12432: devadārurasaṃ pāṭhāṃ kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet // GarP_1,183.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12442: ūrustambhaṃ jayantyā vā saptarātreṇa nāśayet // GarP_1,183.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12445: vāyuḥ snāyugataṃ caiva agnimāndyaṃ ca nāśayet // GarP_1,183.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12449: raktapittaṃ vinaśyettu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,183.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12455: śrotre baddhvā śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ jvaraṃ mantreṇa vai haret /
GP12garup1_u:12456: oṃ jambhinī stambhinī mohaya sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa phaṭ iti // GarP_1,183.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12457: puṣpamaṣṭaśataṃ japtvā haste dattvā nakhaṃ spṛśet /
GP12garup1_u:12458: cāturthiko jvaro rudra anye caiva jvarāstathā // GarP_1,183.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12459: jmbūphalaṃ haridrā ca sarpasyaiva tu kañcukam /
GP12garup1_u:12463: pāmāṃ vicarcikāṃ kuṣṭhamabhyaṅgāddhi vraṇāni vai // GarP_1,183.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12465: plīhā vinaśyate rudra tathā sūraṇasevanāt // GarP_1,183.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12469: saindhavañca viḍaṅgāni somarājī tu sarṣapāḥ // GarP_1,183.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12472: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tryaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12479: pānādarśoharaṃ syācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,184.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12481: cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu lepo 'yaṃ arśarogaharaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,184.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12486: citāgniḥ khañjarīṭasya viṣṭhā pheno hayasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12488: adṛśyastridaśaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ punarmānavaiḥ śiva // GarP_1,184.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12489: tilatailaṃ yavāndagdhvā maṣīṃ kṛtvā tu lepayet /
GP12garup1_u:12490: tenaiva saha tailena agnidagdhaḥ sukhī bhavet // GarP_1,184.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12492: oṃ namo bhagavate ṭha ṭha chindhi chindhi jvalanaṃ prajvalitaṃ nāśaya nāśaya huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,184.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12493: kare baddhaṃ tu nirguṇḍyā mūlaṃ jvaraharaṃ drutam /
GP12garup1_u:12495: haste badhvā nāśayecca arśāṃsyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12498: triphalāyāstu cūrṇaṃ hi sājyaṃ kuṣṭhavināśanam // GarP_1,184.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12500: hareddhakkāṃ śvāsakāsau pītaṃ strīṇāñca garbhakṛt // GarP_1,184.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12503: viḍaṅgaṃ madhukaṃ pāṭhāṃ māṃsīṃ sarjarasaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12504: rahidrāṃ triphalāñcaiva mapāmārgaṃ manaḥ śilām // GarP_1,184.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12506: yoniṃ liṅgaṃ ca mrakṣeta strīpusoḥ syātpriyaṃ mithaḥ // GarP_1,184.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12507: namaste īśavaradāya ākarṣiṇi vikarṣiṇi mugdhe svāhā iti /
GP12garup1_u:12510: bīje naiṣāṃ jātikāyā rasena rasamardanam // GarP_1,184.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12516: lāṅgalikāyāḥ śākhā ca svarṇañca dahanādbhavet // GarP_1,184.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12521: vismayaṃ kurute caiva vṛṣavannātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,184.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12522: rātrau ca sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ kīṭaṃ khadyo tanāmakam /
GP12garup1_u:12528: yuddhe vijayate so 'pi mahāśūraśca jāyate // GarP_1,184.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12529: dantaṃ ḍuṇḍubhasarpasya mukhe saṃgṛhya vai kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:12530: tiṣṭhate ca jalāntastu nirvikalpaṃ sthale yathā // GarP_1,184.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12541: satakraṃ kuśamalaṃ vā markaṭī mūlameva vā /
GP12garup1_u:12542: kāñjikena ca vākucyā mūlaṃ vai dantaroganut // GarP_1,184.31 //
GP12garup1_u:12546: balā cātibalā yaṣṭī śarkarā madhusaṃyutā // GarP_1,184.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12552: takreṇa śarapuṅkhāṃ vā pītvā plīhāṃ vināśayet // GarP_1,184.36 //
GP12garup1_u:12555: śuṇṭhī sauvarcalaṃ hiṅgu pītaṃ hṛdayaroganut // GarP_1,184.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12556: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidyaśāstre caturaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12559: āṃ gaṇapataye iti ayaṃ gaṇapaternmantro dhanavidyāpradāyakaḥ // GarP_1,185.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12561: vyavahāre jayaḥ syācca śataṃ jāpānnṛṇāṃ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12562: tilānāṃ tu ghṛtāktānāṃ kṛṣṇānāṃ rudra homayet /
GP12garup1_u:12566: apājitaḥ syādyuddhe ca sarve tañca siṣevire // GarP_1,185.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12568: śikhāṃ baddhvā rājakule vyavahāre jayo bhavet // GarP_1,185.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12569: hrīṅkāraṃ savisargañca prātaḥ kāle narastu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12570: strīṇāṃ lalāṭe vinyasya vaśatāṃ nayati dhruvam // GarP_1,185.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12572: sotkāmāṃ kāminīṃ kuryānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12574: dṛṣṭimātre sadā tasya vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12576: kṛta ebhiśca tilake vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12578: tenaiva tilakaṃ kṛtvā trailokyaṃ vaśatāṃ nayet // GarP_1,185.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12581: sa karoti vaśe sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,185.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12584: etairvaitilakaṃ kṛtvā sā naraṃ yaṃ nirīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:12585: tatkṣaṇāttaṃ vaśe kuryā nnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12590: nijaśukraṃ gṛhī tvā tu vāmahastena yaḥ pumān /
GP12garup1_u:12591: kāminīcaraṇaṃ vāmaṃ liṃpetsa syātstriyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12593: ebhirlipte tu liṅge vai kāminīvaśakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,185.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12594: puṣpāṇi pañcaraktāni gṛhītvā yāni kāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12598: śvetasaṣarpa etaiśca liptaliṅgaḥ striyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12608: ebhistu kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ vai sarvaśūlanut // GarP_1,185.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12612: pītaḥ satakro 'tīsāraṃ kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12622: pītaṃ sarvañca mehantu kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12624: manaḥ śilāmarīcānāṃ sindūrasya palaṃ palam // GarP_1,185.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12626: pītaṃ snuhīgataṃ dugdhaṃ saindhavaṃ śūlanudbhavet // GarP_1,185.30 //
GP12garup1_u:12630: ebhiśca vartikāṃ kṛtvā tvakṣiṇī cāñjayettataḥ // GarP_1,185.32 //
GP12garup1_u:12632: vibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ samadhu śvāsanāśanam // GarP_1,185.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12641: carvitvā dantakīṭānāṃ vināśo hi bhaveddhara // GarP_1,185.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12642: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mantratantravaidyaprayodṛpañcāśītyadhiśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12645: pītaḥ sāro guḍūcyāśca madhunā ca pramehanut /
GP12garup1_u:12648: tathā hikkāṃ haretpītaṃ sauvarcalayutañca vai // GarP_1,186.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12660: dantīmūlaṃ haridrā ca citrakaṃ tasya lepanāt /
GP12garup1_u:12664: tato na prastravedraktaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,186.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12667: ghoṣāphalaṃ saindhavañca piṣṭvā cārśoharaṃ param // GarP_1,186.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12670: bilvasya ca phalaṃ dagdhaṃ raktārśaḥ pravināśanam /
GP12garup1_u:12674: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai /
GP12garup1_u:12675: harītakīṃ saindhavañca citrakaṃ rudra pippalī // GarP_1,186.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12677: sājyaṃ sūkaramāṃsaṃ vai pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram // GarP_1,186.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12678: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12689: tajjagdhaṃ madhunā sārdhaṃ daśavarṣa sahasriṇam // GarP_1,187.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12691: dadhnā nityaṃ bhakṣitantu vajradehakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,187.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12693: tacca kāñjikasaṃyuktaṃ naraṃ kuryācca bhakṣitam // GarP_1,187.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12695: jagdhaṃ triphalayā kṣaudraṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,187.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12696: andhaḥ paśyettu cūrṇasya sājyasyaiva tu bhakṣaṇāt /
GP12garup1_u:12698: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśā bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja /
GP12garup1_u:12702: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca /
GP12garup1_u:12703: gṛhītvā navanītena teṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ ca bhakṣayet // GarP_1,187.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12704: karṣārdhamekaṃ seveta natvā nityaṃ hariṃ prabhum /
GP12garup1_u:12707: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlaṃ puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12708: vidhāya tasya cūrṇaṃ vai sasauvīrañca bhakṣayetaṃ // GarP_1,187.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12710: śatāni pañca jīvecca naro nāgabalo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:12711: bhavecchrutidharo rudra puṣyarkṣe caiva bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,187.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12712: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āyuṣkarayogodṛsaptāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12717: tadrasena prahārasya raktastrāvo na pūraṇāt // GarP_1,188.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12719: tena vraṇamukhaṃ liptaṃ śalyaṃ niḥ sa rati vraṇāt /
GP12garup1_u:12722: tena liptaṃ ciraṃ jātaṃ vraṇaṃ nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati // GarP_1,188.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12724: hiṅgumūlasya vai cūrṇaṃ dattaṃ nāḍīvraṇāpaham // GarP_1,188.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12726: tena ghṛṣṭaṃ raktadoṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,188.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12736: bhujaṅgacarma vai hiṅgu nimbapatraṃ tathā yavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12737: gaurasarṣama ebhiḥ syāllepo bhūtaharaḥ śiva // GarP_1,188.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12742: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vraṇāci dṛmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12746: paṭalaṃ nāśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12750: śvetārkasya tu vai mūlaṃ tasyāstadgulmaśūlanut // GarP_1,189.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12752: ṛtuśuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate // GarP_1,189.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12760: sārdhaṃ sa vairaṃ saṃyāti pumānstrī vā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,189.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12762: sarvaṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyecca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12767: trisaptāhena vai pītaṃ kṣayarogaṃ kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,189.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12773: mukhe tu nihitaṃ rudra harennānāviṣaṃ bahu // GarP_1,189.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12774: haste baddhaṃ kāṇḍayuktaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ grahādihṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12778: paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makarādibhayaṃ na vai // GarP_1,189.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12779: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12783: pītañcāśu haratyeva gaṇḍamālāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,190.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12792: niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12794: pītaṃ vidradhinutsyācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12800: pratyūṣe bhakṣayeccaiva tasya kuṣṭhaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12805: somarājasya bījānāṃ jagdhaṃ pathyena dadrunut // GarP_1,190.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12809: ayaṃ lepo hanti dadruṃ pāmānaṃ ca garaṃ tathā // GarP_1,190.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12812: takrānnapānato rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12819: mūlakasya tu bījāni hyapā mārgarasena vai /
GP12garup1_u:12820: piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakaṃ rudra naśyati // GarP_1,190.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12826: jalapiṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā mandānalenahi // GarP_1,190.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12833: salodhrāṇi ca tallepo dehadurgandhatāṃ haret // GarP_1,190.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12838: madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya raso madhu /
GP12garup1_u:12841: prātaḥ kāle toyapānātpīnasaṃ dāruṇaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12842: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12843: pītaṃ sakāñjikaṃ hanti svarabhedaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,190.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12845: manaḥ śilā balāmūlaṃ kolapaṇa ca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,190.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12846: jātipatraṃ kolapatraṃ tathā caiva manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12848: dhūmapānaṃ kāsaharaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.30 //
GP12garup1_u:12855: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12859: vāri pītaṃ tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ // GarP_1,191.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12861: sa pannagairna dṛśyeta yāvajjīvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,191.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12865: gṛhṇīyāllepato vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,191.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12868: mahākālasya vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ tatkāñjikena vai /
GP12garup1_u:12869: voḍrāṇāṃ ḍuṇḍubhānāṃ ca tallopo harate viṣam // GarP_1,191.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12871: ghṛtena saha pītantu haretsarvāviṣāṇi ca // GarP_1,191.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12875: pītaḥ sadugdho hanyācca daṃśakasyaviṣaṃ ca vai // GarP_1,191.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12876: tathā kodravamūlasya mohasya hara eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:12877: yaṣṭīmadhusamāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā // GarP_1,191.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12878: sadugdhā ca trirātreṇa mūṣakānāṃ viṣaṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:12881: ghṛtaṃ saśarkaraṃ ṣītvā madyapānamado na vai // GarP_1,191.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12887: karañjaṃ piṣitaṃ caiva hyarkamūlaṃ ca śaṅkara // GarP_1,191.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12890: kharjūrakaviṣaṃ naśyettadā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12893: śatapuṣpā saindhavañca sājyaṃ vā tena lepayet /
GP12garup1_u:12894: śirīṣasya tu bījaṃvai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,191.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12902: nāgeśvaro daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakā hara /
GP12garup1_u:12905: tilāśca sarṣapā hanyurviṣaṃ vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12906: ghṛtaṃ kumārīpatraṃ vai dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ hara /
GP12garup1_u:12908: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12912: śuṇṭhyā bhāgāśca catvāro maricānāṃ dvayaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12920: balā cātibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā /
GP12garup1_u:12921: eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇo guḍūcī kapikacchukā // GarP_1,192.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12924: ājaṃ vā yadi gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ dattvā caturguṇam /
GP12garup1_u:12936: etaddhi puraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param // GarP_1,192.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12944: granthikaṃ viḍamustaṃ ca madhu śuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,192.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12954: gorocanā priyaṅguśca balā caiva tathā nakhī // GarP_1,192.21 //
GP12garup1_u:12955: saralaṃ saptaparṇaṃ ca lākṣā cāmalakī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12956: tathā tu padmakaṃ caiva hyetaistailaṃ prasādhayet // GarP_1,192.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12958: gacchati strīśataṃ rudra bandhyāpi labhate sutam // GarP_1,192.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12959: yavānī citrakaṃ dhānyaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ jīrakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12962: tathār'śogulmaśvayathuṃ hanti vahniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,192.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12963: maricaṃ trivṛtaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12964: devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī ca candanam // GarP_1,192.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12966: eṣāñca kārṣiko bhāgo viṣasyārdhapalaṃ bhavett // GarP_1,192.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12968: mṛtpātre lohapātre vā śanairmṛdvagninā pacet // GarP_1,192.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12976: śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somo brāhmī brahmasuvarcalāḥ // GarP_1,192.32 //
GP12garup1_u:12981: agnimantho vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam /
GP12garup1_u:12983: apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śatāvarī /
GP12garup1_u:12993: katakasya phalaṃ śaṅkhaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.40 //
GP12garup1_u:12994: phenī rasāñjanaṃ kṣaudraṃ viḍaṅgāni manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12995: eṣāṃ vartirhanti kācaṃ timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.41 //
GP12garup1_u:12999: punarnavā gokṣurakaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.43 //
GP12garup1_u:13007: pippalī ca kadambañca palāśaṃ lodhratindukam // GarP_1,192.47 //
GP12garup1_u:13011: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvinavatyadhika śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13017: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ kuryānnirmalāñca matiṃ parām // GarP_1,193.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13018: siddhārthakaṃ vacā hiṅgu karañjaṃ devadāru ca /
GP12garup1_u:13019: mañjiṣṭhā triphalā viśvaṃ śirīṣo rajanīdvayam // GarP_1,193.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13024: nimbaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haridre dve śigru sarṣapajaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13025: devadāru paṭolañca dhānyaṃ takreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,193.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13026: dehaṃ tailākta gātraṃ vai nayedudvartanena ca /
GP12garup1_u:13027: pāmāḥ kuṣṭhāni naśyeyuḥ kaṇḍūṃ hanti ca niścitam // GarP_1,193.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13028: sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ kṣāro rājikā lavaṇaṃ viḍam /
GP12garup1_u:13035: pariṇāmasamutthasya śūlasya ca hitaṃ param // GarP_1,193.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13037: śṛṅgī punarnavā śuṇṭhī jagdhā kāsaṃ nihanti vai // GarP_1,193.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13039: śarkarāyā samaṃ caiva jagdhaṃ jvaraharaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,193.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13040: triphalā badaraṃ drākṣā pippalī ca virekakṛt /
GP12garup1_u:13044: haṃsa eṣāñca viṇmūtraṃ māṃsaṃ vā roma śoṇitam /
GP12garup1_u:13049: dhyāto 'rcitaḥ stuto vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,193.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13050: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe trinavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13054: yena rakṣā kṛtā śambhordaityānkṣapayataḥ purā // GarP_1,194.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13060: harirme rakṣatu śiro hṛdayañca janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,194.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13061: mano mama hṛṣīkeśo jihvāṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13062: prātu netre vāsudevaḥ śrotre saṅkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ // GarP_1,194.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13063: pradyumnaḥ pātu me ghrāṇamaniruddhastu carma ca /
GP12garup1_u:13065: pārśvaṃ rakṣatu me cakraṃ vāmaṃ daityanivāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:13067: udaraṃ musalaṃ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ me pātu lāṅgalam /
GP12garup1_u:13068: ūrdhvaṃ rakṣatu me śārṅgaṃ jaṅghe rakṣatu nandakaḥ // GarP_1,194.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13069: pārṣṇo rakṣatu śaṅkhaśca padmaṃ me caraṇāvubhau /
GP12garup1_u:13070: sarvakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pātu māṃ garuḍaḥ sadā // GarP_1,194.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13071: varāho rakṣatu jale viṣameṣu ca vāmanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13072: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhaśca sarvataḥ pātu keśavaḥ // GarP_1,194.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13074: sāṃkhyācāryastu kapilo dhātusāmyaṃ karotu me // GarP_1,194.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13078: haṃso matsyastathā kūrmaḥ pātu māṃ sarvatodiśam // GarP_1,194.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13080: tathā nārāyaṇo devo buddhiṃ pālayatāṃ mama // GarP_1,194.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13082: vaḍavāmukho nāśayatāṃ kalmaṣaṃ yatkṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,194.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13083: padbhyāṃ dadātu paramaṃ sukhaṃ mūrdhni mama prabhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13086: rakṣoghnastu daśarathiḥ pātu nityaṃ mahābhujaḥ // GarP_1,194.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13089: kṛṣṇasya yo bālabhāvaḥ sa me kāmānprayacchatu // GarP_1,194.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13093: dhanyo 'haṃ nirbhayo nityaṃ yasya me bhagavānhariḥ // GarP_1,194.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13095: vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ baddhvā vicarāmi mahītale // GarP_1,194.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13099: yo māṃ paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ yañcaḥ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā /
GP12garup1_u:13101: vāsudevasya yaccakraṃ tasya cakrasya ye tvarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13102: te hi cchindantu pāpānme mama hiṃsantu hiṃsakān // GarP_1,194.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13104: vivāde rājamārgeṣu dyūteṣu kalaheṣu ca // GarP_1,194.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13109: ayaṃ bhagavato mantro mantrāṇāṃ paramo mahān /
GP12garup1_u:13124: oṃ namo bhuvaneśāya trilokadhātre iha viṭi siviṭi siviṭi svāhā/
GP12garup1_u:13125: oṃ namaḥ ayokhetaye ye ye saṃjñāpaya
GP12garup1_u:13128: kuru sphuṭa sphuṭa sphuṭa prakoṭa laphaṭa vikaṭadaṃṣṭra pūrvato rakṣatu oṃ hai hai
GP12garup1_u:13129: hai hai dinakarasahasrakālasamāhato jaya paścimato rakṣa oṃ nivi nivi pradīptajvalanajvālākāra
GP12garup1_u:13130: mahākapila uttarato rakṣa oṃ vili vili mili mili garuḍi garuḍi gaurīgāndhārīviṣamohaviṣamaviṣamāṃ
GP12garup1_u:13131: mahohayatu svāhā dakṣiṇato rakṣa māṃ paśya sarvabhūtabhayopadravebhyo rakṣa rakṣa
GP12garup1_u:13132: jaya jaya vijaya tena hīyate riputrāsāhaṅkṛtavādyato bhayanudabhayato 'bhayaṃ diśatucyutaṃ /
GP12garup1_u:13136: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiṣṇavakavacakathanaṃ nāma caturnavatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13144: tvadrūpāṇi ca sarvāṇi tasmāttubhyaṃ namo namaḥ // GarP_1,195.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13147: mṛnmayīṃ vahasi kṣoṇīṃ tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13153: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe pañcanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13163: nyaseddhṛdaya oṅkāraṃ manuṃ mūrdhni samastakam // GarP_1,196.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13165: oṃ viṣṇave iti imaṃ mantranyāsamudīrayet // GarP_1,196.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13169: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhastu rāmo rakṣatu parvate // GarP_1,196.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13171: karmabandhācca kapilo datto rogācca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13173: nārado 'nyārcanāddevaḥ kūrmo vai nairṛte sadā // GarP_1,196.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13178: madhuhā cāparāhne ca sāyaṃ rakṣatu mādhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13182: śaṅkhaḥ padmaṃ ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgaṃ vai garuḍastathā /
GP12garup1_u:13184: śeṣaḥ sarpasvarūpaśca sadā sarvatra pātu mām /
GP12garup1_u:13185: vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaśca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13187: sa vaśī syādvipāpmā ca rogamukto divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,196.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13188: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13194: kṣityādiṣveva vargāśca hyete vai maṇḍalādhipāḥ // GarP_1,197.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13197: saṣaḍaṅgaḥ śivaḥ prokto hṛcchiraśca śikhā kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:13203: hṛdi pāṇitale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13214: karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaśca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau // GarP_1,197.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13216: vāyumaṇḍalasaṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset // GarP_1,197.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13218: parvasandhiṣu ca nyasyā jayā ca vijayā tathā // GarP_1,197.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13220: kaniṣṭhādau hṛdādau ca śikhāyāṃ karayornyaset // GarP_1,197.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13222: bhūtānāñca punarnyāsaḥ śivāṅgāni tathaiva ca // GarP_1,197.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13229: karanyāsaṃ svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punarnyaset /
GP12garup1_u:13232: evañcāpyāyanaṃ kṛtvā mūrdhni sañcintya cātmanaḥ // GarP_1,197.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13235: etāṃ bhagavatīṃ pṛthvīṃ svadehe vinyased budhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13238: nābhigrīvāntare nyasya trikoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ raveḥ // GarP_1,197.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13244: lakārāntā binduyutā mantrā bhūtakrameṇa tu // GarP_1,197.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13249: tārkṣyaṃ dhyāyettato nityaṃ viṣe sthāvarajaṅgame // GarP_1,197.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13252: dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyāto nāgānāṃ caiva bhūtayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13253: evaṃ dhyātvā karma kuryādātmatattvādikaṃ kramāt // GarP_1,197.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13254: tritattvaṃ pratham dattvā sivatattvaṃ tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:13255: yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnāṃ ca parvasu // GarP_1,197.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13257: kandaṃ nālaṃ tathā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca // GarP_1,197.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13259: śaumiti karṇikāmadhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam // GarP_1,197.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13261: patrāntakesarānte tu dvau dvau pūrvādikau tathā // GarP_1,197.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13263: vāmādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāstritattvantu tato nyaset // GarP_1,197.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13265: karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddevaṃ sāṃgaṃ tatra puraḥ saram // GarP_1,197.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13267: tejastu dakṣiṇe patre vāyuṃ pūrveṇa pūjayet // GarP_1,197.38 //
GP12garup1_u:13270: vaṃ ca tvīśe sadā pūjya oṃ hṛdisthañca pūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:13273: āgneyyāṃ hṛdayaṃ pūjya śira īśānagocare // GarP_1,197.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13274: nairṛtye tu śikhāṃ dadyādvāyavyāṃ kavacaṃ nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:13279: pūjayecca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_1,197.44 //
GP12garup1_u:13289: pādau pātālaṃ saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāstu saṃśritāḥ // GarP_1,197.49 //
GP12garup1_u:13290: sapta svargā urasi ca brahmāṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhamāśritam /
GP12garup1_u:13295: grasanaṃ bhīmavaktraṃ ca garuḍaṃ mantravigraham // GarP_1,197.52 //
GP12garup1_u:13297: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā yadyanmanasi cintayet // GarP_1,197.53 //
GP12garup1_u:13302: evaṃ sa garuḍaṃ proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:13303: maheśvaro yathā gaurīṃ prāha vidyāṃ tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,197.55 //
GP12garup1_u:13304: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13308: oṃ hrīṃ āgaccha devi aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:13309: oṃ hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madanakṣobhiṇā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13310: ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇarekhayā hrīṃ madanāntare ca /
GP12garup1_u:13311: aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā vāgati madanāntarekhe khanetrāvalīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13313: oṃ hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityaṃ madadrave krīṃ namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13315: oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ paścimavaktraṃ oṃ aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathottaram /
GP12garup1_u:13317: oṃ hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aiṃ kapālāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13318: ādyaṃ bhayaṃ aiṃ hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace /
GP12garup1_u:13320: pūrve kāmarūpāya asitāṅgāya bhairavāya namo brahmāṇyai /
GP12garup1_u:13321: dakṣiṇe cai kandāya vai namaḥ rurubhaivāya māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet // GarP_1,198.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13323: kaumāryai cottare colkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai // GarP_1,198.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13325: rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai // GarP_1,198.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13331: jvālāmukhīkramaṃ vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyataḥ śubhā // GarP_1,198.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13333: mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā // GarP_1,198.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13334: brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13335: vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā cāparājitā // GarP_1,198.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13339: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13343: sūryaṃ devīṃ gaṇaṃ soma smṛtvā tu vilikhennaraḥ // GarP_1,199.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13346: dhvajo dhūmo 'tha siṃhaśca śvā vṛṣaḥ kharadantinau /
GP12garup1_u:13347: dhvāṅkṣaśca aṣṭamo jñeyo nāma mantraiśca tānnyaset // GarP_1,199.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13349: dhvajasthāne sthito dhūmro dhātucintā ca lābhakṛt // GarP_1,199.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13352: dhvajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintā ca lābhakam /
GP12garup1_u:13353: dhvajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khakleśādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13355: dhvajasthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśacintā dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13356: dhūmrasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tato dhanam /
GP12garup1_u:13357: dhūmre dhūmraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā kaliduḥ khādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13359: dhūmrasthāne śuni sthite jayalābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13361: dhūmrasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādhiścāpi dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13369: siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmasvāmitvameva ca // GarP_1,199.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13373: śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalahaṃ kāryanāśanam // GarP_1,199.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13375: sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhananāśo bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,199.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13376: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogī rogādvi mucyate /
GP12garup1_u:13377: śunaḥ sthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13379: śvasthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍāsyātkulanāśanam // GarP_1,199.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13383: sthite śuni vṛṣasthāne balaśrīkāma īritaḥ // GarP_1,199.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13385: vṛṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahālābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13389: kharasthāne sthite dhūmre taskarādibhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13393: kharasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khīpīḍādi nirdiśet // GarP_1,199.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13395: kharasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalaho vyādhireva ca // GarP_1,199.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13399: sthite śuni gajasthāne ārogyaṃ sukhasampadaḥ // GarP_1,199.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13401: gajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tataḥ sukham // GarP_1,199.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13405: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ khaṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,199.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13406: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite siṃhe vigraho duḥ khameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13412: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13424: saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśaproktā divā rātrau varānane // GarP_1,200.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13430: vāyurvahati tatrasthaḥ praśro bhūtasya śobhanaḥ // GarP_1,200.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13431: māhendre vāruṇe vāte ko 'pi doṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:13433: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13439: ekāṇḍaścaiva jātāṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvikhurī stanī // GarP_1,201.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13444: asaṃhatā ye ca vāhā hrasvakarṇāstathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13460: nimbapatraṃ paṭo lañca triphalā khadiraṃ tathā // GarP_1,201.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13463: savraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailaṃ sarṣapajaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:13472: kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte catriphalāmbubhiḥ // GarP_1,201.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13476: bhojayetpāyasaṃ dugdhaṃ satvaraṃ susthiro hayaḥ // GarP_1,201.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13477: vikāre bhojane dugdhaṃ śālyannaṃ vātale dadet /
GP12garup1_u:13480: bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣādau tu gugguluḥ // GarP_1,201.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13483: pāne ca bhojane caiva aśītipalakaṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:13486: mandāgnau śotharoge ca gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojitam // GarP_1,201.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13488: deyaṃ kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ māṃsairyuktaṃ ca bhojanam // GarP_1,201.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13490: prabhāte ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ śaradgīṣme ca vājinām // GarP_1,201.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13494: catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi // GarP_1,201.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13496: mriyate ca yadā kṣipramupasargaṃ tamādiśet // GarP_1,201.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13500: ādau pañca tataḥ pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇaśatāvadhi /
GP12garup1_u:13501: uttamā ca śataṃ mātrāstvaśītiḥ ṣaṣṭireva vā // GarP_1,201.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13509: baliṃ dadyācca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayecca caturghaṭaiḥ // GarP_1,201.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13511: bhūtarakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇaṃ rakṣayetsadā // GarP_1,201.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13516: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13520: sarasaṃ yoniniḥ kṣiptaṃ varāṅgasya vyathāṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:13525: naśyeta ghṛtapakvā ca kāryāvaśyantu polikā // GarP_1,202.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13531: pāṭhāmūlaṃ rudra pītaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,202.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13535: ghṛtatulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha // GarP_1,202.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13536: pradaraṃ harate rogaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:13537: dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ harecchiva // GarP_1,202.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13543: pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitaṃ śarapuṅkhayā // GarP_1,202.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13545: mātuluṅgasya vai mūlaṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ prasūtikṛt // GarP_1,202.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13547: utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syādānyathā sutā // GarP_1,202.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13548: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇāṃ śirasi sthite /
GP12garup1_u:13549: garbhaśūlaṃ vinaśyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,202.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13551: yoniḥ subhā syādvṛddhāyā yuvatyāḥ kiṃ punarhara // GarP_1,202.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13561: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rudra jarāṃ nayati saṃkṣayam // GarP_1,202.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13563: jagdhvā māsaṃ yuvā syācca naro vāgīśvarī bhavet // GarP_1,202.22 //
