GP12garup1_u:13565: balāni kuryānnāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitaṃ śiva // GarP_1,202.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13571: strīṇāṃ śataṃ mahādeva tatkṣaṇānnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,202.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13576: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13579: yā gaurdveṣṭiṃ svakaṃ vatsaṃ tasyā deyaṃ svakaṃ payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13580: lavaṇena samāyuktaṃ tasyā vatsaḥ priyo bhavet // GarP_1,203.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13581: śuno 'sthi kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ hi mahiṣāṇāṃ gavā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13582: kṛmijālaṃ pātayati sakalaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,203.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13589: kṣīre go-mahīṣasyaiva goḥ puṃsaśca hitaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,203.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13594: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13598: ata nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnāṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_1,204.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13600: lāṅgalī kalasī caiva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā // GarP_1,204.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13603: jhaṣā nāgabalā jñeyā śvadaṃṣṭrā gokṣuro mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13604: śatāvarī varā bhīru pīvarīndīvarī varī // GarP_1,204.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13605: vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā /
GP12garup1_u:13606: dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syātkṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā // GarP_1,204.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13610: tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayonyaṅkasaṃjñayā /
GP12garup1_u:13611: nyagrodhastu vaṭo jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13618: tṛtīyā jalajambūḥ syānnādeyī sā ca kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13619: kaṇā kṛṣṇopakuñcī ca śauṇḍī māgadhiketi ca // GarP_1,204.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13621: ūṣaṇaṃ maricaṃ jñeyaṃ śuṇṭhī viśvaṃ mahauṣadham // GarP_1,204.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13623: lāṅgalī halinī ca syāccheyasī gaja pippalī // GarP_1,204.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13626: ṣaḍgranthogrā vacā jñeyā śvetā haimavatīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13627: kuṭajo vṛkṣakaḥ śakro vatsako girimāllikā // GarP_1,204.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13629: mustakto meghanāmā syātkauntī jñeyā hareṇukā // GarP_1,204.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13630: elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13631: padmā bhārṅgo tathā kāñjī jñeyā brāhmaṇayaṣṭikā // GarP_1,204.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13635: ajājī jīrakaṃ jñeyā kāravī copakuñcikā // GarP_1,204.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13637: tagaraṃ syānnataṃ vakraṃ cocaṃ tvacavarāṅgakam // GarP_1,204.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13644: kāśmarī kaṭphalā jñeyā śrīparṇo ceti kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13645: śallakī gajabhakṣyā ca patrī ca surabhī stravaḥ // GarP_1,204.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13647: pathyābhayā ca vijñeyā pūtanā ca harītakī // GarP_1,204.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13651: dhātakī tāmraparṇo syātsamaṅgā kuñjarā matā // GarP_1,204.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13653: vidyādraktaṃ candanaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ raktacandanam // GarP_1,204.28 //
GP12garup1_u:13654: kākolī ca smṛtā vīrā vayasyā cārkapuṣpikā /
GP12garup1_u:13655: śṛṅgī karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca mahāghoṣā ca kīrtitā // GarP_1,204.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13657: mṛdvikā ca smṛtā drākṣā tathā gostanikā matā // GarP_1,204.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13659: sārañca gopavallī ca gopī bhadrā ca kathyate // GarP_1,204.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13660: dantī kaṭaṅkaṭerī ca jñeyā dāruniśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13661: haridrā rajanī proktā pītikā rātrināmikā // GarP_1,204.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13663: vasukoṭaśca vijñeyo vāśiraḥ kāmpillo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13665: ghaṇṭākaḥ śuṣkako jñeyo vaco 'tha sūcako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13667: vajravṛkṣo mahāvṛkṣaḥ snuhī snukca sudhā guḍā // GarP_1,204.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13671: jñeyā sugandhiparṇoti vāsantī kulajeti ca // GarP_1,204.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13674: indī varaṃ kuvalayaṃ padmaṃ nīlotpalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:13679: kabarī kumbhako dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣudvidho dhanakṛttathā // GarP_1,204.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13681: prācī balā nadīkrāntā kākajaṅghātha vāyasī // GarP_1,204.42 //
GP12garup1_u:13685: aśvatthā bahupatrā ca vijñeyā cāmalakyapi // GarP_1,204.44 //
GP12garup1_u:13686: arūṣakraṃ patra śūkaṃ kṣīrī rājādanaṃ matam /
GP12garup1_u:13687: mahāpatraṃ dāḍimaṃ ca tameva karakaṃ vadet // GarP_1,204.45 //
GP12garup1_u:13690: vidyā kuntī nikumbhā ca tribhaṅgī tripuṭī trivṛt /
GP12garup1_u:13691: saptalā yavatiktā ca carmā carmakaseti ca // GarP_1,204.47 //
GP12garup1_u:13693: gavākṣī cāmṛtā śvetā girikarṇo gavādinī // GarP_1,204.48 //
GP12garup1_u:13695: hemakṣīrī smṛtā pītā gaurī vai kāladugdhikā // GarP_1,204.49 //
GP12garup1_u:13699: pratyakpuṣpī kharī jñeyā apāmārgo mayūrakaḥ // GarP_1,204.51 //
GP12garup1_u:13701: jīvako jīvaśākaśca karburañca śaṭīṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,204.52 //
GP12garup1_u:13709: suraṅgītagaraḥ snāyuḥ kalanāśā tu vāyasī // GarP_1,204.56 //
GP12garup1_u:13721: dhātukāśīśakāśī ca saṃjñeyaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,204.62 //
GP12garup1_u:13724: śilā manaḥ śilā jñeyā nepālī kulaṭīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13725: ālaṃ manastālakaṃ vā haritālaṃ vinirdiśet // GarP_1,204.64 //
GP12garup1_u:13729: mākṣikaṃ madhu ca kṣaudraṃ tacca puṣparasaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,204.66 //
GP12garup1_u:13731: sītā sitopalā caiva matsyaṇḍīśarkarā smṛtā // GarP_1,204.67 //
GP12garup1_u:13737: tripuṭaḥ puṭasaṃjñaśca kalāpo laṅgako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.70 //
GP12garup1_u:13739: picukaṃ pitalaṃ cākṣaṃ biḍālapadakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,204.71 //
GP12garup1_u:13742: palaṃ bilvañca muṣṭiḥ syāddve pale prasṛtiṃ vadet /
GP12garup1_u:13745: caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prastha prasthāścatvāra āḍhakaḥ // GarP_1,204.74 //
GP12garup1_u:13747: tulā palaśataṃ proktaṃ bhāgo viṃśatpalaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,204.75 //
GP12garup1_u:13752: śaṅkhaḥ śuktinakhaḥ śaṅkho vyāghro vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13754: raso gandharaso bole sarjaḥ sarjaraso mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13755: priyaṅguḥ phalinī śyāmā gaurī kānteti cocyate // GarP_1,204.79 //
GP12garup1_u:13757: śigruḥ śobhāñjano nāma jñānamānaśca kīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,204.80 //
GP12garup1_u:13759: moraṭā pīluparṇo ca tuṇḍī syāttuṇḍikerikā // GarP_1,204.81 //
GP12garup1_u:13760: madano gālavo bodho ghoṭā ghoṭī ca kathyate /
GP12garup1_u:13763: dantī kākendutiktā syātkaṇṭakī ca vikaṅkataḥ // GarP_1,204.83 //
GP12garup1_u:13765: vayasthā ca viśalyā ca cchinnā chinnaruhā matā // GarP_1,204.84 //
GP12garup1_u:13769: nāmānyetāni ca hare vanyānāṃ bheṣajāṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13770: ato vyākaraṇaṃ vakṣye kumāroktañca śaunaka // GarP_1,204.86 //
GP12garup1_u:13771: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13776: suptiṅantaṃ padaṃ khyātaṃ supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13777: svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadikātmake // GarP_1,205.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13780: amauśaso dvitīyā syāttatkarma kriyate ca yat /
GP12garup1_u:13783: yena kriyate karaṇaṃ tatkartā yaḥ karoti saḥ // GarP_1,205.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13785: yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam // GarP_1,205.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13787: yato 'paiti samādatte upādatte bhayaṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,205.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13789: ṅayoḥ supo vai saptamī syātsā cādhikaraṇe bhavet // GarP_1,205.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13795: anureṣu sahārthe ca hīne 'nūpaśca kathyate // GarP_1,205.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13797: aprāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manyakarmaṇyanādare // GarP_1,205.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13803: nirdhāraṇe dve vibhakto ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayogake // GarP_1,205.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13805: hiṃsārthānāṃ prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13807: dvividhaṃ prātipadikaṃ nāma dhātustathaiva ca // GarP_1,205.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13808: bhūvāndibhyastiṅo laḥ syāllakārā daśa vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13813: nāmni prayujyamāne 'pi prathamaḥ puruṣo bhavet // GarP_1,205.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13815: bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ proktāḥ sanādyantāstathā tataḥ // GarP_1,205.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13820: liṅatīte parokṣe syālliḍ bhūte ḷḍ bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:13823: kṛtastriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13825: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13829: viprāḥ svasāgatā vīdaṃ suttamaṃ syātpitṝṣabhaḥ // GarP_1,206.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13833: vadhvāsanañca pitrartho lanubandho naye jayet // GarP_1,206.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13834: nāyako lavaṇaṃ gāvasta ete na ta īśvarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13835: devīgṛhamatho atra a avehi paṭū imau // GarP_1,206.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13836: amī aśvāḥ ṣaḍasyeti tanna vāk ṣaḍdalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:13843: kaḥśete caiva kaḥṣaṇḍaḥ kasko yāti ca gauravam // GarP_1,206.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13844: ka ihātra ka evāhurdevā āhuśca bho vraja /
GP12garup1_u:13847: kuṭīcchāyā tathā chāyā sandhayo 'nye tathedṛśāḥ // GarP_1,206.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13848: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13849: dvigustrivedī grāmaśca ayaṃ tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,206.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13853: taddhitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivo brāhayaṃ ca brahmatādayaḥ // GarP_1,206.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13857: ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣabrahmahaṇau halī // GarP_1,206.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13861: jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrīstrībhūmirvadhūrapi // GarP_1,206.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13862: bhrūḥ punarbhūstathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13867: paṭuḥ kamalabhūḥ kartā sumato bahavaḥ sunauḥ // GarP_1,206.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13869: sarvaviśvobha ye cobhau ekonyānyatarāṇi ca // GarP_1,206.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13877: truṭyati mriyate caiva cicīṣati ninīṣati // GarP_1,206.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13884: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācāradṛ nāma ṣaḍuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13887: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ natvā gaṇaṃ śambhuṃ sarasvatīm /
GP12garup1_u:13889: sarvādimadhyāntagalau mnau bhyau jrau stau trikā gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13892: sānusvāraśca pādānto vā ityukto dvimātrakaḥ // GarP_1,207.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13893: yadā nāpi kramaṃ yoge laghutāpi kvacidguroḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13895: jñeyaḥ pādaśca turyāṃśo yuk samaṃ viṣamantvayuk /
GP12garup1_u:13897: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13900: āryālakṣma tvaṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā jo viṣame na hi /
GP12garup1_u:13901: ṣaṣṭhe jo nlau vāpi bhavet padaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dvitīyalāt // GarP_1,208.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13902: āditaḥ saptame hrasvā dvitīyārdhe śare tataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13909: ṣaṭ kalā viṣame cetsyuḥ same 'ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13910: samā parāśritā na syādvaitālīye ralau guruḥ // GarP_1,208.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13913: parāśrito dvitīyo laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣvapi // GarP_1,208.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13921: nikhile vā saitavasya mrau ntau cābdhestatpūrvakau // GarP_1,208.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13928: guruvo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam // GarP_1,208.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13932: saptaviṃśātilā gantā dalayo rucirā dvayoḥ // GarP_1,208.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13933: mātrāvṛttāni coktāni varṇavṛttāni vacmi vai // GarP_1,208.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13934: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13937: śrīrukthā gena sā jñeyā utyukthā strī gurudvayam /
GP12garup1_u:13938: mo nārī ro mṛgī madhyā magau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā // GarP_1,209.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13939: bho gau paṅktiḥ suprātiṣṭhā tanumadhyā tayau smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:13940: nayābhyāṃ bālalalitā gāyatrīcchanda eva hi // GarP_1,209.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13942: bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā mamau gagau // GarP_1,209.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13943: māṇavakaṃ bhāttalagā mnau gau haṃsarutaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:13946: ranasaiḥ syāddhalamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:13947: bṛhatīchanda ityuktaṃ smau jagau sa virājitam // GarP_1,209.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13949: rajābhyāñca ragābhyāñca rukmavatī bhamau sagau // GarP_1,209.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13952: tau jo gāvindravajrā syājjatajgā gupapūrvikā // GarP_1,209.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13954: bhabhabhā gau dodhakaṃ syācchālinī matatā gagau // GarP_1,209.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13956: śrīrbhatau nanagāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍūbhireva ca // GarP_1,209.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13958: rathoddhatār nau ralagāḥ svāgatā ranabhā gagau // GarP_1,209.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13959: vṛttā nanau sagau gaḥ syānnau ralau gaḥ samadrikā /
GP12garup1_u:13960: rajarā lgau śyenikā syājjasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam /
GP12garup1_u:13962: ranau bhasau candravartma vaṃśasthaṃ syājjatau jarau /
GP12garup1_u:13964: nbhau bhrau drutavilambitaṃ puṭaśca syānnanau mayau // GarP_1,209.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13966: nanararaiḥ samākhyātā nayanā yastathā bhavet // GarP_1,209.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13968: jasau jasau ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā // GarP_1,209.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13970: prayaṃvadā nabhajraiśca maṇimālā tayau tayau // GarP_1,209.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13972: pramitākṣarā sajasasairujjvalā tu nanau bharau // GarP_1,209.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13975: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamāvṛttaṃ turagaiśca rasairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13976: praharṣiṇī manau jrau gā vahnibhirdaśabhiryatiḥ // GarP_1,209.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13977: jabhau sajau go rucirā caturbhiśca grahairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13979: mañjubhāṣiṇī sajsā jgau sunandinī sajasā magau /
GP12garup1_u:13980: nanau tatau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiśca rasairyatiḥ // GarP_1,209.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13982: nanarāḥ so ladhuguruḥ svaraiḥ proktāparājitā // GarP_1,209.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13984: vasantatilakā siṃhonnatā tabhjā jagau guruḥ // GarP_1,209.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13986: naranā ralagāḥ pāde śarkarī pratipāditā // GarP_1,209.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13990: vasusvarayatiḥ syācca najau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam // GarP_1,209.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13992: marau mayau yaśca bhavedukteyamati śarkarī // GarP_1,209.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13996: vasugrayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasayalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13998: ṣaḍvedāśvaiśca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14000: nardaṭakaṃ najabhajā jalau go yatireva ca // GarP_1,209.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14002: bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatā mtau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,209.32 //
GP12garup1_u:14006: saptāśvartuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14007: vṛttaṃ rajau rajau pāde rajau go laḥ kṛtirbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:14009: digarkairbhadrakaṃ bhrau nrau naranā go yathākṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14010: najau bhaśvāśvalalitaṃ jabhau jabhalagā bhavet // GarP_1,209.36 //
GP12garup1_u:14015: nau nau go 'tikṛtiḥ proktā cchando hyutkṛtirucyate /
GP12garup1_u:14018: guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasairbāṇairmonāḥ ṣaṭsagagā gaṇāḥ // GarP_1,209.40 //
GP12garup1_u:14021: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14025: same bhau bhagagāḥ syuśca drutamadhyā bhabhau bhagau // GarP_1,210.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14026: gaḥ pāde viṣame 'nyatra najau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau // GarP_1,210.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14027: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14028: pāde 'same tajau ro gaḥ same masau jagau garuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14029: bhavedbhadravirāṭ ketumatī tu viṣame sajau // GarP_1,210.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14030: sagau same bhrau nagagā ākhyānakī tvathāsame /
GP12garup1_u:14031: tau jo gagau same pāde jatajā gurukadvayam // GarP_1,210.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14033: tatau jagau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hyudāhṛtam // GarP_1,210.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14034: pāde 'tha viṣame caiva puṣpitāgrā nanau rayau /
GP12garup1_u:14035: same najau jarau gaśca vaitālīyaṃ vadanti hi /
GP12garup1_u:14037: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syādayugme jarajā ragau // GarP_1,210.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14038: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'ddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14049: sajau salau ca prathame nasajā go dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:14050: tṛtīye bhanabhā gaśca caturthe sajasā jagau // GarP_1,211.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14055: gau dvitīye sanajarā gastṛtīye nanau ca saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14056: nau najau yaścaturthe syāccheṣa pādāśca pūrvavat // GarP_1,211.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14057: tṛtīrye 'ghrau viśeṣaśca vṛttaṃ syānnau sanau nasau // GarP_1,211.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14063: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśottaradviśaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14067: naṣṭamadhye sameṃ'ke laḥ same 'rdhe viṣame guruḥ // GarP_1,212.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14069: saṃkhyā dvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritam /
GP12garup1_u:14071: pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruḥ prastārato bhavet // GarP_1,212.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14074: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācā- chandolakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14078: brāhmaṇādisamācāraṃ sarvadaṃ te tathā vade // GarP_1,213.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14079: śrutismṛtī tu vijñāya śrautaṃ karma samācaret /
GP12garup1_u:14080: śrautaṃ karma na ceduktaṃ tadā smārtaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14082: śrutismṛtī ha viprāṇāṃ locane karmadarśane // GarP_1,213.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14085: satyaṃ dānaṃ dayālobho vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14086: aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14092: vidyā vittaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ kule janma tvarogitā // GarP_1,213.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14094: dharmātsukhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca jñānānmokṣo 'dhigamyate // GarP_1,213.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14100: pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣiḥ paṇyaṃ vaiśyasyājīvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14103: triḥ snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyaṃ gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14104: samekhalo jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā gurusaṃśrayaḥ // GarP_1,213.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14119: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaśauce kṣamā dayā /
GP12garup1_u:14120: varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14122: ā bodhātsvapanaṃ yāvat gṛhidharmaṃ ca vacmi te // GarP_1,213.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14128: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe ca divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ // GarP_1,213.26 //
GP12garup1_u:14129: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā /
GP12garup1_u:14130: chāyāyāmandhakāre vā rātrau vāhani vā dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14136: ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyādvāma haste mṛdaṃ dvidhā // GarP_1,213.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14138: ekāṃ liṅge gude tistrastathā vāmakare daśa // GarP_1,213.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14140: ardhaprasṛtimātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā // GarP_1,213.32 //
GP12garup1_u:14141: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tadardhā parikīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:14142: upaviṣṭastu viṇmūtraṃ kartuṃ yastu na vindati // GarP_1,213.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14143: sa kuryādardhaśaucaṃ tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā /
GP12garup1_u:14144: divā śaucasya rātryardhaṃ yadvā pādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,213.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14146: vasā śukramasṛṅ majjā lālā viṇmūtrakarṇaviṭ // GarP_1,213.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14148: manyeta yāvatā śuddhiṃ tāvacchaucaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.36 //
GP12garup1_u:14150: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14152: trirācāmedapaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāttato mukham // GarP_1,213.38 //
GP12garup1_u:14155: aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14156: kaniṣṭhāṅgaṣṭhayornābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai // GarP_1,213.40 //
GP12garup1_u:14158: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni triḥ paṭhanprīṇayetkramāt // GarP_1,213.41 //
GP12garup1_u:14161: khaṃ mukhe nāsike vāyuṃ netre sūryaṃ śrutī (tīrdi) diśaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14162: prāṇagranthimatho nābhiṃ brahmāṇaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet // GarP_1,213.43 //
GP12garup1_u:14168: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathārthavat // GarP_1,213.46 //
GP12garup1_u:14170: mukhe paryuṣite nityaṃ bhavatyaprayato naraḥ // GarP_1,213.47 //
GP12garup1_u:14177: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tadācāmet /
GP12garup1_u:14178: amāyāṃ ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipadyapi // GarP_1,213.51 //
GP12garup1_u:14180: abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyāṃ tathā tithau // GarP_1,213.52 //
GP12garup1_u:14182: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakaraṃ hitam // GarP_1,213.53 //
GP12garup1_u:14183: sarvamar hati śuddhātmā prātaḥ snāyī japādikam /
GP12garup1_u:14185: stravatyeṣa divā rātrau prātaḥ snānaṃ viśodhanam /
GP12garup1_u:14188: adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyāṃ jyeṣṭhake site // GarP_1,213.56 //
GP12garup1_u:14197: tisraḥ koṭyastu vijñeyā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14199: sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14201: ahorātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavatīti ha /
GP12garup1_u:14204: svayaṃ homaphalaṃ yattu tadanyena na jāyate // GarP_1,213.64 //
GP12garup1_u:14206: ebhireva hutaṃ yattu taddhutaṃ svayameva hi // GarP_1,213.65 //
GP12garup1_u:14210: samāhitātmā sāvitrīṃ praṇavaṃ ca yathoditam // GarP_1,213.67 //
GP12garup1_u:14212: tripadāyāṃ ca sāvitryāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // GarP_1,213.68 //
GP12garup1_u:14214: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā // GarP_1,213.69 //
GP12garup1_u:14221: pūrvāhna eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam /
GP12garup1_u:14222: na viṣṇoḥ paramo devastasmāttaṃ pūjayetsadā // GarP_1,213.73 //
GP12garup1_u:14228: taddānaṃ caiva śiṣyabhyo vedābhyāso hi pañcadhā // GarP_1,213.76 //
GP12garup1_u:14230: mūlyena lekhayitvā yo dadyādyāti sa vaidikam // GarP_1,213.77 //
GP12garup1_u:14234: mātā pitā gururbhrātā prajā dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ // GarP_1,213.79 //
GP12garup1_u:14242: kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // GarP_1,213.83 //
GP12garup1_u:14246: yā vṛttistāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīvedanāpadi // GarP_1,213.85 //
GP12garup1_u:14247: dhanaṃ tu trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14248: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyo vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // GarP_1,213.86 //
GP12garup1_u:14249: kramāyattaṃ prītidattaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GP12garup1_u:14250: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,213.87 //
GP12garup1_u:14255: śuddhārthaṃ labdhakarajaṃ daṇḍāptaṃ jayajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.89 //
GP12garup1_u:14259: āpatkāle svayaṃ kurvannainasā yujyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.91 //
GP12garup1_u:14263: kṛṣyādike bhavedbādhā sā kusīde na vidyate // GarP_1,213.93 //
GP12garup1_u:14264: śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyāṃ divasepi vā /
GP12garup1_u:14265: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanaṃ na nivartate // GarP_1,213.94 //
GP12garup1_u:14267: kusīdaṃ kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasyaiva jāyate // GarP_1,213.95 //
GP12garup1_u:14269: te tṛptāstasya taddoṣaṃ śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,213.96 //
GP12garup1_u:14276: vidyā śilpaṃ bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14277: vṛttirbhaikṣyaṃ kusīdaṃ ca daśa jīvanahetavaḥ // GarP_1,213.100 //
GP12garup1_u:14279: vaiśye nyāyārjitāḥ svārthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥ // GarP_1,213.101 //
GP12garup1_u:14285: sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyānna tuṣyettu svayaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,213.104 //
GP12garup1_u:14290: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snānārthaṃ mṛda māharet /
GP12garup1_u:14295: prātaḥ snānaṃ tadarthaṃ tu nityasnānaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_1,213.109 //
GP12garup1_u:14297: snānārhastu yadā snāti snānaṃ naimittikaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,213.110 //
GP12garup1_u:14301: snānaṃ samācaredyastu kriyāṅgaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,213.112 //
GP12garup1_u:14303: saraḥ sudevakhāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca // GarP_1,213.113 //
GP12garup1_u:14307: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ cāpi kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.115 //
GP12garup1_u:14311: tīrthatoyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ gāgaṃ puṇyaṃ tu sarvataḥ // GarP_1,213.117 //
GP12garup1_u:14313: gayāyāṃ ca kurukṣetre yattoyaṃ samupasthitam // GarP_1,213.118 //
GP12garup1_u:14315: putrajanmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ // GarP_1,213.119 //
GP12garup1_u:14316: rāhośca darśane snānaṃ praśastaṃ niśi nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:14319: yatphalaṃ dvādaśābdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet // GarP_1,213.121 //
GP12garup1_u:14322: prātaḥ snāyī bhavennityaṃ māsau dvau māghaphālgunau /
GP12garup1_u:14323: yastu māghaṃ samāsādya prātaḥ snāyī haviṣyabhuk // GarP_1,213.123 //
GP12garup1_u:14325: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi bhrātaraṃ suhṛdaṃ gurum // GarP_1,213.124 //
GP12garup1_u:14335: āgacchantu me pitara imaṃ gṛhṇantvapoñjalim // GarP_1,213.129 //
GP12garup1_u:14337: vasitvā vasanaṃ śuṣkaṃ sthalasthā starṇabarhiṣi // GarP_1,213.130 //
GP12garup1_u:14339: yadapāṃ krūramāṃsāttu yadamedhyaṃ tu kiñcana // GarP_1,213.131 //
GP12garup1_u:14341: gṛhītvānena mantreṇa toyaṃ savyena pāṇinā // GarP_1,213.132 //
GP12garup1_u:14345: punātu me tadindrastu varuṇaḥ sabṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_1,213.134 //
GP12garup1_u:14355: arcitaṃ syājjagādidaṃ tena sarvaṃ carācaram // GarP_1,213.139 //
GP12garup1_u:14367: gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇaṃ agnyagāre śatādhikam // GarP_1,213.145 //
GP12garup1_u:14370: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārthataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14373: sa pretya labhate svargamannadānaṃ samācaran // GarP_1,213.148 //
GP12garup1_u:14376: śākaṃ ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭhamatyantaṃ ca vivarjayet /
GP12garup1_u:14379: vaiśyasya cānnamevānnaṃ śūdrānnaṃ rudhiraṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.151 //
GP12garup1_u:14381: tatra śrīścaiva lakṣmīśca vasate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14382: udare gārhapatyāgniḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ // GarP_1,213.153 //
GP12garup1_u:14383: āsye cāhavanīyo 'gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani /
GP12garup1_u:14384: yaḥ pañcāgnīnimānveda āhitāgniḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,213.154 //
GP12garup1_u:14386: prāṇo hyagnistathādityastribhoktā eka eva tu // GarP_1,213.155 //
GP12garup1_u:14392: tataḥ sandhyāmupāsīta snātvā vai paścimāṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,213.158 //
GP12garup1_u:14395: ācārādirdharmakartā keśavo hi smṛto dvija // GarP_1,213.159 //
GP12garup1_u:14396: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14399: atha snānavidhiṃ vakṣye snānamūlā kriyā yataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14404: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdaṃ tāṃ tu gomayaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14405: adbhirmṛdbhiśca caraṇau prakṣālyātha karau tathā // GarP_1,214.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14409: oṃ uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaścakāra sūryāya panthānamanveta vā /
GP12garup1_u:14413: oṃ ye te śataṃ varuṇaye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14414: tebhirno adya savitota viṣṇurviśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:14415: sumitriyāna ityabañjalimākṛtyottareṇa toyaṃ paścādvirājya caiva viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:14416: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu /
GP12garup1_u:14417: durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smāndveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ // GarP_1,214.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14419: prakṣālya hastā vācamya namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,214.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14420: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍhamasya pāṃsure /
GP12garup1_u:14424: oṃ āpo asmānmātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu /
GP12garup1_u:14425: viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīrudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi // GarP_1,214.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14428: oṃ mānastoke tanaye mā na āyuṣi mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14429: mā no vīrānrudrabhāmino 'badhīrhaviṣmantaḥ sadamitvā havāmahe // GarP_1,214.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14431: imaṃme varuṇe dvābhyāṃ tvannaḥ satvanna ityapi // GarP_1,214.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14433: oṃ imaṃme varuṇa śrudhīhavamadyā ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyurācake // GarP_1,214.15 //
GP12garup1_u:14434: oṃ tattvayāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadāśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14435: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃ samāna āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14436: oṃ tvanno agne varuṇasya vidvāndevasya heḍo avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14438: oṃ sa tvanno agnevamo bhavatī nediṣṭho asyā uṣasovyuṣṭau /
GP12garup1_u:14439: avayakṣvano varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhimṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi /
GP12garup1_u:14440: oṃ āpo nauṣadhi hiṃsārdhamno rājastato varuṇo nomuñcā yadāharaghnyā iti varuṇeti śapārmahe tato varuṇa no muñca /
GP12garup1_u:14446: avadevairdevakṛtā manoyāsi samavatyai kṛtaṃ puṣpācchā devadhīmalpāhī // GarP_1,214.16 //
GP12garup1_u:14450: devīrāpa iti dvābhyāṃ āpodevā iti tryṛcā // GarP_1,214.18 //
GP12garup1_u:14451: drupadādiva iti ca śanno devīrapāṃ rasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14452: āpo devo pāvamānyaḥ punantvādyā ṛco nava // GarP_1,214.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14454: hiraṇyavarṇā iti ca pāvamānyastathā parāḥ // GarP_1,214.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14456: vāruṇyā bahavaḥ puṇyāḥ śaktitaḥ saṃprayojayet // GarP_1,214.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14458: ādāvante ca kurvīta abhiṣekaṃ yathākramam // GarP_1,214.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14460: antarjale japenmantraṃ triḥ kṛtvā cāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14463: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā japedbudhaḥ āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ smaredvā viṣṇamavyayam // GarP_1,214.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14467: gāyattrī vaiṣṇavī hyeṣā viṣṇoḥ saṃsmaraṇāya vai // GarP_1,214.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14470: āpo mā tasmādenasaḥ pāvamānaśca muñcatu iviṣmato vimā āpohaviṣmān āvirāsati /
GP12garup1_u:14471: haviṣmān deva asuro haviṣmān astu sūryaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14472: devīrāpo apā patnyā yaśca ūrmirhaviṣyaḥ indriyavānmādityantanaḥ taṃ devebhyo devatā dābhuśukralebhyasteṣāṃ bhāgakarṣivasisamudrasya dakṣiṇyāgrayāsimenāpograrbhiraśmatamodhoḥ
GP12garup1_u:14474: yābhirmitrāvaruṇasya siñcayābhirindramanayatyanna vātī vadrupadāṃ śanno devī apāmasṛgdvayasaṃsūrye santaṃ samāhitaṃ apāṃrasasya yo rasya yo gṛhṇāsyuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:14475: āpo devīrupasūrya madhumatīvayasyāya prajābhyaḥ tāsā māsthānātvarjihatāmoṣadhayaḥ sapippalāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14476: punantu mā pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ punantvanāpi pitā sahasāḥ pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā /
GP12garup1_u:14480: punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14481: punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ / punīhi mā /
GP12garup1_u:14482: pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat /
GP12garup1_u:14484: yatte pavitramarciṣyagne vitatamantarā brahmā tena punātu mā /
GP12garup1_u:14492: tayāmadantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām /
GP12garup1_u:14493: citpa tirmā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14495: praṇitacchakeyaṃ devo vākpatirmā savitā tvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14498: punastacchakeyaṃ dyupatiṃ ayaṃ gauḥ pṛśrirakramīsadaśaśataṃ mātaraṃ punaḥ pitarañca prayasmaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14499: devo mā savitā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14500: tasya te pavitrapate pavitrapūtasya yatkāmaḥ punātacchakeyam? /
GP12garup1_u:14501: oṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14503: snātvaivaṃ vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:14504: prakṣālya ca mṛdādbhiśca hastau prakṣālya vai tadā // GarP_1,214.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14506: drupadāṃ ca trirāvartya tathā caivāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14510: taccakṣurdeva iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣadityapi // GarP_1,214.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14512: gāyattrīṃ ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram // GarP_1,214.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14514: śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca // GarP_1,214.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14518: savyaṃ kṛtvā trirācamya śriyaṃ medhāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṣitim // GarP_1,214.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14520: umāmarundhatīṃ caiva śacīṃ mātarameva ca // GarP_1,214.38 //
GP12garup1_u:14521: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva sāvitrīṃ śāntimeva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14522: svāhāṃ svadhāṃ dhṛtiṃ caiva tathaivāditimuttamām // GarP_1,214.39 //
GP12garup1_u:14527: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe snānavidhivivaraṇaṃ nāma caturdaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14620: teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānāṃ api bhadre saumanase syāma /
GP12garup1_u:14621: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāsogniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14623: oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ kīlālaṃ parisnutaṃ svadhā stha tarpayata me pitṝn /
GP12garup1_u:14631: oṃ akṣanpitaro amīmadanta pitaro amī tṛpyantaḥ pitaraḥ śuṃ(sva)
GP12garup1_u:14632: dhadhvaṃ pibeha pitaro 'pi vānatrayāṃśca viśrayāṃśca bhavanapavitratvā rathapati te jātavedāḥ svadhābhiryajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ jupasva? /
GP12garup1_u:14633: oṃ ṇaduvātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14635: madhu dyaurastu naḥ pitā madhu mānno vanaspatirmadhubhām astu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ // GarP_1,215.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14637: oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmāya namo vaḥ pitaro jīvāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai namo vaḥ pitaro ghorāya namo vaḥ pitaro manyave /
GP12garup1_u:14638: namo vaḥ pitaro gṛhānna pitaro dattaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14639: namo vaḥ pitaro dadhme tadvaḥ pitaro vāsaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14642: ye cāsmākaṃ kule jātā aputrā gotriṇo mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14643: te tṛpyantu mayā dattaṃ vastraniṣpīḍanodakam // GarP_1,215.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14644: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devāditarpaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañjadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14648: prajvālya cāgniṃ paryukṣya-oṃ kraṣyādamagniṃ prahiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājyaṃ gacchatu ripravāhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14649: ihaivāyamitaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānat /
GP12garup1_u:14650: oṃ pāvaka vaiśvānara idamāsanaṃ araṇīgarbhasaṃskṛtatejorūpa mahābrahman muhūrtāstriṣu vaiśvānaraṃ pratibodhayāmi /
GP12garup1_u:14651: oṃ vaiśvānare na ubhayaṃ āprayātu parāvataḥ agnirna svadyutīrūpapṛṣṭho divi pṛṣṭho
GP12garup1_u:14652: 'śvi pṛthivyāṃ pṛṣṭhā vivevā oṣadhīcāviveśa vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭho 'gniḥ namo
GP12garup1_u:14673: oṃ ye bhūtā pracaranti dīnāca nimihanto bhuvanasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:14674: tebhyo baliṃ puṣṭikāmo dadāmi mayi puṣṭiṃ puṣṭipatirdadātu /
GP12garup1_u:14676: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiśvadevanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14680: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā // GarP_1,217.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14681: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,217.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14700: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ astrāya phaṭ // GarP_1,217.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14701: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyaṃ tatstripadā /
GP12garup1_u:14702: oṃ āpo jyo 'tī raso 'mṛtaṃ brahma bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom /
GP12garup1_u:14708: gāyattrī nāma yā sandhyā raktāṅgī raktavāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:14711: āyātu varadā devī madhyāhne śvetarūpiṇī // GarP_1,217.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14719: oṃ āpo hiṣṭhā mayo bhuvastā na urje dadhāta naḥ // GarP_1,217.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14724: oṃ tasmā araṅgamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /
GP12garup1_u:14726: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu oṃ durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smān dveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14734: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ // GarP_1,217.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14737: oṃ udutyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14740: āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca /
GP12garup1_u:14742: paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam /
GP12garup1_u:14746: devā gātuvido nāṅgavidvānādbhamitamanasaspata imaṃ devayajñaṃ svāhā vātedhāḥ japet // GarP_1,217.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14750: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14758: oṃ susvāgatāmiti tairukte oṃ viśvebhyo devebhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svāheti devabrāhmaṇapādayordevatīrthenābhugnakuśasahitajaladānam // GarP_1,218.3
GP12garup1_u:14763: etadācamanīyaṃ svāhā svadheti brāhmaṇahaste eṣavor'ghya iti brāhmaṇahaste puṣpadānam // GarP_1,218.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14764: oṃ siddhamidamāsanam iha siddhamityabhidhāya oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyamiti saptavyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrvamukhandevabrāhmaṇopaveśanam
GP12garup1_u:14766: oṃ devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaśca mahāyogibhya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14767: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityameva bhavantute iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14768: oṃ adyāsmindeśe amukamāse amukarāśiṅgate savitaryamukatithāvamukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ yathānāmaśarmaṇāṃ viśvedevapūrvakandṛśrāddhaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14769: oṃ viśvebhyo devabhyaḥ svāhā oṃ viśvedevānāvāhayiṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14770: āvāhayetyukte oṃ viśvedevāḥ sa āgata śṛṇutām imaṃ havam /
GP12garup1_u:14771: edaṃ barhirniṣīdata oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:14772: ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:14773: oṃ oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā /
GP12garup1_u:14776: ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānā bhavantu te /
GP12garup1_u:14777: oṃ apahatāsurā rakṣāṃsi vediṣada iti tritriryavavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14779: oṃ karuṣvetyanujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitraniṣevaṇam // GarP_1,218.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14780: oṃ śanno devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
GP12garup1_u:14786: oṃ yā divyā āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuryā antarikṣauta pārthavīryāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14787: hiraṇyavarṇā yajñiyāstāna āpaḥ śivāḥ śaṃ syonā suhavā bhavantu /
GP12garup1_u:14788: eṣor'gho nama iti brāhmaṇahaste jalaṃ dattvānenaiva pātreṇa pavitragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃstravaṃ pavitraṃ ca brāhmaṇapārśve dadyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14789: tataḥ prathamapātre saṃstravajalaṃ saṃsthāpya kuśopari ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryat /
GP12garup1_u:14791: viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāso yugayajño pavītāni namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14794: tataḥ pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ mātāmahapramātāmahavṛddhapramātāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye iti anujñāvacanam /
GP12garup1_u:14797: oṃ amukagotrebyo 'smatpitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ idamāsanaṃ svadhā iti brāhmaṇavāme āsanadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14801: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāso 'gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14803: oṃ apahatā surā rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tilavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14806: pratnamadbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝṃllokānprīṇīhi naḥ svāhā iti tiladānam // GarP_1,218.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14807: gandhapuṣpe hastābhyāṃ dattvā pitṛpātramutthāpya yā divyeti paṭhitvā amukagotrāsmatpitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14811: apavitraṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā vāmapārśve dakṣiṇe kuśopari oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasītyadhomukhapātrasthāpanam // GarP_1,218.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14814: amukagotrebhyo 'smatpitṛpitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhya etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāsoguṇasottarīyayajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena gandhādidānam /
GP12garup1_u:14820: tato ghṛtāktamannaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇopavītī pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ agnau karaṇamahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14821: oṃ kuruṣveti tenokte oṃ agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhutidvayaṃ devabrāhmaṇahaste
GP12garup1_u:14822: dattvā avaśiṣṭānnaṃ piṇḍārthaṃ sthāpayitvā aparamardhaṃ pitrādipātre mātāmahādipātre
GP12garup1_u:14824: pātramudrādi nidhāya kuśaṃ dattvā adhomukhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ pṛthivīte pātraṃ dyaurapidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ juhomi svāhā pātrābhimantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14829: oṃ nihanmi sarvaṃ yadamedhyavadbhaveddhatāśca sarve 'suradānavā mayā /
GP12garup1_u:14830: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sapiśācasaṅghā hatā mayā yātudhānāśca sarve iti siddhārthavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.16 //
GP12garup1_u:14831: tato dhūrilocanasaṃjñakebhyodavebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ svāheti vārikuśādyairanusaṅkalpanam /
GP12garup1_u:14833: tato viparītopavītena savyañjanaṃ saghṛtamannaṃ pitrādi brāhmaṇapātre nidhāya tadupari
GP12garup1_u:14834: bhūmisaṃlagnakuśaṃ dattvā oṃ pṛthivī te pātraṃ iti mantreṇa uttānābhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā
GP12garup1_u:14835: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇorityannopari uttānaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet /
GP12garup1_u:14837: bhūmipātitavāmajānuḥ amukagotrebhyaḥ asmatpitṛpitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ svadhā
GP12garup1_u:14838: annaṃ saṅkalpya oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛta payaḥ kīlālaṃ paristrutaṃ svadhāstu tarpayata me pitaram /
GP12garup1_u:14841: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svastatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt
GP12garup1_u:14842: iti visajayitvā oṃ madhuvātā ṛtāyate madhukṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso
GP12garup1_u:14844: madhudyaurastu naḥ pitā madhumānno vanaspatiḥ madhumānastu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14845: madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14849: cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // GarP_1,218.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14853: oṃ agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā ye 'pyadagdhāḥ kule mama /
GP12garup1_u:14854: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṅgatim /
GP12garup1_u:14855: iti bhūmau kuśopari saghṛtamannaṃ jalaplutaṃ vikiret // GarP_1,218.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14856: tato brāhmaṇakrameṇa jalagaṇḍūṣaṃ dattvā pūrvavatsavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetitryṛcaṃ japtvā oṃ rucitaṃ bhavadbhiriti devabrāhmaṇapraśraḥ
GP12garup1_u:14859: pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ vāmopavītena oṃ tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14860: oṃ tṛptāḥ sma iti tenokte bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalacatuṣkoṇaṃ ti lavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14866: itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya khavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trarjapannannaṃ sājyaṃ piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kuśopari amukagotra asmatpitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14870: tataḥ savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trirjaṃpanpiṇḍavikiraṇaṃ piṇḍāntike /
GP12garup1_u:14871: oṃ lepabhujaḥ prīyantamiti staraṇkuśeṣu hastamārjanaṃ prakṣālitapiṇḍodakena oṃ amukagotra /
GP12garup1_u:14873: amukaśarman sapatnīka etatte jalamavanekṣva ye cātratvāmanujāśca tvāmanu tasmai tesvadheti pitṛpiṇḍasecanam /
GP12garup1_u:14874: piṇḍapātramadhomukhaṃ kṛtvā baddhāñjaliḥ oṃ pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyadhvamiti japet /
GP12garup1_u:14875: apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udaṅmukhaḥ prāṇāṃstriḥ saṃyamya ṣaḍbhya ṛtubhyo namaḥ iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14878: dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaro yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14879: vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro namo vaḥ iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14881: tataḥ sadā vaḥ pitaro dveṣma iti vīkṣya etadvaḥ pitaro vāsa ityuccārya amukagotra etatte vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam /
GP12garup1_u:14882: vāmena pāṇinā udakapātraṃ gṛhītvā ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ityādi piṇḍopari dhārātyāgaḥ // GarP_1,218.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14884: kuśapatrañca dattvā oṃ akṣannamīmadantahya va priyā adhūṣata astoṣatasvabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayāmatī /
GP12garup1_u:14885: yo jānvindra te harīti trirjapaḥ // GarP_1,218.26 //
GP12garup1_u:14888: oṃ apāṃ madhye sthitā devāḥ sarvamapsu pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12garup1_u:14889: brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivā āpo bhavantu naḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14894: akṣataṃ cāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntiḥ puṣṭirdhṛtiśca me /
GP12garup1_u:14900: oṃ aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotraṃ no vardhatāṃ--dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14901: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyañca no 'stviti /
GP12garup1_u:14903: yācitāraśca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana /
GP12garup1_u:14907: kuśapavitraṃ gṛhītvātena kuśena pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā svadhāṃ vācayiṣye-oṃ vācyatāṃ-oṃ pitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
GP12garup1_u:14908: astusvadhā ityukte ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtamiti piṇḍopari vāridhārāṃ dadyāt // GarP_1,218.29 //
GP12garup1_u:14909: tataḥ oṃ viśvedevā asminyajñe prīyantā--devabrāhmaṇahaste yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14910: oṃ prīyantāmiti tenokte oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14911: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇopavītī pūrvābhimukhaḥ oṃ amukagotrāya
GP12garup1_u:14915: tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannā iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14916: susampannā iti piṇḍe kṣīradhārāṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanaṃ atithibrāhmaṇe piṇḍapātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā oṃ vāje vāje vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14917: asyamadhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānairiti piṇḍā divisarjanaṃ-āmāvājasya
GP12garup1_u:14918: prasavo jagamyādeme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe āmāgantāṃ pitarā cāmā somo 'mṛtatvena gamyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14924: anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ vai yatra kutracit // GarP_1,218.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14926: ityuktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadam // GarP_1,218.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14927: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14931: oṃ amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahānāṃ amukaśarmaṇāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14934: jātaputramukhadarśanādau vṛddhi śrāddhaṃ pūrvābhimukheṣu dakṣiṇopavītiṣu sayavabadarakuśairdevatīrthena namaskārāntena dakṣiṇopacāreṇa kartavyam
GP12garup1_u:14936: śrāddhe kartavye vasusatyasaṃjñakānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnenayuṣmāsu
GP12garup1_u:14939: tataḥ amukavṛddhau amukagotrāyā matprapitāmahyā amukadevyā nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti prapitāmahībrāhmaṇāmantraṇam
GP12garup1_u:14942: āsane oṃ viśvedevāsa āgata śṛṇutāma imaṃrṭha ivam /
GP12garup1_u:14944: oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ ye me antarikṣe ya udadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:14945: pe agnijihvā utavā yadatrā āsādyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:14952: oṃ vasusatyasaṃjñakebhyo devebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ savadaraṃ sadadhi pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ nama iti annasaṅkalpanam /
GP12garup1_u:14959: adya amukagotrasya matpituramukadevaśarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikamekoddiṣṭaśrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14963: tatasmṛptiṃ jñātvā dakṣiṇābhimukhīvāmopavītī ucchiṣṭasamīpe agnidagdhā iti annavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14964: amukagotramatpitaramukadevaśarmannetatte jalamavanenikṣva ye cātra tvāmanuyāśca tvāmanutasmai te svadhā iti rekhopari vāridhārādānam /
GP12garup1_u:14966: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14977: kuśaṃ dattvā pātrāntareṇa pidhāya acchidrāvadhāraṇāntaṃ parisamāpya tathaiva piturapi
GP12garup1_u:14980: uddhāṭanaṃ kṛtvā--oṃ ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye /
GP12garup1_u:14981: teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām /
GP12garup1_u:14982: oṃ ye samānāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14983: teṣāṃ śrīrmayi kalpatāmasmin loke śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14984: etanmantradvayena pitṛpātrodakaṃ pitāmahaprapitāmahapātre vṛddhaprapitāmahapātraṃ parityajya pitāmahaprapitāmahayorudakaṃ pavitrañca pitṛpātre kṣipet // GarP_1,220.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14987: pātramutthāpya oṃ yā divyeti paṭhitvā oṃ amukagotra matpitāmaha amukadevaśarman sapatnīka
GP12garup1_u:14990: piṇḍasecanārthaṃ pātrāntareṇa pidhāya pitṛbrāhmaṇavāmapārśva dakṣiṇāgrakuśopari pitṛbhyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14995: aṅguṣṭhaniveśanaṃ tilavikaraṇaṃ kṛtvā amukagotra etatte annaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ
GP12garup1_u:14996: savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ ye cātra tvā manuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai te svadhā iti // GarP_1,220.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15000: pitāmāhadau praśraṃ kṛtvā pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ svaditaṃ bhavadbhiriti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15001: oṃ amukagotra matpitaḥ amukaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te piṇḍo ye cātratvāmanuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai svadheti piṇḍapātramacchidramastu /
GP12garup1_u:15002: tataḥ saṅkalpa siddhivācanaṃ samāpya piṇḍaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasa iti mantradvayaṃ paṭhitvā pitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahapātreṣu kṣipet
GP12garup1_u:15007: suprokṣitamastu śivā āpaḥ santu--vṛddhaprapitāmahakrameṇa brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam /
GP12garup1_u:15009: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astvityukte svadhāṃ vācayiṇya iti pitāmāhadibrāhmaṇānujñāpanam // GarP_1,220.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15010: oṃ vācyatāṃ ityukte oṃ pitāmahādibhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
GP12garup1_u:15012: astu svadhetyukte oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīriti dakṣiṇābhimukhavāridhārātyāgaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15013: oṃ viśvedevā asmin yajñe prīyantāmiti devabrāhmaṇahaste oṃ yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:15015: piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmahādibhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tataḥ pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣo me pradīyantāmityāśīḥ prārthanam /
GP12garup1_u:15016: pratigṛhyatāmityukte dātāro no 'bhivardhantāmiti pātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā vāje vājedṛvisarjanam /
GP12garup1_u:15019: śrāddhaṃ viṣṇuḥ śrāddhakartā phalaṃ śrāddhādikaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,220.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15020: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānaṃ nāmaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15025: śrutaṃ dharmaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ sukhamutsāhameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:15026: śoko harati vai nṝṇāṃ tasmācchokaṃ parityajet // GarP_1,221.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15028: karmāṇi prerayantīha puruṣaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ // GarP_1,221.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15030: dānāḥtsvargaśca rājyañca dadyāddanaṃ tato naraḥ // GarP_1,221.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15033: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15034: dharmasya nāśakā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ // GarP_1,221.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15037: na dātā sukhaduḥ khānāṃ na ca hartāsti kaścana /
GP12garup1_u:15038: bhuñjate svakṛtānyeva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,221.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15040: santuṣṭaḥ ko na śaknoti phalamūlaiśca vartitum // GarP_1,221.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15042: idameva hi lobhasya kāryaṃ syā datiduṣkaram // GarP_1,221.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15044: lobhānmohaśca māyā ca māno matsara eva ca // GarP_1,221.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15046: yaḥ sa śāntaḥ paraṃ lokaṃ yāti pāpavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,221.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15047: devatā munayo nāgā gandharvā guhyakā hara /
GP12garup1_u:15048: dhārmikaṃ pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyaṃ na kāminam // GarP_1,221.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15050: alabhyaṃ labhate martyastatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,221.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15056: bhūmiṃ sarvaguṇopetāṃ dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,221.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15057: na godānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidastīti me matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15058: yā gaurnyāyārjitā dattā kṛtsnaṃ tārayate kulam // GarP_1,221.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15060: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ carācaramidaṃ jagat // GarP_1,221.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15064: annātprāṇā balaṃ tejaścānnādvīryaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,221.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15068: kālena tīrthaṃ phalati sadyaḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,221.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15070: jñānaṃ śamo dayā dānameṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,221.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15071: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dharmasārakathanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15075: makṣikā vipruṣo nārī bhuvi toyaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15080: snānaṃ japyañca kartavyaṃ dinasyānte ca bhojanam // GarP_1,222.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15082: yaśca pāṇitale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ // GarP_1,222.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15089: yastatra bhuṅkte pakvānnaṃ kṛcchrārdhaṃ tasya dāpayet /
GP12garup1_u:15090: teṣāmapi ca yo bhuṅkte kṛcchrapādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15092: etadannañca yo bhuṅkte dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,222.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15101: phalaṃ bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,222.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15103: gāyattryaṣṭasahasrantu drupadāṃ vā śataṃ japet // GarP_1,222.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15117: varṇabāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañcarātreṇa vai tadā // GarP_1,222.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15119: striyo bālāśca vṛddhāśca na duṣyanti kadācana // GarP_1,222.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15120: nityamāsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuntaiḥ pātitaṃ phalam /
GP12garup1_u:15121: prastrave ca śucirvatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // GarP_1,222.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15122: udake codakasthaṃ tu sthaleṣu sthalajaṃ śuci /
GP12garup1_u:15123: pādau sthāpyau ca tatraiva ācāntaḥ śucitāmiyāt // GarP_1,222.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15125: mūtreṇa surayā miśraṃ tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati // GarP_1,222.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15133: bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya taddravyaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,222.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15134: āranālaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ takrantu kṛsarañca yat /
GP12garup1_u:15135: śūdrādapi ca tadgāhyaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu tathāntyajāt // GarP_1,222.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15136: gauḍīṃ paiṣṭīñca mādhvīkaṃ viprādiryaḥ surāṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:15137: surāṃ pibandvijaḥ śudhyedagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ piban // GarP_1,222.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15138: vipraḥ pañcaśataṃ japyaṃ gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śataṃ vipraśca bhuktvānnaṃ pānapātreṇa sūtake // GarP_1,222.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15140: vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhana śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15142: bāle prete māsike ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15144: jatadantaśca bālaśca kumārī ca trivarṣikā // GarP_1,222.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15152: agnayo yatra hūyante vedo vā yatra paṭhyate // GarP_1,222.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15153: satataṃ vaiśvadevā di na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:15154: aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte trirātrācchudhyati dvijaḥ // GarP_1,222.40 //
GP12garup1_u:15155: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā caiva rajasvalā /
GP12garup1_u:15157: dvirātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hyupoṣitā /
GP12garup1_u:15158: śūdrā snānena śudhyettu droṇārthaṃ na visarjayet // GarP_1,222.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15160: suvarṇādbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet // GarP_1,222.43 //
GP12garup1_u:15161: kūpe ca patitāndṛṣṭvā śvaśṛgālau ca markaṭam /
GP12garup1_u:15164: asthi carma malaṃ vāpi mūṣikāṃ yadi kūpataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15165: uddhṛtya codakaṃ pañca gavyācchuddhyettu śodhitam // GarP_1,222.45 //
GP12garup1_u:15173: krīḍāyāṃ śayanīyādau nīlīvastraṃ na duṣyati // GarP_1,222.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15174: nīlīvastraṃ na spṛśecca nīlī ca nirayaṃ brajet /
GP12garup1_u:15175: vrahmaghnaśca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15176: ṛkṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15178: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:15181: vṛṣamekaṃ sahasraṃ gāṃ dadyācca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.53 //
GP12garup1_u:15185: asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā śṛṅgabhaṅgamathāpi vā // GarP_1,222.55 //
GP12garup1_u:15186: tvagbhedaṃ pucchanāśe vā māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:15189: punaḥ saṃskāramāyānti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ // GarP_1,222.57 //
GP12garup1_u:15193: antyabhāṇḍasthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,222.59 //
GP12garup1_u:15196: upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhadviguṇaṃ hi yat // GarP_1,222.60 //
GP12garup1_u:15202: ekaikaṃ vardhayetpiṇḍaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet // GarP_1,222.63 //
GP12garup1_u:15207: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktā dadhnastu daśa ucyate /
GP12garup1_u:15208: ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyaṃ malāpaham // GarP_1,222.66 //
GP12garup1_u:15209: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15211: brahmovāca munibhiścaritā dharmā bhaktyā vyāsa mayoditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15213: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyā vandanena ca /
GP12garup1_u:15215: dharmo hi bhagavānviṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇostu tarpaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:15216: homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā sakalaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,223.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15218: pralayaṃ jagato vakṣye tatsarvaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka /
GP12garup1_u:15221: kṛte dharmaścatuṣpācca satyaṃ dānaṃ tapo dayā // GarP_1,223.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15223: caturvaṃṣarsahasrāṇi narā jīvanti vai tadā // GarP_1,223.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15225: śūraścātibalo viṣṇū rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha // GarP_1,223.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15231: catuḥ śatāyuṣo lokā dvijakṣatrodbhavāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,223.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15239: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni yair vedyo harireva hi // GarP_1,223.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15262: sattvaṃ rajastama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15264: prabhūtañca yadā sattvaṃ mano burdhondriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup1_u:15265: tadā kṛtayugaṃ vidyājjñāne tapasi yadratiḥ // GarP_1,223.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15271: śokamohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistamasi smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,223.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15280: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśācasadṛśāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15282: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitryodakakriyām /
GP12garup1_u:15283: strīparāśca janāḥ sarve śūdraprāyāśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15285: śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanaparā ājñāṃ bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ // GarP_1,223.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15289: kṛte yadyyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ japataḥ phalam // GarP_1,223.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15291: tasmāddhyeyo harirnityaṃ geyaḥ pūjyaśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15292: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yugadharmakathanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15297: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrā divi sapta divākarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15298: te tu pītvā jalaṃ sarvaṃ śoṣayanti jagattrayam // GarP_1,224.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15300: viṣṇuśca rudro bhūtvāsau pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,224.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15302: varṣante vai varṣaśataṃ nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ // GarP_1,224.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15307: atha prākṛtikaṃ vakṣye pralayaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka // GarP_1,224.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15309: brahmāṇaṃ nyasya dehe hi mukto yogabalairhariḥ // GarP_1,224.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15310: ye gatā brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ te 'pi yānti paraṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:15314: pūrṇe brahmāyuṣi gate bhidyate 'mbhasi līyate // GarP_1,224.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15315: evaṃ sā jagadādhārā toye corvo pralīyate /
GP12garup1_u:15316: āpastejasi līyante tejo vāyau pralīyate // GarP_1,224.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15317: vāyuḥ khe khañca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān /
GP12garup1_u:15321: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe naimittikapralayonāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15327: yadvinā puruṣārtho na līnaḥ syātparamātmani // GarP_1,225.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15331: yacca piṇḍaṃ prayacchanti yamaloke tadaśnute // GarP_1,225.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15333: pāpakṛdyāti narakaṃ puṇyakṛdyāti vai divam // GarP_1,225.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15335: nābhibhūtañca tasyaiva yāti bījadvayaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,225.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15337: peśyāḥ palasamo 'ṇḍaḥ syādaṅkuraṃ tata ucyate // GarP_1,225.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15340: tvaco romāṇi jāyante keśāścaiva tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:15341: naraścādhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate // GarP_1,225.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15343: bālatvaṃ tvatha kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi // GarP_1,225.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15349: upādhyāyavyalīkaṃ tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija // GarP_1,225.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15353: bhurtuḥ piṇḍamupāśvasto vañjayitvā tameva yaḥ // GarP_1,225.15 //
GP12garup1_u:15357: viśvāsahartā ca naro mīnayonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15369: aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ // GarP_1,225.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15370: kṛmiḥ strīvadhakartā ca bālahantā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15371: bhojanañcorayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,225.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15373: ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kāko madbhuramāmiṣam // GarP_1,225.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15374: madhu hṛtvā naro daṃśa-pūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15375: apo hṛtvā tu pāpātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate // GarP_1,225.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15376: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapoto vā prajāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15377: hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15379: mayūro varṇakaṃ hṛtvā śākapatrañca jāyate // GarP_1,225.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15381: chuchundariḥ śubhāngandhāñchaśaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet // GarP_1,225.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15387: eṣa eva kramo dṛṣṭo gosuvarṇādihāriṇām // GarP_1,225.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15389: asamiddhe hute cāgnau mandāgniḥ khalu jāyate // GarP_1,225.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15393: nikṛtya bandhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ kārpaṇyañca nṛṇāṃ vadhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15395: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ paralokaṃ prati kriyā /
GP12garup1_u:15400: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15402: sūta uvāca vakṣye sāṅgaṃ mahāyogaṃ bhuktimuktikaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:15404: mameti mūlaṃ duḥ khasya na mameti nivartanam /
GP12garup1_u:15413: mūrtendriyalayaṃ nūnaṃ na tvaṃ rājan na cāpyaham // GarP_1,226.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15414: na tanmātrādikaṃ vācā naivāntaḥ karaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15415: kaṃ vā paśyasi rājendra pradhānamidamāvayoḥ // GarP_1,226.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15419: sā muktirbrahmaṇā caikya manaikyaṃ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ // GarP_1,226.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15420: tadgṛhaṃ yatra vasati tadbhojyaṃ yena jīvati /
GP12garup1_u:15421: yanmuktaye tadevoktaṃ jñānājñāne na cānyathā // GarP_1,226.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15425: yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ dvividhamīritam // GarP_1,226.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15429: laghuryo daśamātrastu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ // GarP_1,226.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15437: nirudhya niścalo bhūtvā sthito yuñjīta yogavit // GarP_1,226.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15440: prāṇāyāmā daśāṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate /
GP12garup1_u:15441: dve dhāraṇe smṛto yogo yogibhistattvadarśibhiḥ // GarP_1,226.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15442: prāṅnāḍyāṃ hṛdaye cātra tṛtīyā ca tathorasi /
GP12garup1_u:15443: kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikāgre netre bhrūmadhyamūrdhasu // GarP_1,226.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15455: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyā malavarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:15460: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakparivarjitam // GarP_1,226.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15462: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15465: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotisturīyaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:15468: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjñānarūpo vimuktaye // GarP_1,226.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15470: ityaṣṭāṅgo mayā yoga uktaḥ śaunaka muktidaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15472: utpadyante hi saṃsāre naikaṃ yātvā parātmanām /
GP12garup1_u:15474: tato naṃ mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān /
GP12garup1_u:15475: na pāpairyujyate yogī narake na vipacyate // GarP_1,226.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15476: garbhavāse sa no duḥ khī sa syānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15481: indro 'pi paramaṃ sthānaṃ gandharvāpsaraso varāḥ // GarP_1,226.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15482: prāptā devāśca devatvaṃ munitvaṃ munayo gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15484: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15488: yathā bhaktyā haristuṣyettathā nānyena kenacit // GarP_1,227.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15490: jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15495: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhā ye vaiṣṇavāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:15496: brahmākṣaraṃ na śṛṇvanvai tayā bhagavateritam // GarP_1,227.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15497: praṇāmapūrvakaṃ bhaktyā yo vadedvaiṣṇavo hi saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15500: yena sarvātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvo niveśitaḥ // GarP_1,227.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15505: sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,227.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15506: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hariḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15507: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15509: dayāṃ kuru prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yo vadet /
GP12garup1_u:15510: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadyādetad vrataṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15523: yo bhaktiṃ vahate viṣṇau tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,227.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15525: na tāṃ yānti gatiṃ bhaktā yāṃ yānti munisattamāḥ // GarP_1,227.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15529: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,227.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15535: sa maro badhiro jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // GarP_1,227.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15536: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoryasya puṃso na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15540: svapuruṣamabhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle /
GP12garup1_u:15543: sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyagavyavasito hi saḥ // GarP_1,227.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15544: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:15545: viprendra pratijānīhi viṣṇubhakto na naśyati // GarP_1,227.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15546: dharmārthakāmaḥ kiṃ tasya muktistasya kare sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:15547: samastajagatāṃ mūlaṃ yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau // GarP_1,227.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15549: tameva ye prapadyante māyāmetāṃ taranti te // GarP_1,227.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15553: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,227.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15556: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣvakaṣṭalabhyeṣu sadaiva satsu /
GP12garup1_u:15557: bhaktyaikalabhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyaikalābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ // GarP_1,227.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15559: vaiṣṇavosmatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati // GarP_1,227.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15561: muktiṃ gatāḥ smaraṇamātravidhūtapāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ paramabhaktimatāṃ janānām // GarP_1,227.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15563: te 'pi mṛtyumatikramya yānti tadvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,227.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15569: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15573: yo namet sarvalokasya namasyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,228.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15575: praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdayālayam // GarP_1,228.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15577: taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ namasye parameśvaram // GarP_1,228.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15581: eko hi bhāvaguṇamātradṛḍhapraṇāmaḥ sadyaḥ śvapākamapi sādhayituṃ saśaktaḥ // GarP_1,228.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15583: sa yāṃ gatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatairapi // GarP_1,228.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15585: ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāro muktyā tāṃstārayiṣyati // GarP_1,228.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15586: āsīno vā śayāno vātiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā /
GP12garup1_u:15589: tathāpi narake mūḍhāḥ patantīti kimadbhutam // GarP_1,228.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15590: caturmukho vā yadi koṭivaktro bhavennaraḥ kopi viśuddhacetāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15591: sa vai guṇānāmayutaikadeśaṃ vadenna vā devavarasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_1,228.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15595: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrasto mṛgā yathā /
GP12garup1_u:15596: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,228.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15597: svapne 'pi nāma spṛśato 'pi puṃsaḥ kṣayaṃ karotyakṣayapāparāśim /
GP12garup1_u:15598: pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punaratra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya // GarP_1,228.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15607: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣāntaṃ japtvā mukto bhavennaraḥ // GarP_1,228.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15609: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtyakeśavam // GarP_1,228.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15611: saṃsārasāgaraṃ tīrtvā sa gacchedvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,228.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15613: spapnāntare na hi punaśca bhavaṃ sa paśyennārāyaṇastutikathāparamo manuṣyaḥ // GarP_1,228.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15614: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15618: dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇyapa eva ca // GarP_1,229.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15620: yo na pūjayate viṣṇuṃ taṃ vidyādbrahmaghātakam // GarP_1,229.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15622: taṃ yo na dhyāyate viṣṇuṃ sa viṣṭhāyāṃ krimirbhavet // GarP_1,229.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15624: kintvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,229.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15626: yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na cārcitaḥ // GarP_1,229.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15627: na tatkaroti sā mātā na pitā nāpi bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15632: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,229.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15635: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonatriśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15638: ālokya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15639: idamekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā // GarP_1,230.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15640: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kintīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15641: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇamananyadhīḥ // GarP_1,230.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15647: prāyaścittantu tasyaikaṃ hareḥ saṃsmaraṇaṃ param // GarP_1,230.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15651: yā kācinmanaso vṛttiḥ sā bhavatyacyutāśrayāt // GarP_1,230.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15653: bhuñjañjāgracca govindaṃ mādhavaṃ yaśca saṃsmaret // GarP_1,230.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15656: dhyānameva paro dharmo dhyānameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15657: dhyānameva paraṃ śaucaṃ tasmāddhyānaparo bhavet // GarP_1,230.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15658: nāsti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ dhtheyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparam /
GP12garup1_u:15660: yaddurlabhaṃ paraṃ prāpyaṃ manaso yanna gocaram /
GP12garup1_u:15663: smaraṇādeva tadviṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ syāditi śrutiḥ // GarP_1,230.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15667: prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmā ca yo 'cirāt // GarP_1,230.15 //
GP12garup1_u:15669: tathā cittasthite viṣṇau yoginā sarvakilbiṣam // GarP_1,230.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15671: saṃpluṣṭo vāsudevena manuṣyāṇāṃ sadā malaḥ // GarP_1,230.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15673: yatpāpaṃ nilayayāti smṛte naśyati taddharau // GarP_1,230.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15677: na krāmenmānasaṃ tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ // GarP_1,230.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15678: sā tithistadahorātraṃ sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15679: lagnaṃ tadeva vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ // GarP_1,230.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15681: canmuhūrtaṃ kṣaṇo vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // GarP_1,230.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15682: kalau kṛta yugaṃ tasya kalistasya kṛte yuge /
GP12garup1_u:15683: hṛdi no yasya govindo yasya cetasi nācyutaḥ // GarP_1,230.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15685: govinde niyataṃ cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadaiva saḥ // GarP_1,230.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15688: asaṃtyajya ca gārhasthayaṃ sa taptvā ca mahattapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15690: kṣamāṃ kurvanti kruddheṣu dayāṃ mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15697: ūrdhvā hyeva gatiścāsti kiṃ punarjñānināṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,230.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15699: narakadvāraśamanī sā kimarthaṃ na sevyate // GarP_1,230.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15700: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpo rājyañcāpi śacīpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15701: hantuṃ samarthaṃ hi sakhe hṛtkṛte madhusūdane // GarP_1,230.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15703: nāpayāti yadā cintā siddhāṃ manyeta dhāraṇām // GarP_1,230.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15706: na hi dhyānena sadṛśaṃ pavitramiha vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:15707: śvapacānnāni bhuñjāno pāpī naivātra lipyate // GarP_1,230.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15709: yadi nārāyaṇe 'pyevaṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15711: viṣṇubhaktiryasya citte kaṃ vā jīvo nametsadā /
GP12garup1_u:15712: sa tārayati cātmānaṃ tadaiva duritārṇavāt // GarP_1,230.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15713: tañjñānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sā kathā yatra kāśavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15715: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam /
GP12garup1_u:15716: tāveva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau // GarP_1,230.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15717: praṇāmamīśasya śiraḥ phalaṃ vidustadarcanaṃ pāṇiphalaṃ divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15718: manaḥ phalaṃ tadguṇakarmacintanaṃ vacastu govindaguṇastutiḥ phalam // GarP_1,230.40 //
GP12garup1_u:15722: sarvaṃ nārāyaṇe nyasya kurvannapi na limpati // GarP_1,230.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15724: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ māyayā tava // GarP_1,230.43 //
GP12garup1_u:15725: yasminnyastamatirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra navā viśetkathamapi brāhmo 'piloko 'lpakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15726: muktiñcetasi saṃsthito jaḍadhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiñcitraṃ yadayaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // GarP_1,230.44 //
GP12garup1_u:15728: gantuṃ duḥ khodadheḥ kuryurye ca tatra naranti te // GarP_1,230.45 //
GP12garup1_u:15729: rāṣṭrasya śaraṇaṃ rājā pitaro bālakasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:15730: dharmaśca sarvamartyānāṃ sarvasya śaraṇaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,230.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15732: na yebhyo vidyate tīrthamadhikaṃ munisattam // GarP_1,230.47 //
GP12garup1_u:15735: śūdraṃ vā bhagavadbhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15736: dvijajāti samaṃmanyo na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,230.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15738: tathā viśvasya kartāraṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15747: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇumahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15751: pūrvaṃ mātṛgaṇāḥ sarve śaṅkaraṃ vākyamabruvan // GarP_1,231.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15755: bhavatībhiḥ prajāḥ sarvā rakṣaṇīyā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15759: trailokye bhakṣyamāṇe tu tadā mātṛgaṇena vai /
GP12garup1_u:15770: yādṛśena rūpeṇa dhyāto rudraistu bhaktitaḥ // GarP_1,231.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15772: praṇipatya tu deveśaṃ tadā tuṣṭāva śaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,231.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15789: andhakasya vināśāya yā sṛṣṭā mātaro mayā /
GP12garup1_u:15790: anādṛtya tu madvākyaṃ bhakṣyantvadbhutāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,231.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15792: pūrvaṃ kṛtvā kathaṃ tāsāṃ vināśamabhirocaye // GarP_1,231.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15796: saṃhṛtya jagataḥ śarma kṛtvā cāntardadhe hariḥ // GarP_1,231.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15800: anādimadhyāntamaja purāṇaṃ parāpareśaṃ jagatāṃ nidhānam // GarP_1,231.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15802: samātṛvargasya karoti mūrtiṃ yadā tadā tiṣṭhati tatsamīpe // GarP_1,231.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15804: prasādya taṃ devavaraṃ sa labdhvā avyājjaganmātṛgaṇebhya eva ca // GarP_1,231.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15805: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nṛsiṃhastotraṃ nāmaikatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15809: pṛṣṭaḥ śrīnāradenaiva nāradāya tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,232.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15811: yaḥ saṃkāre sadā dvandvaiḥ kāmakrodhaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15816: uvāca tamṛṣiṃ śambhuḥ prasannavadano haraḥ // GarP_1,232.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15819: vakṣyāmi śṛṇu duḥ khaghnaṃ bhavabandhabhayāmaham // GarP_1,232.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15821: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ yasya māyayā // GarP_1,232.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15823: sa nistarati saṃsāraṃ devānāmapi dustaram // GarP_1,232.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15826: sarva ekārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva /
GP12garup1_u:15835: acalaṃ sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15837: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15843: yogibhiḥ sevitaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15845: stutvaivaṃ varadaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15850: nāradena purā pṛṣṭa evaṃ sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15851: yettena tasmai vyākhyātaṃ tanmayā kathitaṃ tava // GarP_1,232.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15858: sa viṣṇuṃ samyagārādhya siddhaḥ padamavāptavān // GarP_1,232.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15862: prayatnādyaḥ paṭhennitya mamṛtatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,232.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15863: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kulāmṛtastotraṃ nāma dvātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15867: dāmodaraṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15869: adho 'kṣajaṃ prapannosmi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15871: mādhavaṃ ca prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15873: lokanāthaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15875: mahāyogaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15877: viśvarūpaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mūtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15884: idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate bhaktyā trikālaṃ niyataṃ śuciḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15887: vicintya sūryādatirājamānaṃ mṛtyuṃ sa yogi jitavāṃstathaiva // GarP_1,233.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15888: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyakṛtaṃ mṛtyvaṣṭakastotraṃ nāma trayastriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15892: brahmā pṛṣṭo nāradāya yathovāca tathā param // GarP_1,234.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15895: pratyahaṃ cārcanākāle tathā tvaṃ vaktumarhasi // GarP_1,234.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15897: saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ teṣāṃ ye stuvanti sadācyutam // GarP_1,234.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15900: śṛṇu yena stutaḥ samyak pūjākāle prasīdati // GarP_1,234.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15912: namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,234.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15932: jaya vedāntavidvedya jaya sarvada mādhava // GarP_1,234.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15934: jaya sūkṣma cidāndana jaya cittanirañjana // GarP_1,234.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15942: tvaṃ prabho chalabhṛdrāmastvaṃ punaḥ sa kharāntakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15945: tvaṃ suparṇastathā cakraṃ tvaṃ gadā śaṅkha eva ca // GarP_1,234.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15946: tvaṃ śrīḥ prabho tvaṃ muṣṭisatvaṃ tvaṃ mālā deva śāvatī /
GP12garup1_u:15947: śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhastvaṃ hi śārṅgo tvaṃ ca tatheṣudhiḥ // GarP_1,234.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15948: tvaṃ khaḍgacarmaṇā sārdhaṃ tvaṃ dikpālāstathā prabho /
GP12garup1_u:15949: tvaṃ vedhāstvaṃ vidhātā ca tvaṃ yamastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ // GarP_1,234.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15951: tvaṃ rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sādhyastvaṃ vāyustvaṃ niśākaraḥ // GarP_1,234.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15952: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau tvaṃ marudgaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15953: tvaṃ daityā dānavā nāgāstvaṃ yakṣā rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ // GarP_1,234.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15955: bhūtāni viṣayastvaṃ hi tvamavyaktendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,234.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15958: tvaṃ vedī tvaṃ hare dīkṣā tvaṃ yūpastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15959: tvaṃ patnī tvaṃ puroḍāśastvaṃ śālā strukca tvaṃ stuvaḥ // GarP_1,234.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15960: grāvāṇaḥ sakalaṃ tvaṃ hi sadasyāstvaṃ sadākṣiṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15961: tvaṃ sūrpādistvaṃ ca brahmā musalolūkhale dhruvam // GarP_1,234.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15962: tvaṃ hotā yajamānastvaṃ tvaṃ dhānyaṃ paśuyājakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15967: tava rūpamidaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭyarthaṃ saṃprakāśitam // GarP_1,234.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15981: kṣantumarhasi tatsarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,234.44 //
GP12garup1_u:15982: na śaknomi vibho samyakkartuṃ pūjāṃ yathoditām /
GP12garup1_u:15985: divā rātrau ca sandhyāyāṃ sarvāvasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ // GarP_1,234.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15989: tathā prītirna ca dharmādikeṣu ca // GarP_1,234.47 //
GP12garup1_u:15991: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ karma svargamokṣādisādhanam // GarP_1,234.48 //
GP12garup1_u:15993: pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathā stotraṃ kaḥ śaknoti tavācyuta // GarP_1,234.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15994: stutaṃ tu pūjitaṃ me 'dya tatkṣamasva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:15996: stauhi viṣṇuṃ mune bhaktyā yadīcchasi paraṃ padam // GarP_1,234.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15997: stotreṇānena yaḥ stauti pūjākāle jagadghurum // GarP_1,234.51 //
GP12garup1_u:15999: anyo 'pi yo japedbhaktyā trisandhyaṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,234.52 //
GP12garup1_u:16001: putrārtho labhate putrānbaddho mucyate bandhanāt // GarP_1,234.53 //
GP12garup1_u:16003: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ bhagyaṃ kīrti ca vindati // GarP_1,234.54 //
GP12garup1_u:16005: sa dhanyaḥ sarvavitprājñaḥsa sādhuḥ sarvakarmakṛt // GarP_1,234.55 //
GP12garup1_u:16007: asaṃbhāṣyā hi te sarve sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,234.56 //
GP12garup1_u:16009: na śuddhaṃ vidyate tasya mano vākca durātmanaḥ // GarP_1,234.57 //
GP12garup1_u:16015: sakalamunibhirādyaścintyate yo hi śuddho nikhilahṛdi niviṣṭo vetti yaḥ sarvasākṣī /
GP12garup1_u:16016: tamajamamṛtamīśaṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smi bhayamaraṇavihīnaṃ nityamānandarūpam // GarP_1,234.60 //
GP12garup1_u:16017: nikhilabhuvana nāthaṃ śāśvataṃ suprasannaṃ tvativimalaviśuddhaṃ nirguṇaṃ bhavapuṣpaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16018: sukhamuditasamastaṃ pūjayāmyātmabhāvaṃ viśatu hṛdayapadme sarvasākṣī cidātmā // GarP_1,234.61 //
GP12garup1_u:16020: tasmādvicintyaḥ parameśvaro 'sau vimuktikāmena nareṇa samyak // GarP_1,234.62 //
GP12garup1_u:16022: sañcintya viṣṇuṃ paramadvitīyaṃ kastatra yogī na laṃya prayāti // GarP_1,234.63 //
GP12garup1_u:16023: imaṃ stavaṃ yaḥ satataṃ manuṣyaḥ paṭhecca tadvatprayataḥ praśāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16024: sa dhūtapāpmā vitataprabhāvaḥ prayāti lokaṃ vitataṃ murāreḥ // GarP_1,234.64 //
GP12garup1_u:16025: yaḥ prārthayatyarthamaśeṣasaukhyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca tathaiva mokṣam /
GP12garup1_u:16026: sa sarvamutsṛjya paraṃ purāṇaṃ prayāti viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ vareṇyam // GarP_1,234.65 //
GP12garup1_u:16028: yo vāsudevaṃ vimalaṃ prapannaḥ sa mokṣamāpnoti vimuktasaṅgaḥ // GarP_1,234.66 //
GP12garup1_u:16029: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'cyutastotraṃ nāma catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16032: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirviṣṇurityeva cintayan // GarP_1,235.1 //
GP12garup1_u:16033: sūrye hṛdvyomni vahnau ca jyotirekaṃ tridhā sthitam /
GP12garup1_u:16034: yathā sarpiḥ śīrasthaṃ gavāṃ na kurute balam // GarP_1,235.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16035: nirgataṃ karmasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ tāsāṃ mahā balam /
GP12garup1_u:16036: tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīrastho na karoti hitaṃ naṇām // GarP_1,235.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16041: lobho mohaḥ krodha etairyuktaḥ pāpaṃ naraścaret /
GP12garup1_u:16043: etatsusaṃyataṃ yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ (dhaḥ) /
GP12garup1_u:16044: paravittaṃ na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsāṃ kurute tathā // GarP_1,235.7 //
GP12garup1_u:16048: satyaṃ hitaṃ mitaṃ brūte yasmādvāktasya saṃyatā // GarP_1,235.9 //
GP12garup1_u:16052: bhruvormadhye sthitāṃ buddhiṃ viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ // GarP_1,235.11 //
GP12garup1_u:16056: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohito na smaratyapi /
GP12garup1_u:16057: yadā tasya kuto veti suṣuptiriti kathyate // GarP_1,235.14 //
GP12garup1_u:16058: jāgrato yasya no tandrā na moho na bhramastathā /
GP12garup1_u:16061: buddhyāhaṅkāramapi ca prakṛtyā buddhimeva ca // GarP_1,235.16 //
GP12garup1_u:16062: saṃyamya prakṛtiṃ cāpi cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16067: puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇyaṣṭau ca tāni hi // GarP_1,235.19 //
GP12garup1_u:16069: karṇikāyāṃ sthito devo dehī cidrūpa eva hi // GarP_1,235.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16071: yadā yāti tadā jīvo yāti muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,235.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16073: dhyānaṃ samādhirityete ṣaḍ yogasya prasādhakāḥ // GarP_1,235.22 //
GP12garup1_u:16077: madhyo dvādaśamātrastu oṅkāraṃ satataṃ japet // GarP_1,235.24 //
GP12garup1_u:16078: vācake praṇave jñāte vācyaṃ brahma prasīdati /
GP12garup1_u:16084: sahasā saha buddhyā ca pratyāhāreṣu saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_1,235.27 //
GP12garup1_u:16087: tasyaiva brahmaṇā proktaṃ dhyānaṃ dvādaśa dhāraṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16088: tuṣyeta niyato yuktaḥ samādhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate // GarP_1,235.28*1 //
GP12garup1_u:16089: dhyāyanna calate yasya manobhidhyāyato bhṛśam // GarP_1,235.29 //
GP12garup1_u:16091: dhyeye saktaṃ mano yasya dhyeyamevānupaśyati // GarP_1,235.30 //
GP12garup1_u:16093: dhyeye mano niścalatāṃ yāti dhyeyaṃ vicintayan // GarP_1,235.31 //
GP12garup1_u:16095: dhyeyameva hi sarvatra dhyātā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,235.32 //
GP12garup1_u:16103: sthityarthaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ sthūlarūpaṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,235.36 //
GP12garup1_u:16105: na vinā paramātmānaṃ kiñcijjagati vidyate // GarP_1,235.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16107: oṅkāraṃ paramaṃ brahma dhyāyedabjasthitaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,235.38 //
GP12garup1_u:16109: hṛdi sañcintayetpūrvaṃ pradhānaṃ tasya copari // GarP_1,235.39 //
GP12garup1_u:16113: jñānaṃ tu karṇikā tatra vijñānaṃ kesarāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,235.41 //
GP12garup1_u:16115: karṇikāyāṃ sthitaṃ tatra jīvavanniścalaṃ vibhu // GarP_1,235.42 //
GP12garup1_u:16118: hariṃ saṃsthāpya dehābje dhyāyanyo gī ca bhaktibhāk /
GP12garup1_u:16123: jitendriyātmakaraṇo jñānadṛpto hi yo bhavet // GarP_1,235.46 //
GP12garup1_u:16129: sarvabhūteṣu kāruṇyaṃ vidveṣaṃ viṣayeṣu ca // GarP_1,235.49 //
GP12garup1_u:16131: indriyairindriyārthāṃstu na jānāti naro yadā // GarP_1,235.50 //
