GP12garup1_u:16133: sarvavarṇāḥ śriyaḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā pāpāni bhasmasāt // GarP_1,235.51 //
GP12garup1_u:16134: dhyānāgninā ca medhāvī labhate paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:16141: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmavijñānasvarūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16151: atraivāntargataṃ sarvaṃ śāśvate nādvaye pade // GarP_1,236.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16155: so 'hamasmīti mokṣāya nānyaḥ panthā vimuktaye // GarP_1,236.6 //
GP12garup1_u:16156: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ dhyānaṃ jñānānāṃ caiva sādhanam /
GP12garup1_u:16159: dvividhaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca // GarP_1,236.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16166: yadā sarve vimucyante kāmā yesyahṛdi sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16168: vyāpakatvātkathaṃ yāti ko yāti kva sa yāti ca /
GP12garup1_u:16175: yathā te priyātmā naḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā priyaḥ // GarP_1,236.16 //
GP12garup1_u:16176: bodhamārge yathā cittaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā mate /
GP12garup1_u:16177: sarvadā sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvasya ca mahāmune // GarP_1,236.17 //
GP12garup1_u:16179: jāgratsvapnaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ sauṣuptasukhameva ca // GarP_1,236.18 //
GP12garup1_u:16181: satyamastu tathā vāṇu aśarīraṃ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,236.19 //
GP12garup1_u:16182: nāsti cetsukhaduḥ khānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vedanaṃ katham /
GP12garup1_u:16183: sadā sarvatra sarvajñaḥ sarvasya hṛdaye na yet // GarP_1,236.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16185: satya jñānānanta bhinnaṃ syānnasatyaṃ jñānataḥ pṛthak // GarP_1,236.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16188: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ tattvaṃ jñātvā tvakhilavidbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:16198: tathā hi rajjururagaḥ śuktiḥ kārajataṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:16207: ekaḥ satyaṃ tathā bhāgī vicāreṇa paraṃ mṛṣā // GarP_1,236.32 //
GP12garup1_u:16209: māyecchayā dvidhā sa syātpatiḥ patnī sukhaṃ jagat // GarP_1,236.33 //
GP12garup1_u:16215: yathā rathādayaḥ svapne santo naiva ca satyataḥ // GarP_1,236.36 //
GP12garup1_u:16216: tathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bhūtāni na tu sannidhau /
GP12garup1_u:16217: dvairūpyaṃ māyayā yāti jāgratsvapnapadajña (kṣa) yoḥ // GarP_1,236.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16228: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ātmajñānasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16241: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśo ca kṣetrajñastāni paśyanti // GarP_1,237.5 //
GP12garup1_u:16242: yadā prakāśate hyātmā paṭe dīpo jvalanniva /
GP12garup1_u:16250: ahaṃ kāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāvapi /
GP12garup1_u:16251: prakṛtiṃ puruṣe sthāpya puruṣaṃ brahmaṇi nyaset // GarP_1,237.10 //
GP12garup1_u:16252: ahaṃ bahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prasaṃkhyāya vimucyate /
GP12garup1_u:16255: kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ vidvānyo veda sa varaḥ kaviḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16257: jñānayajñasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣocśīm // GarP_1,237.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16258: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīmadbhagavadgītāsāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16264: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā // GarP_1,238.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16266: vidhinā yā bhaveddhiṃsā sā tvahiṃsā prakīrtitā // GarP_1,238.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16268: priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,238.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16283: āsanaṃ svastikaṃ proktaṃ padmamardhāsanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,238.11 //
GP12garup1_u:16291: padadvayārthau dvividhau vācyau lakṣyau smatau budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16305: aikyajñānaṃ tu hi bhavedvedāntāddūrato dhruvam // GarP_1,239.9 //
GP12garup1_u:16307: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāravarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16310: sannapi brahma tasmātkhaṃ marutkhācca tato 'nalaḥ // GarP_1,239.1 //
GP12garup1_u:16312: tataḥ saptadaśaṃ liṅgaṃ pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16314: śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ syātpañca vāyavaḥ // GarP_1,239.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16316: manontaḥ karaṇaṃ dhīśca syānmanaḥ saṃśayātmakam // GarP_1,239.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16322: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tatkāryaṃ tatsthameva ca // GarP_1,239.7 //
GP12garup1_u:16324: tridhāhri paramātmasthaṃ śarīraṃ procyate budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16328: jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīnāṃ sākṣī jīvaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,239.10 //
GP12garup1_u:16344: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo bhinno nāsti tatkāryatastathā // GarP_1,239.18 //
GP12garup1_u:16348: pṛthvyādhāraṃ vinā nāsti vinā nāsti ca tena sā // GarP_1,239.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16349: tejaśca vāyunā nāsti vāyuḥ khena vinā na hi /
GP12garup1_u:16350: yadbrahmaṇā ca khaṃ nāsti śuddha brahma vinā ca kham // GarP_1,239.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16354: tattvaṃpadāntau śiṣṭau ca tatkāro brahmavācakaḥ // GarP_1,239.23 //
GP12garup1_u:16358: satyaṃ jñānamanataṃ hi tvamasīti śrutīritam // GarP_1,239.25 //
GP12garup1_u:16361: gītāsāror'junāyokto yena brahmaṇi vai layaḥ // GarP_1,239.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16362: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāro nāmekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16365: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ rudra proktaṃ sāraṃ mayātava /
GP12garup1_u:16368: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādrudra sarvavitsa divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,240.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16370: iti vyāsa mayā viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ muktidaṃ śrutam /
GP12garup1_u:16374: mayāpi tubhyaṃ sūtena purāṇaṃ kathitaṃ param // GarP_1,240.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16376: viṣṇuḥ sāratamaṃprāha garuḍaṃ gāruḍaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,240.5 //
GP12garup1_u:16379: śaunaka pravaraṃ proktaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava // GarP_1,240.6 //
GP12garup1_u:16381: vyāsaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaśca purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:16383: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni tāni māṃ prāha vai śukaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16384: idaṃ tu gāruḍaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā te śaunakeritam // GarP_1,240.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16392: kṣattriyo kṣattriyasyāpi rakṣitā bhavatīha ca // GarP_1,240.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16395: anyasmai ca vadedvidvān brāhmaṇontarito ya di /
GP12garup1_u:16396: brāhmaṇāntaritai sarvaiḥ śrotavyaṃ gāruḍaṃ tvidama // GarP_1,240.14 //
GP12garup1_u:16398: gāruḍaṃ vasurājaśca śrutvā sarvamavāpa ha // GarP_1,240.15 //
GP12garup1_u:16408: na khādyau tau tvayānīcau caturbhujau ca pakṣipa? /
GP12garup1_u:16413: śākhā bhinnā tvayā yatra vālakhilyāḥ samāsthitāḥ // GarP_1,240.22 //
GP12garup1_u:16416: tvayā jitā raṇe devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16417: āhṛtaṃ tatpurā somaṃ vāhniṃ nirvāpya kāśyape // GarP_1,240.24 //
GP12garup1_u:16418: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā tu vicakṣuṣau /
GP12garup1_u:16419: tīkṣṇāgreṇa na sā bhaṅktvāvikravetau manohataḥ? // GarP_1,240.25 //
GP12garup1_u:16420: āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītameva na bhaktitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16421: tena viṣṇordhvajasthānaṃ vāhanatvaṃ gato hyasi // GarP_1,240.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16422: tvayā niḥ kṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāśca vañcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16423: jahāra cāmṛtaṃ pātraṃ śīghraṃ vai brahmasūdana // GarP_1,240.27 //
GP12garup1_u:16425: vinatā mocitā dāsyātkadvā pūrvajitā raṇe // GarP_1,240.28 //
GP12garup1_u:16426: uccaiḥ śravāḥ sa kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ityeva bhāṣate /
GP12garup1_u:16430: tasya pakṣasya devendro yadānītaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān /
GP12garup1_u:16431: tadā tava suparṇoti nāma sthānaṃ jagattraye // GarP_1,240.31 //
GP12garup1_u:16437: taduktaṃ gāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16440: yasyedaṃ vartate geha tasya sarvaṃ bhavediha // GarP_1,240.35 //
GP12garup1_u:16441: gāruḍaṃ yasya haste tu tasya hastagato nayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16444: putrārtho labhate putrān kāmārtho kāmamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16445: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ jayārtho labhate jayam /
GP12garup1_u:16447: vandhyāpi labhate puttraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim /
GP12garup1_u:16448: kṣemārtho labhate kṣemaṃ bogārtho bogamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.39 //
GP12garup1_u:16450: kāvyārtho ca kavitvaṃ ca sārārtho sāramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.40 //
GP12garup1_u:16452: idaṃ svastyayanaṃ dhanyaṃ gāruḍaṃ garuḍeritam // GarP_1,240.41 //
GP12garup1_u:16453: nākāle maraṇaṃ tasya ślokamekaṃ tu yaḥ paṭhet /
GP12garup1_u:16457: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe garuḍapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
